You have the habit of thinking and communicating both qualitatively and quantitatively. You tend to make data-driven decisions and clearly articulate them. You value simple but well-documented solutions over clever but opaque systems.

As a data engineer, you are in charge of the data ecosystem, which includes everything from data sources and databases to data storage solutions. description:
The position is responsible for monitoring ITS ticketing systems activities on ServiceNow by collecting and analysing data; updating and advising informing relevant stakeholders; identifying the root cause leading to different types of incidents and then initiating corrective actions to address the issue in compliance with SLA about Release and Change Management, Configuration and Asset Management, Problem Management, and Incident Management. Details are as below:



Improve the efficiency of ticketing systems activities on ServiceNow, including managing time window for each level of service, identifying workflow for how the ticket was handled and responsibilities of each party, escalating tickets when additional support is required.


Act as the main point of information to collect and summary data, informing stakeholders in a timely manner; identifying the root cause leading to one or more incidents and then initiating actions to rectify the issue in compliance with SLA about Release and Change Management, Configuration and Asset Management, Problem Management, and Incident Management.


Coordinate with incidents response teams to resolve major incidents and restore business services for all ITS-managed systems.


Understand, troubleshoot, and navigate through complex incidents and assign tasks to relevant stakeholders or escalate to the next level support group where needed.


Participate in the Critical Incident Response Team (CIRT) function to assist with the resolution of incidents as required.


Review records and processes of Change and Release management procedures through the relevant workflows. Participate in reviewing and implementing changes in systems/products/processes from RMIT Melbourne to RMIT Vietnam while minimizing disruptions and preventing potential problems or incidents.


Provide updates to key stakeholders regarding changes per periodically renewal process or when change request occurs.


Manage and maintain the Change Management Database updated after Changes and Releases management process to relevant stakeholders.


Ensure all data records about incidents/change requests/problems are correct and up to date.


Collect and organize information before Change Advisory Board (CAB) meeting. Review agendas and record minutes of CAB meeting in conjunction with Forward Schedule of Changes.










Bachelor’s degree in information technology or relevant degree with at least 3 years of industry-related experience in a similar role.


Knowledge of the ITIL framework. ITIL certification and training experience are desirable.


Demonstrated knowledge in Release and Change Management, Configuration and Asset Management, Problem Management, and Incident Management.


Ability to convene and chair meetings with agenda, minutes, and follow-up actions.


Interpersonal skills, including negotiation, liaison, and cross-cultural communication.


Ability to identify opportunities and areas for improvements, and initiate, lead and implement change to achieve efficiency and continuous improvement.


Strong in time and workload management skills with demonstrated ability to prioritise effectively, manage multiple tasks, meet deadlines, and achieve required outcomes and effectively deliver results.








Working in a team of young, talented and skilled developers. Well-equiped working condidtion in a friendly environment. Clear career path that moving you forward. Many other opportunities designed for you only. Come and discover!

Support the activities of Computer Security Incident Response Team (CSIRT) in RMIT Global.


Support in the monitoring of cybersecurity environmental threats; including periodic cyber technical compliance reporting of our operating environment.


Ensure the compliance of security standards, processes and procedures by continuously monitoring for vulnerabilities, periodic audits and identifying abnormality throughout the infrastructure.


Contribute to the continuous improvement of the IT Security function based on an in-depth knowledge of contemporary cybersecurity practices and trends.


Any other duties as required.










Bachelor degree in Computer Science, Information Security, or related discipline.


At least 4 - 5 years of experience in security operations.


CEH/Security+ certification is a plus.


Well presentation and customer-facing skills


Well-developed understanding of cybersecurity technologies (eg, Threat Management / Intelligence; Identity management; User access review)


Demonstrated good understanding of wide range of IT infrastructure components, from firewalls and intrusion detection systems to network and network protocols to a variety of PC platforms such as Windows/Linux and understanding of their security capacity.


Proven ability to prioritise tasks and deliver a quality service to the University.


Demonstrated high-level interpersonal and communication skills, with the ability to liaise effectively with internal and external clients, in order to identify and solve issues.


Proven capacity to work under stress and to adapt quickly in a rapidly changing environment.










Competitive VND salary (plus allowances) starting from 30,100,000 VND depending on a proven track record in meeting all the key selection criteria.


13th month Tet bonus + private medical insurance (for you and your dependents) + annual health check.

The Senior Developer is responsible for the ongoing development and maintenance of various systems used by the University, including student administration systems, web-based systems and data integrations. In addition, the incumbent will make contributions to the transition from existing systems to the University’s new strategic platforms including PeopleSoft, ServiceNow, Salesforce, and various systems managed by RMIT Australia. The incumbent will work with internal clients to capture requirements and support the test process. The incumbent will work together with other ITS teams in Vietnam and Australia to follow deployment and change management processes. The incumbent communicates well in an English-speaking, international environment.


Your Responsibilities




Take shared responsibility over software architecture, quality assurance, security, and documentation of software.


Design and development applications using a variety of programming languages including PHP, Python, HTML, Javascript, and Livecode.


Design and develop new systems and new functionality using a variety of frameworks for back-end development and front-end development.


Design, develop and document data integration scripts and APIs.


Provide expertise in database development including schema design and writing SQL queries.

Experience in working with the Scrum or Kanban framework, and agile tools such as Jira, Confluence, Bitbucket.

description:

QA Engineer (Senior/Lead level)
 to join an Agile development team and take part in every development lifecycle to ensure product quality and release plan. This role plays an important part in our company’s product development process. Our ideal candidate will be responsible for conducting tests before product launches to ensure software runs smoothly and meets user's needs while being cost-effective.


Your key responsibilities are:




Participate in sprint planning and work closely with the Scrum team to analyze requirements and provide necessary QA/test recommendations


Review requirements, specifications, and technical design documents to provide timely and meaningful feedback


Create detailed, comprehensive, and well-structured test plans and test cases


Estimate, prioritize, plan and coordinate testing activities


Execute all testing activities (manual & automated testing) to improve product quality, work closely with the team (engineers, product manager, customer service, operation, etc.) to deliver the product success


Identify, record, document thoroughly, and track bugs


Monitor debugging process results


Investigate the causes of non-conforming software and train users to implement solutions


Track quality assurance metrics, like defect densities and open defect counts


Support, review, and provide necessary training to other QA/QC Engineers


Stay up-to-date with new testing tools and test strategies

Main responsibilities is ensure project quality and services work in a fully integrated manner as expected by the customer, follow software development process and contribute ideas to improve the project quality.


Responsibilities:

- Develop new deployment pipeline for the core products to better control product quality, increase team’s productivity, accuracy and efficiency, and reduce product’s time to market.
- Maintain the continual availability of business information systems, and the maintenance, lifecycle management, support, monitoring, incident remediation, Automation and continual improvement of those systems.
- Be responsible for building and running systems that make software engineering faster, better and safer.
 







Requirement:


*Technical Skills: 


- 1 year+ of experience in scripting skills in Bash/ Python /Node.js...


- 1 year+ of experience with Linux, networking, security...


- 1 year+ of experience with Nginx, Jenkins, Mysql, Redis, Elasticsearch, git, bitbucket, GitLab..

- Experience with Infrastructure as Code: Terraform, Ansible.
- Experience with Container orchestration frameworks (Kubernetes).
- Experience with SDLC, automated build pipeline, continuous integration and continuous deployment environments.
- Working knowledge of Site Reliability Engineering - environment provisioning, monitoring, security, storage and networks.
- Nice to have : Helm (v2), Bash, Powershell, Serverless Platform, Typescript.
- Experience in Cloud platform (either Azure, Google Cloud, or AWS (preferred)).


*Soft Skills:

- Good at logical thinking, and team work spirit.
- A proactive, team player with ability to work in dynamic environments.
- Willing to research new domains and learn new things/techniques.
- Good at English (communication & written) is a big plus.

description:
General administration and configuration of JIRA, Confluence, and associated plugins to maximize efficiency in using the tool


Developing metrics, dashboards, reports and advanced filters to provide leadership with meaningful operational/performance metrics and status reports


Creating/maintaining Confluence spaces and permission schemes, and JIRA projects, workflows, screen schemes, custom fields, permission schemes and notification schemes


Onboarding new teams to JIRA and help existing teams optimize their workflows


Providing user management, training, and support for JIRA / Confluence to teams as needed


Applying built-in customization and third party add-ons to extend JIRA / Confluence functionality as needed, e.g Structure, Tempo …


Developing custom scripts / Rest APIs calls to integrate other systems with JIRA and to pull data for metrics reporting.


Develop and deploying custom plugins for JIRA


Analyzing requests for new JIRA functionality, implement new features, triage incoming support requests and handle or route appropriately.


Leading upgrade testing to make sure new versions of JIRA / Confluence and plugins can be successfully deployed to production with no negative user impacts


Troubleshooting issues with JIRA / Confluence and apply fixes as needed










3-5 years of experience with advanced knowledge of the Atlassian Suite and features, with excellent understanding of general administration and configuration with JIRA and Confluence.


Prior knowledge with leveraging tools to support agile/ DevOps software development


Ability to work in a fast-changing, dynamic, and agile environment


Strong trouble-shooting skills and ability to solve problems at their root, thinking at a systems level and understanding the broad context of the tools usefulness


Proven ability to build strong, trust-based relationships with key stakeholders


Strong verbal and written communication skills to work with team members to gather and understand business requirements and translate into optimal JIRA / Confluence solutions


Works confidently and comfortably independently, prioritizing and delivering effectively to deliver value to the end users.


Energy and passion to invent and create new solutions and drive positive change


Ability to prioritize across multiple requests and meet deadlines

description:
We are looking for a Business System Analyst who will join our team to be part of our transformation squad who can troubleshoot, problem-solve, arrive at solutions for banking and financial data service.
You will responsible for exploring a variety of banking systems and data platforms and analytical tools to provide timely, meaningful and consumable information to internal stakeholders as well as the team. This role will work with other cross-functional teams to assist our team to understand stakeholders’ business metrics on a daily basic.

Responsibilities:




Possess an in-depth understanding of banking business data and BSA techniques.


Support the planning, preparation, translation, and execution of data flows and migrations between enterprise platforms.


Evaluate Enterprise/ Banking data and identify opportunities to improve data quality through governance.


Develop data integrity checks and leads remediation efforts with stakeholders.


Evaluate requirements for data gathered from multiple sources, reconcile conflicts, and build translation models for the Enterprise/ Banking Data Warehouse.


Work with stakeholders to identify and implement data enrichment throughout the enterprise.


Work with stakeholders and subject matter experts to support ongoing documentation and maintenance of data standards within the enterprise knowledgebase.


Able to work in a fast-paced, multi-site location, team-oriented environment


High level of attention to detail


Ability to work and communicate effectively with Engineers and Business users










Bachelor’s degree in Business, Computer Information Systems, Banking and Finance or relevant fields.


3+ years’ experience in a Business systems analyst.


Experience in writing SQL queries and using data visualization techniques and tools


Experience with data warehousing and reporting


Experience performing root cause analysis on internal and external data and processes to answer specific business questions and identify opportunities for improvement.


Able to work independently with minimum supervision.


Strong verbal and written communication skills.




Nice to have:




Knowledge of banking products and processes is a plus.


Knowledge of DWH and Cloud Platform and Banking systems (T24, LOS, BPM, ECM, Card System…) is a plus.


Strong organizational and multitasking skills with ability to balance competing priorities.


Proactive and forward-thinking attitude and creative problem-solving ability.

- The job holder researches, architects, and defines Data Engineering, Advanced Analytics và Business Intelligence capabilities and strategies for information delivery and data exploration to support business function needs and goals.


Key Accountabilities (1)


Data Architect
- Delivers a modern architecture capable of advancing the overall analytic performance and data-driven strategy of the bank
- Design end-to-end data streams, storage, data serving systems and analytical workflows, including overall architecture, capabilities, platforms, tools and governing processes.
- Create, maintain, and communicate positioning/go-forward strategies for the data platform and analytical capabilities/tools.
- Share governance responsibility to ensure alignment to enterprise guidelines for security, auditing, data governance, metadata management, etc.
- Help define/improve best practices, guidelines and integration with other enterprise solutions.
- Review analytic solutions for re-usability, scalability, synergy opportunities and alignment to defined best practices and guidelines.
- Create and evolve big-data and analytic technology roadmap, to align with continuously evolving business needs.
- Monitor technology trends and perform discovery of any new tools/capabilities of interest.
- Benchmark big-data and analytic capabilities with industry analysts and other companies.
- Own strategic technology relationships with technology vendors and external communities/partners.
- Lead education and training for analytics community.
 


Key Accountabilities (2)


Projects Management
- Manage project conflicts, challenges and dynamic business requirements to keep operations running at high performance.
- Work with team leads to resolve people problems and project roadblocks, conduct post mortem and root cause analyses to improve practices for maximum productivity.


Key Accountabilities (3)


Talent Development

- Identify and encourage areas for growth and improvement within the team and support with personal development plan.

None

Business Tribe, Enabling Tribe (IT or Data - Engineer/Governance), division heads, divisions managers

- Proven track record of delivering scalable, resource intensive, integrated and operational big-data and analytical solution; experience creating point of views, roadmaps, and process diagrams

description:
ABOUT US


Floware is a leader in building innovative software to transform the way people live, play, work, and learn. Our mission is to create smart solutions that benefit everyone and solve their daily challenges. We were the first in Vietnam to develop an iOS app and our first OS X application SmartDay debuted on the Mac App Store at #5.


WHAT YOU’LL DO


The Senior DevOps/CloudOps Engineer (SCE) plays the vital role of designing, implementing, securing, and maintaining all of Floware’s cloud infrastructure in Amazon AWS to deliver high performance, reliability, scalability, availability. The SCE is also entrusted to build systems and logics required for our CI/CD/CD pipelines to be used for all of our development.







WHO YOU ARE




3+ years of proven experience architecting and building infrastructure/cloud solutions in Amazon AWS using (but not limited to) ELB, EC2, S3, CloudFront, RDS, Lambda, VPC, Elastic Search, IAM, API Gateway.


2+ years of advanced Linux administration skills


2+ years of managing a container or orchestration platform (Docker or Kubernetes)


3+ years of experience building sophisticated and highly automated infrastructures


3+ years of experience with source control software such as Git and SVN


3+ years of experience of any scripting languages

Excellent understanding of DevOps/CloudOps best practices, approaches and methodologies


Impeccable leadership skills and able to drive DevOps/CloudOps solutions

description:
We are looking for a Mid-level and Senior QA engineer who has Manual OR Automation testing experience to work as lead QA for one of our long-term main HRTech clients, owing to the QA process of the multi-platform employee management system. 

You will be responsible for ensuring quality and driving QA excellence for the HRTech products, working alongside the development team during iterations to test the newest functionality, creating test cases to be added to test case suites to be run before all releases, and working to support the internal Product Owner.

We are looking for a QA Engineer who takes pride in quality and improvement, is proactive, loves their job, and takes initiative in helping not only test though also work with the team on improving product features. You will also have the opportunity to learn directly from the internal PO and assist in managing the team’s process.


What You’ll Be Doing




Understanding product requirements and functionalities in order to come up with a test plan that covers all cases.


Working closely with project managers, designers, and developers to improve the output quality and complete development sprints in a timely manner.


Listening to clients, understanding their problems, and communicating with the team to resolve. We believe it is everyone’s responsibility to maintain an effective communication channel with the clients and keep them happy.


Scheduling test plans to make sure products are properly verified before any important release or launch.


Create automation tests for some of the functionality in the products you test.


Following agile methodologies and agile processes to ensure the team is able to move at a rapid pace without any roadblocks.




How You’ll Benefit




You will be working with a globally recognized client, interacting directly with their internal staff, and running lead on implementing tests for the platform.


You will have the opportunity to refine your skills and application knowledge whilst testing different products and platforms.


We are a fully collaborative team, with all members of the product design and development teams in-house, giving you the ability to interact with all members as you help to improve the quality of the products you work on.


We are willing to adopt new but proven technologies provided that they bring business values to our clients and learning opportunities for our engineers. We have the freedom to choose and recommend what solutions are best for a certain project.


You will be able to work directly with the PO and help support and learn the processes of managing the team.









Must have




Require strong written and verbal communication skills in English.


Require a minimum of 3 years experience in the QA/QC field.


Require a deep knowledge of agile and scrum development processes.


Experience with at least one programming language: Java, Javascript, Ruby, Python


Advanced knowledge of testing methodologies, testing process, quality models, standards.




Good to have




Hands-on experience in automation tests using Selenium or a similar test framework.


Good knowledge of Load/Performance testing, API testing, SQL database.


Familiar with Cucumber and BDD


Familiar with writing user stories and detailing acceptance criteria.


Experience working in a fast-paced environment such as an agency or service company is a plus.


Familiar with Git, Github / GitLab / BitBucket, and Pull Requests.









Who We Are


CodeLink is an innovative and design-focused development agency. We focus on user-centric design and agile development to bring the product vision of our clients to life. We handle the end-to-end development of products, developing the product vision through product understanding, designing experiences through UX design, refining these flows with modern UI design, and developing products through iterative agile development.

We work with both early-stage product teams and teams with existing products from a wide range of countries and industries. We focus on modern technologies and work directly with our clients. We design using design-thinking principles on tools such as Sketch, Figma, Zeplin, and more, and develop products leveraging our tech stack of React, React Native, Rails, Python, and Node.JS.


Our Core Values



1. Take full ownership of delivery

We take ownership of our client projects and ensure that we deliver what we are in charge of to the best possible outcome.


2. Deliver our highest level of quality

We take pride in the high quality that we deliver and work at a sustainable pace to ensure we can always deliver on that quality.


3. Stay consistent in plans and processes

We keep open and transparent communication with our teammates and our client whilst following agile development practices.


4. Have empathy for all those we work with

We show empathy and respect to all those we work with to gain a deeper understanding without any judgment or assumption.


5. Continuously improve and grow

We aim high with a growth mindset and see every day as an opportunity to develop ourselves, our processes, and our products.


Top 3 Reasons To Join Us




Use cutting-edge & proven technologies


Work directly with international clients


Open environment with a focus on learning




Why You’ll Love Working With Us




We work hand-in-hand with our clients to fully invest in their product development and build solutions together for their target market.


We fully invest in our team, we will help you build yourself up in any area you feel you need development, be it in English, learning a new design tool, developing your design thinking, and more. We want to make sure that you’re always learning and developing yourself whilst a part of our team.


We respect both Product and Technology equally, ensuring all of the Products we work on have features with true market potential and ensuring all of the team contribute to, understand, and believe in what they are developing.


We are very selective with our clients, we only work on awesome products we believe in and that show strong market potential.


We respect you and your personal hours, we keep a sustainable pace by working standard 8 hour days from Monday to Friday, ensuring we only plan for what we can achieve.


We are fully agile and only work with Clients who work the same, working with set sprint goals and working at our rate of velocity.


You will have ownership over your role, giving you the opportunity to experiment and try new processes to better improve your day-to-day responsibilities. We are always open to improving our processes.

CodeLink is an innovative and design-focused development studio made up of an international mix of Designers and Developers. Our main stacks are ReactJS, Flutter, Rails, Golang, and Node.JS. We have built products in different industries, including Finance, Education, Entertainment, HR, etc for clients ranging from start-ups such as CryptoKitties to big companies such as Air Asia and Electronic Arts.

We are building an environment where personal development is a focus. We want all members to grow with the company through hands-on projects and industry best practices. Our clients have extremely high expectations and that sets a bar for our quality of work.

Our engineers work directly with international teams from Canada, the US (Silicon Valley, Boston), Germany, and other well-developed tech scenes. This level of collaboration and exposure helps us skill up to meet international standards. 

We are willing to adopt new but proven technologies provided that they bring business values to our clients and learning opportunities for our engineers. We have the freedom to choose and recommend what solutions are best for projects.

We are looking for a front-end developer who either has experience with Flutter or wants to learn those technologies.
 


What you'll be doing:




Working on Mobile products for a diverse range of clients and industries


Working and pair programming with other developers to build applications with Flutter / React Native and Golang / Rails / Node.JS


Working with Product Owner to convert business requirements into technical designs


Communicating directly with the clients via chat and video calls to perform day-to-day work


Cooperating with UI Designer to implement modern minimalist designs into production


Learning new languages and frameworks to improve yourself and stay current in an ever-changing environment


Contributing to the local Tech Ecosystem by mentoring, writing articles, and joining events.









Desired Skill-set:



Must have:




Require a minimum of 2 years of experience in mobile or web development, preferably with one of these technologies: React, React Native, Flutter, iOS SDK, or Android SDK.


Require solid experience with app layouts.


Require experience with app animations.


Require hands-on experience with app performance and optimization.


Require knowledge of writing unit tests.


Require prior experience with REST or GraphQL.


Require excellent written and verbal communication skills in English.




Good to have:




Familiar with Flux state management framework.


Familiar with Firebase services such as Push notification, FireStore etc.


Familiar with knowledge of relational database systems such as PostgreSQL and MySQL.


Familiar with Front-End knowledge: Javascript and HTML/CSS.


Familiar with Agile Process and Scrum Methodologies.


Familiar with Extreme Programming practices: TDD (Test Driven Development), Refactoring, and Continuous Integration.









Who We Are


CodeLink is an innovative and design-focused development agency. We focus on user-centric design and agile development to bring the product vision of our clients to life. We handle the end-to-end development of products, developing the product vision through product understanding, designing experiences through UX design, refining these flows with modern UI design, and developing products through iterative agile development.

We work with both early-stage product teams and teams with existing products from a wide range of countries and industries. We focus on modern technologies and work directly with our clients. We design using design-thinking principles on tools such as Sketch, Figma, Zeplin, and more, and develop products leveraging our tech stack of React, React Native, Rails, Python, and Node.JS.


Our Core Values



1. Take full ownership of delivery

We take ownership of our client projects and ensure that we deliver what we are in charge of to the best possible outcome.


2. Deliver our highest level of quality

We take pride in the high quality that we deliver and work at a sustainable pace to ensure we can always deliver on that quality.


3. Stay consistent in plans and processes

We keep open and transparent communication with our teammates and our client whilst following agile development practices.


4. Have empathy for all those we work with

We show empathy and respect to all those we work with to gain a deeper understanding without any judgment or assumption.


5. Continuously improve and grow

We aim high with a growth mindset and see every day as an opportunity to develop ourselves, our processes, and our products.


Top 3 Reasons To Join Us




Use cutting-edge & proven technologies


Work directly with international clients


Open environment with a focus on learning




Why You’ll Love Working With Us


We work hand-in-hand with our clients to fully invest in their product development and build solutions together for their target market.



We fully invest in our team, we will help you build yourself up in any area you feel you need development, be it in English, learning a new design tool, developing your design thinking, and more. We want to make sure that you’re always learning and developing yourself whilst a part of our team.


We respect both Product and Technology equally, ensuring all of the Products we work on have features with true market potential and ensuring all of the team contribute to, understand, and believe in what they are developing.


We are very selective with our clients, we only work on awesome products we believe in and that show strong market potential.


We respect you and your personal hours, we keep a sustainable pace by working standard 8 hour days from Monday to Friday, ensuring we only plan for what we can achieve.


We are fully agile and only work with Clients who work the same, working with set sprint goals and working at our rate of velocity.


You will have ownership over your role, giving you the opportunity to experiment and try new processes to better improve your day-to-day responsibilities. We are always open to improving our processes.

.

paid out in cash
.

description:
We are looking for an OutSystems developer to join our teams. By this position you help us to put our clients and their customers first but also put an emphasis on enjoying what we do and creating an environment for learning and progress. If you have below passionate, then OutSystems is for you:



Outcome focused, like delivering solutions to clients and learning new tools;


Has the same enthusiasm for building amazing products as we are;


Understand the big picture of a project and also have an attention to detail;



Your key responsibilities will be: 



Attend all meetings with team and customer to clarify and analyse requirements;


Develop and maintain the OutSystems platform following development best practices to ensure quality and security;


Conduct unit testing and execute fixed bugs;



 






You will work under the supervision of an experienced tech lead to design, build, and test collaborative applications that provide business solutions. 

Should you take this opportunity, online training will be provided and you will master OutSystems technology combined with modern software engineering practices for developing innovative web and mobile business applications.



Degree in Computer Science or Engineering and academic achievements valued;


Minimum of 
3 years of professional experience in software development
;


Strong experience in developing web and/or mobile applications;


Proficiency in web-based languages: 
JavaScript
, 
CSS
;


Knowledge of 
C#
 and 
SQL 
languages are a plus;


Flexible and responsive to changing priorities and multiple, concurrent responsibilities;


Drive to collaborate with others and a growth mindset;


Key individual contributor to successful delivery on a large product or project with applied knowledge and participation in full lifecycle development;


Experience with building proofs of concept is a plus;


Have OutSystems certification is a plus;










SUPPORT EACH OTHER cause TOGETHER - STRONGER - 
Here, we are encouraged to aim “OUR TOGETHER SUCCESS”. The company success is from each employee’s success. At TPS, I am always supported by team members and managers to get the best effectiveness in doing work.




ENERGETIC - 
We are inspired to be our best version, not only in work but also in our social life. Energetic is what I would say about the company spirit. Energetic in doing works as well as attending activities.




OPEN-MINDED - 
As a technology company, TPS pursues innovation. We are encouraged to generate more creative ideas and attempt to make it work.




ENTREPRENEURSHIP SPIRIT




Creative – Determined – Innovative – Dynamic


--------------------------------------------------------------------

We always appreciate your being with us, so 





We care about your well-being:
 We provide each of you a Premium Healthcare Insurance package (Inpatient VND 63m/year, Outpatient VND 8m/year and Dental Treatment VND 2m/year). Also, sport clubs (badminton, football, swimming) are available for you every Tuesday, Thursday and Saturday.




We care about your career path
: We want to see you grow your career with us. We provide multiple training sessions for you to gain new knowledge about the latest technology. Besides, we offer annual review for salary adjustment and promotion opportunities

Free snacks & beverages are always available

description:
Position: DevOps Engineer 


SkyLab offers companies and enterprises access to integrated operations control, real time performance insights, advanced networks and data logistics cloud across devices and controllers with a goal to gain insights and drive proactive actions on assets optimization and resource management. This role will work with developers overseas to facilitate better coordination among operations, development, and testing functions by automating and streamlining the integration and deployment processes. 


Responsibilities: 




Participates in architecture and software development activities


Use open-source technologies and tools to accomplish specific tasks encountered within the project


Design and deploy company’s products on public, private and hybrid cloud environments


Troubleshoot production issues to address technical commitments and boost sustainability


Enhance system performance and features on a regular basis for enhanced customer experience


Collaborates with team members to brainstorm about the best way to tackle complex technological infrastructure, security, or development problems


Produce tools to assist the product development teams with applying changes to the production/staging/integration environments









Required:




Ability to construct and maintain network, server, and application


Significant experience with Linux operating system environments


Excellent problem-solving and troubleshooting skills


Knowledge of best practices and IT operations in an always-up, always-available service


Practical cloud experience with Azure and AWS


Practical experience with Docker containerization and Kubernetes


Good knowledge of design patterns, system architecture, and best practices


Good understanding of TCP/IP, UDP, HTTP, SSL/TLS, SSH, SFTP, RTSP, load balancing and DNS


Working knowledge of software development methodologies





Preferred
:



Ability to perform under pressure


Ability to programming in Shell/Perl and Python/Golang


Experience administrating and deploying development CI/CD tools such as Git, Jira or Jenkins


Previous experience with high-performance and high-availability technologies


Enthusiasm for open-source contribution


Passion to improve processes and practices










Competitive package


Professional working environment


Opportunities to challenge and develop your career


Social insurance, health insurance, unemployment insurance as labor law stipulated


Premium Healthcare


Opportunity to participate in stock option program.


Public holiday and Annual leave in accordance with the Vietnamese labour law

description:
You should apply if:




You're passionate about building beautifully crafted software for 5G enabled heterogeneous network product.


You want to build a product you would use yourself and bring your unique insight and perspective to the table as an engineer in shaping our overarching product offering.


You like solving big problems. Their greatest challenges are on the horizon, and they will need experienced, intelligent, hard-working and creative minds to solve foundational infrastructure challenges to run applications across the complex enterprise, cloud and 5G environment.


You value collaboration, autonomy, moving fast and getting lots done. We have no time or interest for bureaucracy and micromanagement — we're moving fast, and you'll be required to take responsibility for delivering end to end to product.


You want to make a huge impact and share in the success of a company you've helped build.





Roles & Responsibilities


Design and Development our innovative network product enables seamless connectivity among various cloud environments, load balancing, network policy that work with cloud orchestration platform.







Minimum Qualifications




1-8 years of professional software development experience in C/C++ or Golang.


Experience with design, develop, and deliver software features and capabilities in an enterprise software platform.


Experience with IP networking(VLAN, TCP, UDP, routing, Iptables, LAN/WAN, VPN), security, distributed systems, and/or system-level programming on Linux or other Unix like systems.


Ability to deliver results in a short time and experience working in fast-paced, high growth tech companies.


Demonstrated abilities to learn quickly, design efficiently, and write quality software code.


Team player that works well in collaborative situations and start-up environments.


Excellent interpersonal skills, verbal, and written communication in English


BS or MS degree in Computer Science, Math, related technical field, or equivalent practical experience.

description:
As a
 Systems Engineer, 
your role will require knowledge of standard IT best practices, policies, and procedures, which include, but are not limited to IT security, computer operations, and change management. The ideal candidate will hold themselves and others to a high bar on providing the first-class service. A technical mindset, and the willingness and ability to explain technical concepts to those who are less technical is essential to this role. Reporting to the Head of DevOps.







Qualification:




2-5 years of experience as a Systems Engineer


2+ Years managing private/public (Azure, AWS) cloud


2+ Years Microservices experience (Docker, Kubernetes, AKS, EKS)


2+ Years on prem/cloud storage experience (NetApp, NFS, CIFS, AFS, CEPH, Multipath)


2+ Cloud Application Management/Configuration (Terraform, Ansible, GitHub, GitLab)


2+ Years managing on prem/cloud AD infrastructure


2+ Years managing hypervisor (ESX VMWare, KVM, QEMU) technology


Knowledge of networking concepts (DNS, TCP/IP, HTTP/HTTPS and firewalls)


Strong scripting/automation experience


Bachelor’s Degree in Engineering, Computer Science or a related field and / or equivalent experience




Technical Requirements:


- Private/Public Cloud



Experience deploying/supporting hybrid infrastructure on-prem private cloud and public cloud (Azure, AWS)


Experience managing/migrating workloads between private/public cloud


Experience with private/public cloud automation.


Experience with cloud automation tools, CI/CD pipeline, container technology


Experience with cloud migration paths for our existing on-premises systems


Develop and implement standards and best practices as it relates to private/public cloud solutions


Ensure compliance with industry and internal standards for hybrid cloud security


Develop and maintain a balanced private/public cloud governance framework based on industry standards



- AD Infrastructure, Hypervisor (Proxmox, QEMU, KVM, VMWare, Xen) experiences are a plus



Knowledge in administering Active Directory (AD) and GPOs, ADFS, Kerberos Authentication an PKI.


Experience in designing, operating, and troubleshooting large scale VMWare deployments.


Experience with VMware 6.x products, including ESXi, vSphere, vCenter, VM


Strong scripting (PowerShell) / automation



- Scripting experience



BASH


Python


Golang


REST/API (must understand concept of using this methodology)


Must be able to write scripts, experience beyond command line required.









Working environment:




Join a young and dynamic team in an international, professional and English-speaking working environment


Apply the latest technology


Working with oversea clients and awesome projects


Open and honest culture where people are valued, treated fairly, trusted and empowered to do great things.




Benefits include:




Laptop and other necessary working tools.


40-hour work per week (Mon-Fri)


Social insurance, health insurance, unemployment insurance as labor law stipulated


Premium Healthcare


Public holiday and Annual leave in accordance with the Vietnamese labor law


Opportunity to participate in Employee Share Options Plan

description:
- Tham gia từ giai đoạn thiết kế đến triển khai sản phẩm của siêu dự án phát triển phần mềm CAD cho khách hàng Nhật Bản. Dự án phần mềm CAD cho khách hàng Nhật Bản là dự án lớn của tập đoàn DTS Japan (top 10 tập đoàn CNTT tại Nhật Bản), với nhiều modules phần mềm khác nhau, từ Windows App, Web App, iOS App… 



- Cơ hội được làm việc trong môi trường chuyên nghiệp, tuân thủ quy trình phát triển phần mềm chuẩn PMS của DTS Japan;



- Được làm việc với các Leaders, Project Manager xuất sắc với hàng chục năm kinh nghiệm tại các công ty phần mềm lớn nhất ở Nhật Bản và Việt Nam với các quy trình quản lý dự án bài bản, chuyên nghiệp.








- Ứng viên có kinh nghiệm từ 1-2 năm về ngôn ngữ C++;



- Ưu tiên ứng viên có kiến thức về xử lý đồ họa 3D, 2D; có kinh nghiệm làm dự án liên quan đến phần mềm CAD, đồ họa;



- Ưu tiên ứng viên có kinh nghiệm làm việc cho công ty/ dự án Nhật.



- Đối với fresher mới ra trường: chấp nhận fresher đã có kinh nghiệm làm thêm.








- Lương thỏa thuận theo năng lực thực tế của ứng viên. Performance review: 1 lần/năm.


- Trợ cấp đi lại, trợ cấp ăn trưa, trợ cấp tiếng Nhật, trợ cấp onsite khi tham gia dự án bên khách hàng...


- 
Thưởng lễ tết, thưởng tháng lương thứ 13, thưởng nhân viên xuất sắc quý, năm, nhân viên tiêu biểu đi du lịch Nhật Bản.

- Nghỉ theo lịch công ty, nghỉ theo lịch khách hàng Nhật, ngoài các ngày nghỉ theo quy định, 1 năm có thêm 2 đợt nghỉ dài.

- Nghỉ tham gia Ngày hội khai giảng cùng con

- Chế độ chăm sóc phụ nữ: Nghỉ sinh lý phụ nữ: 8h/ tháng; Nghỉ sau sinh cho nhân viên nữ có con dưới 1 tuổi: 1h/ngày




Chế độ chăm sóc sức khỏe cho nhân viên:



- Bảo hiểm y tế, bảo hiểm xã hội, bảo hiểm thất nghiệp theo quy định của Luật lao động.

- Bảo hiểm sức khỏe cao cấp cho toàn bộ nhân viên.

- Khám sức khỏe định kỳ hàng năm tại các bệnh viện uy tín (Bệnh viện Thu Cúc, bệnh viện Medlatec…)




Văn phòng làm việc tiện ích:



- Miễn phí trà, coffee tại khu vực ăn uống của công ty.

- Máy pha coffee, máy bán hàng tự động tiện ích ngay tại văn phòng.




Các hoạt động sôi nổi:





- 
Hoạt động team building kết nối đội nhóm hàng quý.



- Các CLB thể thao: bóng đá, bi lắc...


- Hoạt động du lịch thường niên và các sự kiện lớn trong công ty.

description:
For QA Manual Engineer: 




Design, develop and execute functional test cases that ensure the software meets the intended requirements and quality standards.


The engineer shall perform the test activity: generate and send test reports to team lead and project manager and follow up for issue verification and bug resolution.


Work with development team to convert the requirements and design documents into a test plan containing an overview, collection of test cases and test scenarios.


Participate in improving test processes, propose new ideas on how to improve customer satisfaction and quality of product.


Review test cases and scripts created by other team members to ensure that proper test coverage has been developed.


Collaborate with Development and Devops teams to ensure the necessary data/builds/infrastructure are built and available and that test environments are available and functional.


Build tools for automated regression tests. Testing includes both integration and user acceptance testing.


Work with the end users to guide and manage the user acceptance phase of testing.


Research and identify methodologies and tools to improve the software testing process.




For QA Automation Engineer: 




Follow test cases that provide by manual team to develop test scripts.


Oversee the creation and execution of test cases and test scripts.


Guide the automation testing efforts and liaise with leads to ensure any developed QA frameworks are reusable across similar technologies.


Evangelize the QA practice and the QA professionals in the team.


Communicate status, risks and issues to senior management and team members.


Train and coach junior QA engineers and ensure they have a great on-boarding experience.


Ensure the assigned tasks to be performed on-time and with high quality.


Follow the project and organization and regulations




Note:
 Online interview during Covid time.







For QA Manual Engineer:




Knowledge of software development life cycle, Agile, Scrum, Kanban methodologies


Knowledge utilizing test management tools such as Jira/Testrail


Time management, prioritization, and independence as well as keen attention to detail.


Ability to work with cross-functionally with internal and distributed teams.


Experience with Cross-browser and mobile testing.


Any knowledge or experience with test automation tools would be a plus!


Any knowledge or experience with load test tools (Ex: JMeter) would be a plus!


Advance English communication is a plus!
 




For QA Automation Engineer: 




Write and execute manual test cases and then automate them.


Working knowledge about Functional and Non-Functional testing.


Have at least 3 years' experience as QC/QA/Tester.


Have at least 1 year's experience in Automation testing (Selenium, Appium).


Have knowledge of Load testing tool (Ex: JMeter)


Good logical thinking and teamwork skills.


Ability to work with cross-functionally with internal and distributed teams.


Experience with Cross-browser and mobile testing.


Advance English communication is a plus!










Competitive salary and annual salary review based on performance and contribution.


Opportunities to travel to overseas (Japan, Singapore) for training and supporting customers.


Annual health check-ups


Premium health insurance


Laptop provided


Catered lunch


14 days of annual leave


5 days of medical leave

- Thưởng lễ tết, thưởng tháng lương thứ 13, thưởng nhân viên xuất sắc quý, năm, nhân viên tiêu biểu đi du lịch Nhật Bản.

- Nghỉ theo lịch công ty, nghỉ theo lịch khách hàng Nhật, ngoài các ngày nghỉ theo quy định, 1 năm có thêm 2 đợt nghỉ dài.

- Nghỉ tham gia Ngày hội khai giảng cùngcon

- Chế độ chăm sóc phụ nữ: Nghỉ sinh lý phụ nữ: 8h/ tháng; Nghỉ sau sinh cho nhân viên nữ có con dưới 1 tuổi:1h/ngày


Chế độ chăm sóc sức khỏe cho nhân viên:


- Bảo hiểm y tế, bảo hiểm xã hội, bảo hiểm thất nghiệp theo quy định của Luật lao động.

- Bảo hiểm sức khỏe cao cấp cho toàn bộ nhân viên.

- Khám sức khỏe định kỳ hàng năm tại các bệnh viện uy tín (Bệnh viện Thu Cúc, bệnh viện Medlatec…)


Văn phòng làm việc tiện ích:


- Miễn phí trà, coffee tại khu vực ăn uống của công ty.

- Máy pha coffee, máy bán hàng tự động tiện ích ngay tại công ty.


Các hoạt động sôi nổi:



- 
Hoạt động team building kết nối đội nhóm hàng quý.

- Các CLB thể thao: bóng đá, bi lắc, bóng bàn, văn nghệ...

- Hoạt động du lịch thường niên và các sự kiện lớn trong công ty.

Provide subject matter expertise and management oversight to ensure the data platform is architecturally sound, high quality, and compliant.


Develop and implement strategies to integrate data from source systems, operational databases, and external data sources into the data platform.


Work with partners across IT and business units to build and maintain the data infrastructure and advance analytic capabilities.


Lead the department in stakeholder engagement, promoting the adoption of data and analytics capabilities, and managing expectations to achieve high stakeholder satisfaction.


Direct the team in documenting requirements and technical design specifications to ensure the data warehouse meets the current and future needs of the business.










Bachelor's degree in computer science, information systems, or comparable work experience equivalent


3+ years of experience leading data warehouse development teams


8+ years of demonstrated data warehousing & business intelligence experience


Experience with data architecture, metadata, master data management, etc.


Familiarity with business intelligence reporting tools (Tableau, Power BI, SRSS, etc.)


Experience using technologies to foster collaboration (Teams, Slack, JIRA, Confluence, etc.)


Ability to manage business expectations and deliver customer-focused solutions


Strong analytical, organizational skills, and time management skills


Experience translating requirements into pragmatic, implementable solutions


Ability to develop enduring thought-partner relationships with operational leaders.

who can help us become the best digital bank in the world.


We are super passionate about software development and FinTech and have a desire to build the best digital banking apps in the world.
 We want to work with people who share our passion and can help us achieve our goal whilst having some fun along the way. 

We are looking for a highly motivated, self-organising and talented individual who can demonstrate both technical development skills and creative thinking. You will work hands-on as part of the 
application
 
development
 
team 
to enhance our award winning apps, internal systems and new innovative digital banking products. You will be a key member of a team that is obsessed with delivering a world class, dynamic technology platform across multiple data centers.

Your primary job responsibility will be



Build the web application features and internal web tools.


Collaborate with product owners and other developers on building high quality, new features for the platform.


Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs.


Tuning application performance and ensuring security.


Collaborate effectively with other technology teams to build cross-environment Mobile applications using JavaScript based frameworks.


Know how to set up tests and use unit testing frameworks.


Research and try new technologies for future projects (research and development personal time will be provided).


Transform the old web apps which using AngularJS to ReactJs.








You 
must 
be able to demonstrate capability in the following in Live Production environments:



3+ years’ experience in Web development.


Demonstrable experience with the following:


Native JavaScript


Angular JS


Reactjs, Redux, Redux-saga


Responsive Web and Techniques.


Jquery


CSS3, SASS/LESS


Grunt, Webpack.


Experience in working with REST APIs/Web services, Json Data & debugging APIs


Able to write well-structured, maintainable code


Experience with unit tests, test-driven development, code coverage, testing frameworks and refactoring code



Some desirable skills:

Experience or capability in the following areas whilst 
not required 
would be an additional plus for you.



Experience with a cross platform Mobile framework such as Flutter or React Native etc.


Experience using GIT.


Progressive Web Apps


Familiar with Lighthouse


Web Security challenges and techniques


Can communicate well in English.








- Our deliverable is a leading software that is changing the way people do banking. You will be proud of your work and you will share with every body that you helped to build Timo.

We are looking for a highly motivated, self-organising and talented individual who can demonstrate both technical development skills and creative thinking. You will work hands-on as part of the core platform team to develop internet-scale, highly transactional, microservice architectures to support our innovative digital banking products and software systems. You will be a key member of a team that is obsessed with delivering a world class, dynamic technology platform across multiple data centers.

Develop of our highly scalable system, modern microservices based platform.

.

Kiểm tra cơ sở hạ tầng để biết khả năng dễ bị tổn thương và điểm yếu, thực hiện các thay đổi cần thiết để giảm thiểu rủi ro ..









Must to have: 



⏩ Có tối thiểu 2 năm kinh nghiệm làm việc với .NET, C#, ASP.NET CORE , WCF, LinQ, Entity Framework, Restful web service.



⏩ Có kinh nghiệm làm việc với ELK, Redis, Kafka 



⏩ Có kiến ​​thức về Web server & Load balancer: nginx, nghttp2, haproxy, lvs, kong, envoy.



⏩ Có kinh nghiệm triển khai và hỗ trợ nhân rộng / nhân rộng cơ sở dữ liệu. (MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis.)



⏩ Có kinh nghiệm vận hành các website, CDN có lượng truy cập cao ,các hệ thống dữ liệu lớn, nhiều giao dịch đồng thời là một lợi thế



Nive to have:



⏩Monitor: TICK stack, prometheus.



⏩Thái độ làm việc chủ động, cởi mở và hướng tới kết quả



⏩ Sẵn sàng để hỗ trợ ngoài giờ.



﻿⏩ Có kiến thức về Microservices, Docker, Git



⏩ Có kiến thức cơ bản MSSQL Server, Elasticsearch

description:
About Designer Team


Made up of highly specialized UX designers, product designers, UX writers and illustrators, our team craves the mission of crafting stunning designs, but invisible effort and could measurably move our business forward.

We value being immersed in the product we're working with, so our specialists are embedded in different business units but still maintain our design standards by the same design language & tools


Get to know the role


VinShop is a leading application to serve GT (general trade stores in Vietnam) to rocket their small business with competitive price, convenient buying process and compelling opportunities to increase their extra income. Over a year since formation, VinShop has helped over 85,000 GTs and is still on its way to contribute to Vietnam's retail market.

You would be dedicating your effort to creating sensible experience for users from unlocking needs to building pixels, at the same time working closely with Product & Engineering team to ship high quality outputs.


Responsibilities




Understand the full scope of a typical user-centered design process: build low & high fidelity wireframes (UX), create visual design (UI) & prototype design solutions (Interaction Design)


Turn data from market, industry trends, competitive analysis, and user experience research into user insights and make the appropriate trade offs from them


Ensure that quality of implementation meets design requirements


Collaborate and work across functions including design, product, engineering, and data teams to ship high quality products


Collaborate with peers in other design teams and contribute to Design System










Background knowledge or passion about product design, user experience, psychology…


Good eye for visual design and hands-on experience in user interface design.


Familiarity with data and be able to identify problem areas, further map out user journey and break these problems into smaller chunks.


Ability to communicate well with teams to present your design ideas and decisions clearly


Experience in using Figma (or willing to learn new tools if you have not)


A portfolio demonstrating your design skills and collaborative process


An owner’s mindset – don’t shy away from the hard stuff.








Salary & Allowances



Competitive income with lunch allowance, 13 fixed months salary, performance bonus and gift on special occasion.


Annual performance review: twice a year


Annual leave: 15 – 20 days/year, birthday leave and other leaves/public holidays in accordance with the Labor Law of Vietnam


Periodic medical checkup, Health/Social Insurances & Bao Viet Insurance


Be provided with high performance laptop and screen



Career Growth



Opportunity to experience a great workplace where young & world-class talents work together passionately


Opportunity to promptly boost your capability by solving challenging issues of a big tech ecosystem. It’s worth your try.


Very diverse offline and online seminars & workshop provided by company, supervisors, mentors and buddies


Clear and flexible career path


Be sponsored to study online courses and get certification.



Working Environment



Modern and flexible Agile Office fully equipped with gaming, yoga, gym, lunch area, personal locker, open space… No dress code, just shine your way.


Learning culture, initiatives and proactive attitude are strongly encouraged at One Mount


Team building, company trip and monthly internal events

description:

 là công ty công nghệ cung cấp hệ sinh thái số về mua sắm nhà ở và đầu tư Bất động sản, qua đó truyền cảm hứng cho mọi người được sống với những giấc mơ của họ, bắt đầu từ nơi gọi là nhà.


One Mount Real Estate
 là đơn vị đầu tiên tại Việt Nam có năng lực tích hợp toàn bộ quá trình giao dịch BDS trên một nền tảng duy nhất, từ trực tuyến tới trực tiếp (Online-to-Offline), trong đó gồm 2 nền tảng chính:





OneHousing.vn:
 Nền tảng toàn diện giúp khách hàng trải nghiệm hành trình mua nhà đơn giản và xuyên suốt cùng dịch vụ và giải pháp tài chính tốt nhất để đáp ứng nhu cầu ngày càng phát triển của thị trường Bất động sản hiện đại.




App OneHousing Pro Agent:
 Nền tảng công nghệ dành cho chuyên viên tư vấn Bất động sản, là kênh cung cấp, chia sẻ nguồn khách hàng chất lượng và giúp tối ưu hiệu quả công việc.




Mô tả công việc:




Tham gia xây dựng các platforms có khả năng scaling tốt, performance cao, mang lại trải nghiệm tốt cho khách hàng (gồm 9 nền tảng được phát triển từ 2020-2025)


Giải quyết các bài toán về Data Realtime, Recommendation Realtime, AB\ Testing


Thiết kế Domain Driven Design, triển khai Clean code, Unit Test, Deployment và đảm bảo an toàn hệ thống


Hỗ trợ tiếp nhận, phân tích yêu cầu từ các stakeholders cùng Business Analysist Team


Nghiên cứu các công nghệ mới, các best practices trên thế giới và đề xuất ý tưởng cải tiển sản phẩm









Yêu cầu:




Tốt nghiệp Đại học các chuyên ngành Kỹ thuật phần mềm, Toán, Khoa học máy tính....


Có 3+ kinh nghiệm trở lên làm việc với Java Core, Java frameworks (Spring Framework, Spring Boot...)


Có kiến thức và kinh nghiệm làm việc với NoSQL, Relational Database, Microservices Architecture, Software design principles, Unit and functional testing, Git and CI/CD là lợi thế


Có hiểu biết về Software logging and monitoring, UML diagrams (Class/Sequence diagram) là lợi thế


Có kinh nghiệm làm việc với Domain Driven Design, DevOps and Agile principles là lợi thế









Chế độ đãi ngộ:


(i) Lương và Trợ cấp



13 tháng lương cố định, chính sách thưởng cuối năm hấp dẫn theo performance, hỗ trợ ăn trưa và thưởng vào các dịp đặc biệt


Review lương 2 lần 1 năm


Nghỉ phép: 15 - 20 ngày/năm, nghỉ dịp sinh nhật và các ngày nghỉ lễ theo quy định nhà nước


Được mua Bảo hiểm Bảo Việt, khám sức khỏe 1 lần/năm và chế độ bảo hiểm theo quy định nhà nước


Được cấp laptop, màn hình và các thiết bị làm việc hiện đại.



(ii) Cơ hội nghề nghiệp



Trải nghiệm môi trường làm việc trẻ trung, nhiệt huyết, sáng tạo cùng các kỹ sư hàng đầu tại Việt Nam và các kỹ sư từ Google, Amazon, Oracle...


Cơ hội tham gia giải quyết các bài toán đầy thách thức và đóng góp cho sự phát triển của hệ sinh thái số lớn nhất Việt Nam.


Các chương trình đào tạo chuyên môn online & offline phong phú được thực hiện bởi supervisors, mentors, buddies


Được tài trợ chi phí thi chứng chỉ


Cơ hội thăng tiến rõ ràng và linh hoạt



(iii) Môi trường làm việc



Văn phòng Agile hiện đại với nhiều không gian mở và khu vực dùng chung như phòng yoga, gym, gaming, khu vực ăn trưa.... Tủ đồ cá nhân riêng biệt, mở khóa bằng QR Code


Văn hóa học tập, sáng tạo được phát triển mạnh mẽ tại One Mount

description:
We’re looking for an experienced engineer to jump right in and join our high-performance DevOps group. As a team member, you’ll experience software operations and development engineers working together across the entire service lifecycle – from design through the development process to product support. It’s a new way of working that builds on the recognition that there’s one entity standing behind a successful product: the delivery team.

We care about simplicity and we believe the Agile Manifesto is a better way of doing software development. Our everyday practice involves virtualization, containerization, dealing with the Cloud, networking, configuration management systems, deployment automation and much, much more. Co-creation is what we’re all about. 

Join us and get involved!







Essential skills




Strong Linux/Unix administration skills


Software lifecycle management experience


Networking fundamentals (switching, routing, load balancing)


Versioning (Git, GitHub etc.)


Scripting/programming skills (Bash, Python/Ruby, etc.)


Monitoring tools (Grafana, Prometheus, Datadog, etc.)


Experience with relational DBMS (MySQL, PostgreSQL, etc.)


From upper-intermediate written communication and the ability to communicate verbally with the customer (English)


Bachelor’s degree (or equivalent work experience)




DevOps skills




Continuous Integration/Delivery (CircleCi, GitLab CI or Jenkins etc.)


Cloud/virtualization experience (AWS, Docker ecosystem, KVM/XEN, Vagrant etc.)


Cloud orchestration (Terraform, etc.)


Practice experience with AWS (EKS, CloudFront, EC2, S3, kubectl)


Configuration management (Chef, Puppet, Ansible, Salt, etc.)




Bonus skills




NoSQL DB knowledge (Redis, Memcached, MongoDB, Cassandra, etc.)


Understanding of containerization concepts, scheduling and orchestration systems


Understanding of Distributed Systems concepts, High Availability, vertical and horizontal scalability


Log analytics (ELK/EFK stack, Sumologic, Splunk, etc.)


Any other public cloud experience (Google cloud, Azure).










Sign-on bonus (1-month salary) is now applicable for this position;


Flexible working hours with hybrid working policy (remote & office);


Global consulting environment & opportunities to learn and use trending tech stacks through high quality projects;


Impressive salary package;


20 days of paid leaves, 01 Christmas leave and 01 birthday leave;


10 days of paid sick leaves offered by Star;


Latest MacBook Pro & monitor or you can bring your own device, we'll compensate you monthly;


Full social insurance and private healthcare insurance from PVI starting from your probation;


Free English classes and many more to come!

description:
Job purpose


The Omni channel Product owner will unlock the value through the addition of new data-driven capabilities, with a drive towards achieving cross-channel personalization at scale.  This person will shape requirements, prioritize backlogs, sign off user stories and acceptance criteria, communicate with key stakeholders and work day to day with the project team:



Create a backlog of requirements to deliver against an ongoing roadmap of new Omni-channel capabilities and enhancements that improve the owner experience and align with key business goals


Work with the internal and external stakeholder to define the delivery roadmap, business value and prioritize the backlog to ensure we are able to deliver within our global timeframes


Collaborate effectively across the wider delivery & project teams; build strong relationships with IT, delivery partners, PMs, cross-functional Sale, Marketing and business change functions


Maintain a vision each Omni-channel experience, with compelling benefits and communicate that vision to the scrum team and wider stakeholders 


Work with the BA/TA/UX designer and UX researchers in the team to create the full product backlog and ensure all business requirements are met within the User Stories and Epics 


Work with Omni channel teams to deliver Omni-channel experiences end to end 


Provide reporting to line manager of the backlog and project deliverables


Ensure the sprint is protected once sprint goals have been defined and the sprint has started


Regularly evaluate/appraise benefits realization and use to refine overall roadmap & delivery 










The successful candidate will be expected to have strong interpersonal skills, ability to support and engage senior managers, as well as manage and build strong working relationships with key stakeholders across the business.

What you will do




We are a passionate, dedicated and driven engineering team looking for experienced and talented full-stack engineers that can help take our technology stack to the next level


With a focus on user experience, scalability, automation and innovation, we are becoming a data-driven company that is constantly trying to improve our services and strive to create the best possible experience for our customers

description:
- Quản trị Hệ thống máy chủ: Quản lý và lập kế hoạch giám sát cài đặt và bảo trì hệ thống Server.
- Quản trị Hạ tầng mạng: Quản lý, cấu hình, cài đặt và xử lý sự cố hệ thống hạ tầng bao gồm: Hệ thống Core, switch, wifi, đường truyền, tổng đài điện thoại v.v.
- Cài đặt, giám sát hệ thống Email và Dữ liệu. 
- Tham gia Dự án: Lập dự án, theo dõi và thực hiện dự án, báo cáo trực tiếp cho quản lý cấp trên.
- Kiểm soát: Xây dựng và duy trì các giải pháp cho việc giám sát hoạt động hệ thống công nghệ thông tin.
- Phối hợp với IT Team Leader xây dựng những tài liêu quản lý hệ thống và chịu trách nhiệm cập nhật thông tin khi có điều chỉnh hệ thống.
- Thiết lập chiến lược và thiết kế cơ sở hạ tầng:
 + Xây dựng lộ trình để đạt được cơ sở hạ tầng CNTT hiện đại cho tổ chức.
 + Phối hợp và tư vấn cho Công ty về các hoạt động cơ sở hạ tầng và các vấn đề liên quan đến bảo trì hệ thống.
 + Đề xuất cải tiến quy trình, sản phẩm hoặc dịch vụ, tối ưu hóa tài nguyên và tiết kiệm chi phí.
 + Hợp tác với các bên liên quan để xác định các hoạt động cơ sở hạ tầng và các yêu cầu bảo trì để triển khai công nghệ mới.
- Quản lý triển khai và tối ưu hóa cơ sở hạ tầng:
 + Tích hợp các giải pháp với các ứng dụng và nền tảng khác dựa trên các yêu cầu kỹ thuật.
 + Phát triển các cảnh báo và kỹ thuật giám sát mới dựa trên các yêu cầu kỹ thuật.
 + Đề xuất các thay đổi và / hoặc cải tiến để cải thiện tính khả dụng, độ tin cậy và hiệu suất của hệ thống.
- Thiết lập và giám sát các tiêu chuẩn và quản trị:
- Giám sát tính khả dụng và hiệu suất của cơ sở hạ tầng để đảm bảo tuân thủ các qui trình.
- Thỏa thuận mức dịch vụ (SLA).
 + Hỗ trợ phát triển SLA, số liệu và các chỉ số hiệu suất chính.
 + Đảm bảo tuân thủ các yêu cầu bảo mật.

- Phối hợp với IT Team Leader xây dựng những tài liêu quản lý hệ thống và chịu trách nhiệm cập nhật thông tin khi có điều chỉnh hệ thống






- Ít nhất 2 năm kinh nghiệm làm việc ở vị trí tương đương

- Khả năng lập kế hoạch

- Khả năng phân tích và xử lý lỗi phát sinh từ hệ thống và người dùng

- Kỹ năng cộng tác và làm việc đội nhóm cùng các phòng ban khác

- Sáng kiến và đề xuất các giải pháp cho các ứng dụng CNTT của công ty

- Cẩn thận, chi tiết

- Khả năng làm việc dưới áp lực cao.







CÔNG BẰNG & TRÁCH NHIỆM


Tại GreenFeed Việt Nam, chúng tôi luôn tôn trọng sự thẳng thắn, rõ ràng, minh bạch, không né tránh trước các sai lầm và yếu kém. Do đó, các cấp quản lý luôn nâng đỡ, có trách nhiệm giao việc rõ ràng tạo nền tảng để nhân viên thành công. Chính sách này thể hiện sự tôn trọng của GreenFeed Việt Nam đối với nghề nghiệp, cuộc sống, gia đình của mỗi nhân viên, đảm bảo nhân viên có thể an tâm phát triển sự nghiệp, cống hiến cùng Công ty để tiếp tục tạo ra và chia sẻ những giá trị mới.

description:
- Tìm hiểu và nắm bắt quy trình hoạt động của các phòng ban để hỗ trợ, cung cấp các công cụ, biểu mẫu, ứng dụng đáp ứng nhu cầu công việc.


- Điều phối, kết hợp với IT Security Manager và IT Infrastructure Manager thực hiện yêu cầu của IT Director và P.TGĐ CNTT.


- Lập quy trình, tài liệu hỗ trợ kỹ thuật cho các dự án CNTT và cho người sử dụng.


- Huấn luyện kỹ thuật, lên kế hoạch đào tạo kỹ năng cho IT Speacialist & Senior IT Speacialist.


- Theo dõi tiến trình thực thi công việc, các dự án của phòng CNTT.


- Lập biểu mẫu thống kê, báo cáo công việc của phòng CNTT theo yêu cầu của trưởng bộ phận.


- Xây dựng chiến lược cho các thỏa thuận mức dịch vụ (SLA) và các thỏa thuận cải tiến:


- Giám sát bảng điều khiển mức dịch vụ để đảm bảo các OKR tuân thủ.


- Quản lý và tối ưu hóa các hoạt động CNTT và hỗ trợ hiệu suất:


- Giám sát các kế hoạch giải quyết sự cố 


- Giám sát cơ sở dữ liệu và quản trị hệ thống:


 







- Tốt nghiệp đại học CNTT chuyên ngành Mạng máy tính,có các chứng chỉ như : CCNA, MCSE..

-  Có ít nhất 2 năm kinh nghiệm ở vị trí tương đương

-  Kiến thức hệ thống Phần Cứng (Hardware), Hệ thống Mạng ( Network System, LAN, WAN...), Cách thiết bị định tuyến và bảo mật (Router, Switching, Firewall…), Internet - Web, Hệ điều hành ( OS System), Các phần mềm ứng dụng (Software Application..), Cơ sở dữ liệu (Database), Email, Antivirus, Hệ thống Lưu trữ và Phục hồi dữ liệu, Server - Workstation....

- Kiến thức về các thiết bị văn phòng và các thiết bị ngoại vi CNTT

description:
Work on Internet scale public facing responsive web applications, where performance, reliability and scalability, are critical design goals


Coordinate with other application developers, frontend developers and UX designers to support that required features and modifications


You will design and write high-performance, modular and reusable code for server side components and maintain code quality and unit testing


Mentor and Coach junior colleagues in building clean codes


Stay abreast of new technologies for server side development


Decomposing software requirements and turning it into more understandable and manageable pieces.

Java 7,8,11
 and proficient with functional interfaces and lambda expressions

Java Spring Boot

Spring Security (JWT)




Must have hands on experience in building 
RESTFUL APIs 
and understanding of the REST architecture constraints

Microservice architecture
, and some hands-on experience in Microservice projects using REST API and Message queue

unit test
 using a framework such as Junit, Mockito, …

English
 from intermediate level (at least 700 Toeic or equivalent)

Experience in Marven build, or Gradle build


Experience in SQL query, and Relational databases such as MySQL, MS SQL, Oracle, …


Experience in CI/CD tools (Git, Jenkins, JIRA)










Opportunity to be on-site in Korea in 3 months in 2022


Attractive package including base salary + 13th month salary + Performance Bonus


Insurance based on full base salary and Medical Benefit (Bao Viet Insurance Package) for Employee and Family


Meal allowance 730,000/month


100% of full salary and benefits as an official employee from the 1st day of working


Working in a fast paced, flexible, and multinational working environment with opportunity to travel onsite (in 49 countries)


Internal Training (Technical & Functional & English)


Working with outstanding colleagues coming from top universities and top companies in Vietnam and foreign countries


Update skills to world standard

description:
Designs, develops, modifies, configures, debugs and evaluates jobs for extracting transaction data from SAP ECC and SAP S4/HAHA to AWS Data Warehouse


Collects metadata about reporting jobs including data lineage and transformation logic. Works with teams, clients, data owners, and leadership throughout the development cycle practicing continuous improvement and support.


Perform processes, methods, tools, and systems/data analysis and promote best practices found in working with Reporting team.


Work closely with members, other teams on issues related to Data Design and Data Requirements.


Assist Head of BI Development on Ad-hoc requests.


Create and update related data documents.


Do the as-is analysis of the data warehouse and create to-be model solutions



Train and Manage Junior team members;





 








Minimum 3 years of experience in SAP ERP technical, SAP ABAPer


Fully aware of SAP NetWeaver tools


Experience on SAP ERP implementation projects; SAP ABAP Developer


Good working experience in SQL and SAP HANA DB; monitoring and troubleshooting, tuning performance


Working knowledge of SAP ECC and S/4 HANA Master data required


Good experience in SAP inbound and outbound interfaces


Good knowledge in Data Lake / Data Warehouse and Data Dimensional Models.


Good knowledge in BI Tools and BI Reports


Knowledge on Cloud Data Warehouse (Amazon RedShift; Google BigQuery,..) is an advantage


Time management


Ability to work under high pressure, multiple tasks


Good in English communications skills


University Degree in Computer Science or Information Technology


Higher Degree in Data Science or equivalent is preferable









CÔNG BẰNG & TRÁCH NHIỆM


Tại GreenFeed Việt Nam, chúng tôi luôn tôn trọng sự thẳng thắn, rõ ràng, minh bạch, không né tránh trước các sai lầm và yếu kém. Do đó, các cấp quản lý luôn nâng đỡ, có trách nhiệm giao việc rõ ràng tạo nền tảng để nhân viên thành công. Đặt niềm tin, đối xử dựa trên năng lực hành việc làm việc và kết quả một cách công bằng nhất.

GreenFeed Việt Nam luôn tìm kiếm những cá nhân độc lập và khác biệt đảm bảo các yêu cầu cơ bản: trung thực, tự tin, nhiệt huyết, thực thi, kiên quyết, cầu tiến, đồng lòng, đồng đội và can đảm. Ngoài ra, các cấp lãnh đạo và quản lý luôn tôn trọng và tạo sự tin tưởng, nâng đỡ nhân viên phát triển và thành công với tâm thế thẳng thắn, trách nhiệm và công bằng. Tạo môi trường lành mạnh, rõ ràng và minh bạch. Đây là các giá trị cốt lõi mà công ty đã và đang hướng đến.


MÔI TRƯỜNG LÀM VIỆC


Không gian làm việc GreenFeed Việt Nam là một không gian mở, thúc đẩy sự sáng tạo. Đồng thời, tất cả các thành viên đều được khuyến khích đóng góp ý kiến, chia sẻ và tranh luận một cách thẳng thắn để thắt chặt tình đồng đội và rèn luyện bản lĩnh của mỗi người.

description:
We are looking for an iOS developer responsible for the development and maintenance of applications aimed at a range of iOS devices including mobile phones and tablet computers. Your primary focus will be development of iOS applications and their integration with back-end services. You will be working alongside other engineers and developers working on different layers of the infrastructure. Therefore, a commitment to collaborative problem solving, sophisticated design, and the creation of quality products is essential.


Responsibilities




Design and build applications for the iOS platform


Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications


Collaborate with a team to define, design, and ship new features


Identify and correct bottlenecks and fix bugs


Help maintain code quality, organization, and automatization










Proficient with Objective-C or Swift, and Cocoa Touch


Experience with Carthage


Experience with offline storage, threading, and performance tuning


Familiarity with RESTful APIs to connect iOS applications to back-end services


Knowledge of other web technologies and UI/UX standards


Understanding of Apple’s design principles and interface guidelines


Knowledge of low-level C-based libraries is preferred


Experience with performance and memory tuning with tools such as Instruments and Shark


Familiarity with cloud message APIs and push notifications


Knack for benchmarking and optimization


Proficient understanding of code versioning tools such as Git or SVN


Familiarity with continuous integration










Attractive package including base salary + 13th month salary + Performance Bonus


Multinational projects and colleagues


Insurance based on full base salary


Meal allowance 730,000/month


100% of full salary and benefits as an official employee from the 1st day of working
