description:
Phát triển hợp đồng thông minh Ethereum trong Solidity


Phát triển lại ví của sàn giao dịch tiền điện tử hiện tại hỗ trợ mạng lưới đồng tiền Ethereum, Bitcoin, EOS.


Tạo và thử nghiệm các ứng dụng Tài chính phi tập trung (Defi) hướng tới khách hàng


Phát triển Blockchain Network











Có ít nhất 1 năm kinh nghiệm về blockchain (Ethereum, EOS, Solidity...)



Code Golang, Java hoặc Python


Có kinh nghiệm về mật mã cơ bản như chữ ký điện tử, mã hóa dựa trên khóa đối xứng hoặc bất đối xứng, thỏa thuận khóa, v.v.


Có thể giải thích các thuật toán đồng thuận như Raft hoặc Paxos, PBFT


Có kiến ​​thức và hiểu biết tốt về Javascript, Python, Java, Node.JS.


Hiểu biết về công nghệ blockchain, đặc biệt là Ethereum, Bitcoin, EOS


Hiểu biết về Tài chính phi tập trung (Defi), Nền tảng trao đổi tiền điện tử


Có kinh nghiệm phát triển các hợp đồng thông minh Ethereum được viết bằng các ngôn ngữ lập trình khác nhau như Pathon, Javascript và Solidity


Có kinh nghiệm trong việc phát triển các dapp giao tiếp với chuỗi khối Ethereum


Có kinh nghiệm làm việc với Crypto Exchange là một lợi thế


Năng lực làm việc nhóm, tinh thần trách nhiệm, có tính chủ động và giao tiếp











Lương upto $3000



Phỏng vấn online trong thời gian dịch bệnh


Ứng viên được làm việc trong môi trường Startup năng động, sáng tạo, nhiều cơ hội để phát triển bản thân


Được tiếp cận và làm việc những công nghệ mới như: AI, Big Data, Machine Learning, IoT.


Có cơ hội tham gia các cuộc thi khởi nghiệp, Hackathon, gặp gỡ giao lưu với các quỹ đầu tư trong nước và quốc tế.


Được hưởng đầy đủ các chính sách BHXH, BHYT, BHTN.


Được hưởng lương tháng 13


Du lịch hằng năm cùng công ty, các hoạt động teambuilding.

description:
The Senior Java Developers will join a global-scale product of our partner

 GoodData www.gooddata.com 
-
 a leading US company which provides a massively scalable, secure & high-performance Insights Platform-as-a-Service for 70,000 businesses, over a million users. Our products are trusted by the Fortune 500 companies. By joining the project, you will have a chance working in a professional work environment with processes delivering features from inception to full lifecycle in a modern CI/CD pipeline. 




Contribute deeply to the architecture, design and implement Java-based enterprise applications.


Develop new features in a stable system with important factors such as security, scalability and performance. Develop and maintain Services internal tools.


Collaboration on customer facing implementations. Troubleshoot and fix customer security issues.


Be able to learn new technologies and environments. Learn and develop your coding skills as well as professional style in open-minded and international work culture.


Work in an agile environment, with cooperation and active communication within an autonomous team. Be involved in all stages of development lifecycle (architecture, coding, QA, delivery, etc.)









Required Qualifications:




3+ years experience in software development: product specification, design, implementation, testing, release, and maintenance.


Strong development experience with Java, Spring and willing to learn other programming languages (Ruby, etc.)


Hands-on experience in relational database design, transactional SQL and DBMS (Vertica, PostgreSQL, Oracle, MySQL, MSSQL, etc).


Knowledge of Web Services, REST




Advantage Qualifications:




Hands-on programming experience with Spring framework, Ruby, shell scripting (Python/ Bash).


Experience with Unix environments


Experience in REST API design, distributed systems, enterprise application, cloud based solutions.


Experience with CI/CD Jenkins, Docker containers, Splunk and GIT.


Experience in handling application security vulnerabilities.


Experience protecting applications against security vulnerabilities.


Hands-on experience in networking, preferably in cloud based environment (OpenStack private cloud).


Good English communication is a plus.




Skills:




Analytical, problem solving abilities are your strengths.


Eagerness to maintain and further develop existing tools


Experience working on multitasking and prioritizing.


Able to work independently and collaboratively.


Know how to make decisions, explanation and presentation.


Ability/willingness to participate in Ops.

In addition to base salary, we recognise our outstanding performers through various incentive arrangements that apply across the business. It's our way of saying thank you for consistently being driven and positive.

description:
Looking for a strong, outstanding, persistent Sr QA Automation Engineer to work for our partner - GoodData www.gooddata.com - a US company which provides a massively scalable, secure & high-performance Insights Platform-as-a-Service for 70,000 businesses, over a million users.





According to Forrester, insights-driven businesses will steal $1.2 Trillion/year from traditional market players by 2020. This is the transformation GoodData is enabling globally.





By joining us, you won’t just grow your career, enjoy the life of a developer in LHV professional work environment. You’ll be part of a movement that is changing how people live, work and make decisions.




As a Sr. Automation Engineer , you will be involved in developing, optimizing the testing framework, design automation tests script. You are primarily focusing on automation for running the tests quickly and repeatedly. You will collaborate with the Development team, QA teams to understand the platform architecture, in order to integrate the automaton tests for their services effectively.





Understand QA processes and systems for safe code delivery. Install, configure and maintain the software test environment.




Develop and maintain the automation test framework, tooling, test services, data analytic project for QA (dashboards, test results)




Design, implement and execute automated tests including functional, contract, performance, load and longevity tests.




Performs maintenance and operational tasks (reconfigurating, updating, monitoring) on test environments (performance and pre-production clusters).




Works with development teams to speed up testing and delivery, reproduce and resolve problems.




Design, develop and execute test cases on component/integration and end to end level to ensure product quality. Write and maintain clear, precise bug reports to submit to the bug tracking system.




Communicate - Talk to Engineers, Manager and Ops daily. Work with development teams to reproduce and resolve problems. 




Analyze defects and test results to be able to deduct the chain of events leading to a failure.




Be able to create, compose and sharing knowledge cross the QA team  










Required

 Qualifications:





5+ years experience in software development or automation testing experience.




Strong development experience with Java, Selenium, Kotlin, Scala




Experience on design/implement Automation Test framework and CI/CD integrations




Nice to have experience on Cypress/TestCafe/Arquillian Graphene Test and other Automation open source tools 




Hand-on experience with Unit Testing in various frameworks like TestNG, JUnit, Selenium WebDriver.




Good understanding of software development methodologies and quality processes.




Good understanding of relational database design and transactional SQL and DBMS (Oracle, MSSQL).





Advantage Qualifications:





Hands-on programming experience with REST API design, distributed systems, enterprise application, cloud based solutions.




Experienced with performance and load testing.




Experience with CI/CD Jenkins, Docker containers, Splunk and GIT and Linux Systems





Skills:





Testing, analytical, problem solving abilities are your strengths. 




Experience working on multitasking and prioritizing.




Able to work independently, collaboratively and less guidance.




Know how to make decisions, explain and present.




Be active and willing to learn and adapt to new technologies.









1. Learning & Development

We provide opportunities for you to develop within our organisation. We design training programs that meet your needs and organisation's need. We also contribute cost to English and IT courses/certificates.

2. Pleasure Environment

We create friendly working environment with flexible working time and competitive salary. You can attend various team building activities, such as, party, sport, picnic, etc. with cost contribution from organisation.

In addition to base salary, we recognise our outstanding performers through various incentive arrangements that apply across the business. It's our way of saying thank you for consistently being driven and positive.

description:
We are looking for web project managers for ecommerce projects (Magento). He should be fluent in English and can communicate with both customers and his/her team. He or she should be able to ensure a successful project delivery to our customer within pre-agreed time frames while maintaining a great team atmosphere.
Responsibilities
- Managing full e-commerce projects from business requirements to roll-out and validation by the customer
- Creating and editing customer documents such as functional specifications for customers, technical specifications for developers, UAT testing plan
- Adherence to programming and testing standards, accuracy and creativity in finding efficient solutions to given requirements
- Taking ownership for the quality of the projects, managing the quality control test team and validating the delivery of the project
- Communication with customer including kick-off meeting, specifications validation, follow-up meetings during projects, UAT validation and support.






- At least two years experience as the Project manager or Business Analyst
- Experience in managing a team
- Experienced in E-commerce is a plus
- Strict dedication to delivering projects within deadlines while adhering to established quality and documentation standards
- A good team player with excellent communication and interpersonal skills
- Good spoken English is a requirement.






• Opportunity to become the qualified developers/project managers in one of the well – known e-commerce solutions providers for international outsourcing projects from Europe, US, China, Hong Kong, etc

• Opportunity to obtain the international certification on e-commerce (Magento/Salesforce Certitficate)

• Friendly, young & dynamic working environment with many activities like football team, birthday party, happpy hours, company activites, company trips...

• Full package of insurance and 13th month at the end of the year.

• Salary is reviewed twice per year based on performance

Lên plan test, viết test case, test design


Thực hiện test manual


Phân tích kết quả kiểm thử và viết báo cáo


Thực hiện các yêu cầu khác từ leader










Tốt nghiệp chuyên ngành IT.


Có ít nhất 1- 2 năm kinh nghiệm test manual về web


Am hiểu internet, các ứng dụng trên internet, các phần mềm và tool thực hiện test.


Có kiến thức tốt về qui trình kiểm thử và kỹ thuật kiểm thử.

Có thể xử lý nhiều nhiệm vụ trong nhiều dự án cùng một lúc


Có khả năng thích ứng với quy trình làm việc mới


Cẩn thận, tỉ mỉ, có tổ chức cao và thái độ học hỏi tự giác

JV-IT TECHS áp dụng chế độ làm việc từ bất kỳ nơi nào (work from home full time)

Chương trình tích điểm (từ việc đi làm đúng giờ, hoặc thưởng điểm relase thành công…) dùng điểm này đổi các đồ ăn thức uống và các nhu yếu phẩm cho cuộc sống.


Có phòng relax: ăn uống, nghỉ ngơi, hít xà đơn, đánh bóng bàn….

Được training những kỹ thuật mới & khó khi bắt đầu tham gia làm việc tại công ty.

Không gian làm việc xanh-sạch-năng động cùng trang thiết bị làm việc luôn được cập nhật mới nhất.

description:
You will work on our local and cloud infrastructure hosting our Magento development servers, the supporting tools, and our internal management applications.You will have to make sure that the developers are always in the position to develop and have good performance while working.After that you will have to coordinate with all stake holders to make sure the infra is secure, up to date, and performant enough.


Responsibilities:




Be responsible of the IT infrastructure of the company (workstation, servers, network)


Manage the local admin of your team


Manage the evolution of the infrastructure


Manage the requirements for the systems over time


Oversee the changes to serve the projects


Manage the relationship with other parties and services


Help investigate performance issues, and offer concrete solutions


Work with development teams to assess and implement technology (ElasticSearch, MySQL, Redis, Varnish, RabbitMQ, CDN…).


Define a reference configuration for each service (web server, DB server, cache, OS settings...), based on the technical documentation and industry best practices, and continuously improve it based on experience


Automate and manage the deployment processes using CI/CD techniques.


Monitor and ensure that the system infrastructure is up and running at all times.


Manage servers, applications, and all internal software used by the company.


Document, update and check the configuration of the system infrastructureYou will work on our local and cloud infrastructure hosting our Magento development servers, the supporting tools, and our internal management applications.



 







Qualities required:




Willingness to learn and apply new ideas


Methodology, drive to progress / work on incremental performance optimization


Proactivity in the work (not just waiting for issues to happen).


Leadership skills


Ability to drive meetings with stakeholders and managers


Habit of documenting actions, willingness to improve the team by training others


Good communication (with developers, hosting partners, managers) in English and Vietnamese, French language would be a plus




Technical skills:




Deep understanding of web architecture (Web/DB server, firewall, load balancer, DNS, CDN, …)


Strong command of Linux, Apache / NginX, MySQL, PHP stack.


Good knowledge of virtualization (containers/VM) and cloud


Familiar with (one or more) Jenkins, Docker, Ansible, Fabric is an advantage








• Opportunity to become the qualified developers/project managers in one of the well – known e-commerce solutions providers for international outsourcing projects from Europe, US, China, Hong Kong, etc

• Opportunity to obtain the international certification on e-commerce (Magento/Demandware/Hybris Certitficate)

• Friendly, young & dynamic working environment with many activities like football team, birthday party, happpy hours, company activites, company trips...

• Full package of insurance and 13th month bonus at the end of the year.

• Salary is reviewed twice per year based on performance

description:
Tham gia phát triển ứng dụng trên nền tảng PHP cho khách hàng Nhật Bản.


Bảo trì, phát triển chức năng các ứng dụng sẵn có.


Tham gia các khóa đào tạo của công ty.










Có ít nhất 1 năm kinh nghiệm trở lên về phát triển Web.


Có kinh nghiệm làm việc với framework Laravel hoặc CakePHP,...


Có kinh nghiệm làm việc với VueJS, ReactJS là 1 lợi thế.


Ưu tiên ứng viên yêu thích kỹ thuật hoặc mong muốn phát triển hơn trong tương lai.








 



Thời gian làm việc: Từ thứ Hai đến thứ Sáu: 08h – 17h00; 7,5 tiếng/ngày.


100% mức lương thử việc


Thường xuyên có Workshop đào tạo những kiến thức theo yêu cầu từ nhân viên, lớp WS do các Leader, PM, CTO hoặc các giảng viên nổi tiếng trong lĩnh vực về giảng dạy.


JV-IT TECHS áp dụng chế độ làm việc từ bất kỳ nơi nào (work from home full time)


Chế độ lương - thưởng: Mức lương cạnh tranh & hấp dẫn, Lương tháng 13.


Đánh giá năng lực, xem xét điều chỉnh lương 2 lần 1 năm.

Phép thâm niên và thưởng cho nhân viên làm việc từ 3 năm tại công ty.


Chương trình tích điểm (từ việc đi làm đúng giờ, hoặc thưởng điểm relase thành công…) dùng điểm này đổi các đồ ăn thức uống và các nhu yếu phẩm cho cuộc sống.


Có phòng relax: ăn uống, nghỉ ngơi, hít xà đơn, đánh bóng bàn….

Được training những kỹ thuật mới & khó khi bắt đầu tham gia làm việc tại công ty.


Cơ hội thăng tiến hấp dẫn và sẽ được làm việc trực tiếp với kỹ sư Nhật Bản, được học hỏi cách làm việc chuyên nghiệp sản xuất sản phẩm chất lượng cao của Nhật.


Không gian làm việc xanh-sạch-năng động cùng trang thiết bị làm việc luôn được cập nhật mới nhất.

Có phòng relax: ăn uống, nghỉ ngơi, hít xà đơn, đánh bóng bàn….


Tham gia các hoạt động tập thể sôi động của Công ty: Company trip, Team Building, Year end party, Party team hàng tháng đi ăn nhậu với nhau (được công ty hỗ trợ.)


Mỗi tháng có meeting tổng kết kinh doanh, ăn uống, giao lưu với nhân viên mới.


Ngoài ra có: 20/10; 8/3; trung thu, quà sinh nhật ...


Môi trường làm việc OPEN, sẵn sàng đón nhận ý kiến từ tất cả nhân viên, thân thiện, năng động, đa dạng và thăng tiến.


Được training những kỹ thuật mới & khó khi bắt đầu tham gia làm việc tại công ty.


Cơ hội thăng tiến hấp dẫn và sẽ được làm việc trực tiếp với kỹ sư Nhật Bản, được học hỏi cách làm việc chuyên nghiệp sản xuất sản phẩm chất lượng cao của Nhật.


Không gian làm việc xanh-sạch-năng động cùng trang thiết bị làm việc luôn được cập nhật mới nhất.

description:
Chúng tôi đang xây dựng SOFTWARE PRODUCT STUDIO Quốc tế Lớn nhất Khu vực, với 1000 thành viên (trong ~ 5 năm tới). Chúng tôi có sứ mệnh đưa các Ý TƯỞNG VÀ SÁNG TẠO đến với cuộc sống thông qua XÂY DỰNG CÁC SẢN PHẨM CÔNG NGHỆ TUYỆT VỜI cùng với các khách hàng và đối tác trên toàn cầu.

Chúng tôi đang cần tuyển UI UX Designer

Nếu bạn muốn góp phần Xây dựng một Công ty Công nghệ lớn, hãy Tham gia cùng chúng tôi.



Bạn sẽ Tham gia làm việc trực tiếp vào quá trình phát triển sản phẩm, thiết kế UI/UX cho App, Website, System và các sản phẩm khác theo tiêu chí thân thiện với người dùng.


Trao đổi ý tưởng, xây dựng quy trình thiết kế nhằm đảm bảo tính thẩm mỹ và logic thông qua storyboards, sitemaps, wireframes, flowcharts, prototypes…


Trở thành một nhân tố cùng công ty hoàn thành Vision: Xây dựng SOFTWARE PRODUCT STUDIO Quốc tế Lớn nhất Khu vực.


Đưa các ý tưởng và sáng tạo đến với cuộc sống thông qua xây dựng các sản phẩm công nghệ cao cùng với các khách hàng và đối tác trên toàn cầu.



 








Từ 1.5 năm kinh nghiệm thiết kế UI/UX, bao gồm việc thiết kế xuyên suốt ít nhất 1 sản phẩm từ đầu (từ concept) cho đến lúc đến tay người dùng.


Có khả năng sáng tạo và cải tiến, biết chuyển đổi nhu cầu kinh doanh thành các giải pháp hiệu quả, khả thi trên sản phẩm.


Ham học hỏi, thường xuyên cập nhật các xu hướng UI/UX hiện hành.


Thành thạo Google Material Design, Card Design, Cross Platform Design.


Thành thạo Sketch, có kiến thức tốt về InVision, Flinto/Principle, UXPin, Photoshop, Illustrator là lợi thế


Có thể giao tiếp Tiếng Anh là một điểm cộng











Nhận mức lương hấp dẫn lên đến 1500$ (Offer theo năng lực)



Làm việc trong môi trường năng động, đội ngũ nhân viên trẻ nhiệt huyết,


Quản lý Support kịp thời và hướng dẫn tận tình.


Lương tháng 13, Thưởng dự án theo quý (Package 14-15 tháng lương/năm)



Thử việc hưởng 100% lương




Đánh giá tăng lương 2 lần/năm



Làm việc 5 ngày 1 tuần, nghỉ thứ 7, chủ nhật




Mô hình hoạt động theo cơ chế Division:




Tự chủ điều hành các dự án theo mục tiêu KPIs được giao: Doanh thu, lợi nhuận, chi phí.


Chủ động giao tiếp và tạo mối quan hệ tốt với khách hàng,


Division phát huy được năng lực chuyên môn và Quản lý một cách cao nhất.


Lộ trình phát triển rõ ràng cho từng vị trí trong các Division.

description:
At Tiki, we believe in growing a sustainable business with strong fundamentals. It means acquiring new customers not just based on promotion but also on excellent customer service while maintaining an optimal spending. In the backend, it means aiming for efficiency and optimization in Fulfillment and Supply Chain. Together with a strong operation team, solid IT solutions is a key to enable all of that. It helps Tiki to survive and grow fast in a tough market like Vietnamese e-commerce.

As a member of Operation Product team, you will work on various solutions that manage our entire fleet of warehouses (inventory management, order fulfillment) and logistics network (including our own Tiki Delivery team – key enabler for initiative such as TikiNow). At the same time, we also support our Finance & Accounting team to record, track and optimize the company cash flow.

In more details, you will:



Work with Product Owner to understand the requirement and build the product within aligned timeline


Work with QC team to deliver bug-free product and also contribute for automation testing


Provide last-tier support for assigned product lines



We have a strong team with diversified background and a keen interest on being the best in e-commerce. You will gain more domain knowledge in what probably is one of the hottest IT sectors right now and have chances to encounter and solve challenging problems at large scale (think of millions of orders, millions of customers and a magnitude more of data in our backend system).








For Junior:


• Experience with one of Python, Java, Golang.
• Understanding of RESTful API and SQL databases
• Ability to write well-documented, clean-code.
• Experience with Microservices, Continuous Integration/ Delivery (CI/CD) is a plus.
• Problem-solving skill and customer-oriented.



For Senior:


• Strong programming experience with one of Python, Java, Golang.
• Knowledge about RESTful API and databases as MySQL, PostgreSQL, Redis.IO, Elasticsearch…
• Ability to write well-documented, clean-code.
• Knowledge in Microservices, Continuous Integration/ Delivery (CI/CD) is an advantage.
• Understanding of system design and tuning for high performance, scalability and reliability.
• Customer-oriented and have a high bar of quality.
• Strong problem-solving skill.







Inside our engineering team:




We iterate constantly. There's no such thing as the best version of anything, just a constant streams of improvements and tests.


We move fast, really fast. Major changes can be executed in a few days, many times just a few hours.


We have a data-informed mindset. We try to use data to inform our decision as much as possible.


We are independent. Most of the time, your team will not need technical assistance from other teams.


We take risks. We're not afraid to challenge "best practices".




Our attractive offers include: 




Open communication with passionate and experienced members.


Challenging working environment.


Easy access to the library with tons of startup, product, UX, coding... books.


Private healthcare insurance.


Annual health check-ups.


Special internal programs for Tikiers when shopping on Tiki.vn (free ship TikiNow service, discount...).


Internal events to bond our mutual understanding & spirit such as team building, team outing, Tiki's birthday, year-end party...


New & beautiful office with a pantry room (with bar), entertainment & gymnastic equipment, yoga rooms, a library and an open space facilitating cross-department communication.


Competitive salary and performance review, 13th-month pay and bonus based on performance.

description:
At TikiNOW Smart Logistics (TNSL), we believe in growing a sustainable business with strong fundamentals, desire to bring the best shopping and service experience to customers. This is the reason why the development team of TNSL Transportation always works with passion and enthusiasm.

As a member, you will gain more knowledge and experiences on how an E-commerce system operates; have the opportunities to challenge yourself by solving problems in a system where millions of orders are sold and delivered to customers. Moreover supporting the Tiki Express Delivery (TED) team to deliver products to customers in the fastest and most dedicated way.


Description


- Plan and prioritize product feature backlog and development for the product
- Define feature road-map and growth opportunities.
- Provide backlog management, iteration planning, and elaboration of the user stories.
- Work closely with EM/PM to create and maintain a product backlog according to business value or ROI.
- Play an active role in mitigating impediments impacting successful team completion of Release/Sprint Goals.
- Research and analyze the market, the users, and the roadmap for the product components.
- Follow our competitors and the industry.
- Keep abreast with Agile/Scrum best practices and new trends.


 







- Minimum 2 years being as Product Owner or Business Analyst in tech product-based companies and/or software development companies


- Good knowledge of UI/UX.


- Experience across both qualitative and quantitative research.


- Familiar with Agile process and principles.


- Fluent in English


- Good communication, presentation skills.


- Good organizational and time management skills.


- Sharp analytical and problem-solving skills.


- Attention to details.


- Experience in e-commerce/logistic Transportation is a big plus.








Inside our engineering team:




We iterate constantly. There's no such thing as the best version of anything, just a constant streams of improvements and tests.

description:
Your role


The Analytics Product Owner will have overall responsibility for the delivery of our Vincere Intelligence product, including Self Serve BI solutions. It’s a critical module for the Vincere platform, providing our customers with a single source of truth and the final element of a fully automated end to end service offering.

The ideal candidate has a knack for seeing solutions in sprawling data sets and the business mindset to convert insights into strategic opportunities for our company. The Analytics Product Owner will work closely with internal developers, leaders across product, as well as customer success, sales, and marketing to support and implement high-quality, data-driven decisions. The right person for the job will apply their exhaustive knowledge of data analysis to solving real-world problems faced by our recruitment customers and finding opportunities for improvement across multiple projects, teams and business units.

Acting as the point of accountability you’ll need to bring context to the team and educate them in regard to analytics, implementation and assist the broader Vincere group in critical solutions. You’ll need to develop a deep technical understanding of the existing data platforms and become an active consumer of the system.


Your responsibility




Act as the primary point of contact throughout the customer lifecycle, including both pre & post-sales project scoping, testing requirements, and implementation requirements.


Work with a team of internal developers, and work closely with external vendors for the delivery of new application capabilities, maintenance and support.


Work with Functional Team Members to finalize the scope of works (task/tickets).


Ensure the requirement workflow is conducted effectively.


Write up the functional specification including flows etc MindMeister, Figma, Jira, Confluence or similar apps.


Process requirements to build out user stories and maintain a well-groomed backlog.


Maintain requirement traceability, linkage between user story - Functional Spec - Business requirement.


Conduct backlog refinement to review requirements with the team before putting into planning.


Define requirements that are put into the release based on team member’s velocity and ETA.


Review and prioritize ad-hoc requirements that should be added into the release or replaced by other requirements.


Embrace the product requirement and support for clarification.


Manage and make decisions on release. Define timeline for release.


Research and analyze market, the users, and the roadmap for the product


Follow our competitors and the industry


Increase an understanding of Agile practices, Lean Startup, new technologies and other new trends.


Deliver effective communications and support relevant internal parties, such as Business Development, Product Marketing, Customer Success, enhance and manage relevant 


processes and procedures.









Requirement




At least 2 years of experience in business process and/or technology implementation


Hands-on experience with Waterfall/Agile best practices and methods such as Scrum, Continuous Integration etc.


Data driven technologies (Logi, Cube19, Qlikview, Tableau or Power BI) and/or experience in delivering analytics solutions to end customers. 


Understanding of analytics concepts, AI model development, training and deployment.


Experience in analytical techniques such as time series analysis, regression analysis, or other.


Communicating technical concepts to a wide variety of audiences and navigating between big-picture and technical details.


A strong technical understanding and experience in architecting Big Data applications.


Experience in collaborating with data science teams on data preparation, feature engineering, modeling and implementation


Use, research and development of new technologies, standards, and best practices to ensure the best possible performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications.


Experience in service-oriented technologies to be able to understand service interdependencies and drive towards technical solutions for multi-tiered systems.


Able to work independently and excellent problem-solving skills is a must


Proven results-orientated person with a focus on delivery


Experience communicating with technical and non-technical stakeholders across multiple business units


Experience in UX and consumer-facing industries.


Excellent communication skills in English


Experience with AWS/Google Cloud Platform will be a plus.












Be the change: 
Shoot to the top with a high-octane, innovative SaaS company.




Professional development:
 Upgrade your skills and ignite your career.




International environment:
 We represent a diverse crew of over 20 nationalities across 7 global offices.




Collaborative atmosphere:
 At Vincere everyone works together to execute the mission.




Excellent benefits: 
We offer competitive compensation packages.  




Team spirit:
 Caring for our people and bonding together are musts for us.




Dynamic growth:
 Our teams are scaling up quickly as the recruiting market is booming. There’s no better time than now to come on board!




Vincere has a diverse, international, and supportive community culture. You’ll collaborate with coworkers and clients across Australia, Europe, the UK and the US. Our English-speaking environment lets you improve your language skills.

When you’re on #TeamVinny, you get the best benefits:




A very attractive salary package




Up to 14th month salary




Sign-in bonus & performance bonus when applicable



Social Insurance on Gross salary


Yearly health check-ups


Bao Viet Premium medical Insurance


15-20 annual leave days per year+public holidays with unused days rolled over to next year (unlimited)


Parking fee allowance


Annual company trip


Technical and soft-skills training on Udemy and Coursera


Monthly events, Team outings, company parties, and other exciting events every quarter


Overtime rarely required. OT policies apply for every product release.



At Vincere, we have a saying: when you win, we win. There are always ongoing career opportunities within Vincere.

We look forward to receiving your application.

description:
About Engineering at Tiki


Engineering at Tiki is all about developing well rounded technologists. Technologists who are not only hands on architects/programmers but also product builders. Engineers who also understand customer needs and business strategy first hand. Our growth will expose you to building architectures that use next gen technology. Our scale of data and customer base provide the opportunity for you to innovate using AI and learning. Problems you will solve on a day to day basis are first of its kind for a developing ecommerce market. Engineering at Tiki is a career building opportunity.


What you will do




Design test strategies and create test plans and test cases


Develop, maintain and execute tests in both automated and manual manner


Participate in technical requirements, design discussions, and leading test plan reviews


Setup test environment, execution, and report to Scrum team


Report and monitor defects in the defect tracking system


Collaborate with product manager, stakeholders and development team to design testing plan and improve product quality.










Bachelor’s/Master’s degree in computer science/engineering or equivalent professional experience


2+ years of experience in software testing in either web testing or mobile testing


Experience in analyzing specification requirements, developing, performing test cases as well as creating testing reports.


Good knowledge in testing methodology


Familiarity with Agile framework and regression testing


Experience in API and automation testing is a plus


Strong analytical, testing, troubleshooting errors


Working knowledge of test management software (e.g. TestRail, Jira…)


Experience with relational database concepts and SQL queries are required


Comfortable with handling ambiguity and willingness to keep learning


Deep customer focus and strong sense of ownership


Good teamwork and communication skills.

description:
About Engineering at Tiki


Engineering at Tiki is all about developing well rounded technologists. Technologists who are not only hands on architects/programmers but also product builders. Engineers who also understand customer needs and business strategy first hand. Our growth will expose you to building architectures that use next gen technology. Our scale of data and customer base provide the opportunity for you to innovate using AI and learning. Problems you will solve on a day to day basis are first of its kind for a developing ecommerce market. Engineering at Tiki is a career building opportunity.


Our stack includes: Python, Java, Go, NodeJS, Kafka, Redis, MySQL, Kubernetes, Ansible, and Docker



What will you do?




Working on: Marketplace platform, App Platform system, Checkout & Payment system, Gamification platform, Core Architecture team...


Building back-end systems to handle the complex and fast-growing business.


Designing sophisticated microservice architecture.









You‘ll need to have




Bachelor‘s degree in computer science/engineering or equivalent professional experience




2+ years experience with Python/ Java/ Go/ NodeJS
 development tech stack and willingness to learn other programming languages.


Solid knowledge of OOP, data structures, algorithms, architectural patterns and system design.


Experiences in building the backend for high traffic web and app products with complex business logic.


Experienced in mentoring less experienced members is a plus.









Inside our engineering team:




We iterate constantly. There's no such thing as the best version of anything, just a constant streams of improvements and tests.


We move fast, really fast. Major changes can be executed in a few days, many times just a few hours.


We have a data-informed mindset. We try to use data to inform our decision as much as possible.


We are independent. Most of the time, your team will not need technical assistance from other teams.


We take risks. We're not afraid to challenge "best practices".




Our attractive offers include: 




Open communication with passionate and experienced members.


Challenging working environment.


Easy access to the library with tons of startup, product, UX, coding... books.


Private healthcare insurance.


Annual health check-ups.


Special internal programs for Tikiers when shopping on Tiki.vn (free ship TikiNow service, discount...).


Internal events to bond our mutual understanding & spirit such as team building, team outing, Tiki's birthday, year-end party...


New & beautiful office with a pantry room (with bar), entertainment & gymnastic equipment, yoga rooms, a library and an open space facilitating cross-department communication.


Competitive salary and performance review, 13th-month pay and bonus based on performance.

description:
Your Role


We’re looking for an experienced Website Designer to join our team. In this role, you’ll create recruitment websites, website themes, and enhancements. You’ll also work closely with our Product team to make UI and UX designs for our Digital platform.

Digital is Vincere’s latest module: a recruitment website platform with built-in CMS, an advanced customizer, and portals for Jobs, Candidates, and Clients.

If you’re a designer looking for an opportunity to make an immediate impact at an international tech company that welcomes bold and diverse thinking, read on.


Your Responsibilities




Create engaging designs & themes for recruitment websites


Liaise with the Product team to ensure delivery of designs


Create customer websites using the Digital platform


Create mockups of design concepts


Participate in customer meetings


Ensure website designs are responsive across devices, i.e. desktop, mobile, and tablet


Manage design libraries and the Products style guide









Requirements




2+ years of experience building responsive websites 


A strong portfolio demonstrating quality website design. 
Attach portfolio with CV.




Experience creating websites or themes in CMS systems (e.g. WordPress, Drupal)


Proficiency in Figma and Adobe Creative Suite tools including Photoshop, Illustrator, etc. 


Experience with CSS/HTML


A good understanding of responsive design and user-centred design principles


Ability to work effectively and quickly turn work around whilst maintaining a high level of quality


Confidence communicating in English


Well organized with high attention to detail


Nice to have: Basic Javascript experience












Be the change: 
Shoot to the top with a high-octane, innovative SaaS company.




Professional development:
 Upgrade your skills and ignite your career.




International environment:
 We represent a diverse crew of over 20 nationalities across 7 global offices.




Collaborative atmosphere:
 At Vincere everyone works together to execute the mission.




Excellent benefits: 
We offer competitive compensation packages.  




Team spirit:
 Caring for our people and bonding together are musts for us.




Dynamic growth:
 Our teams are scaling up quickly as the recruiting market is booming. There’s no better time than now to come on board!




Vincere has a diverse, international, and supportive community culture. You’ll collaborate with coworkers and clients across Australia, Europe, the UK and the US. Our English-speaking environment lets you improve your language skills.


When you’re on #TeamVinny, you get the best benefits:




A very attractive salary package




Up to 14th month salary




Sign-in bonus & performance bonus when applicable



Social Insurance on Gross salary


Yearly health check-ups


Bao Viet Premium medical Insurance


15-20 annual leave days per year+public holidays with unused days rolled over to next year (unlimited)


Parking fee allowance


Annual company trip


Technical and soft-skills training on Udemy and Coursera


Monthly events, Team outings, company parties, and other exciting events every quarter


Overtime rarely required. OT policies apply for every product release.



At Vincere, we have a saying: when you win, we win. There are always ongoing career opportunities within Vincere.

We look forward to receiving your application.

description:
Techcom Securities (TCBS) đang tìm kiếm một số chuyên viên vận hành ứng dụng để tham gia bộ phận CNTT của chúng tôi tại văn phòng Hà Nội.


Ứng viên sẽ quản lý và tự động hóa các quy trình triển khai của công ty bằng cách sử dụng các kỹ thuật Continuous Integration và Continuous Delivery.


Đây là cơ hội để bạn trở thành một thành viên trong đội ngũ ngân hàng đầu tư sáng tạo và uy tín hàng đầu Việt Nam!


Nơi làm việc: Hà Nội, Việt Nam


Mô tả công việc:





Vận hành hệ thống công nghệ theo các quy trình được ban hành.




Giám sát, cảnh báo và xử lý sự cố cho hệ thống Production.




Đánh giá và đưa ra các đề nghị giải quyết sự cố mang tính cấp thời để hệ thống có thể hoạt động trở lại trong thời gian sớm nhất.




Phối hợp với Nhà cung cấp giải pháp trong việc sửa lỗi cũng như nâng cấp hệ thống. Theo dõi tiến độ sửa lỗi của Nhà cung cấp, đảm bảo phải nằm trong SLA đã cam kết.




Nghiên cứu và đề xuất các phương pháp cải thiện hệ thống hiện tại trong việc vận hành, giám sát, và hỗ trợ người dùng.




Tham gia vào các dự án đang phát triển để dễ dàng tiếp nhận khi dự án chuyển sang vận hành chính thức.




Phối hợp với bộ phận phát triển phần mềm để tìm ra nguyên nhân và xử lý một cách triệt để.




Chuẩn hóa môi trường làm việc từ Dev/Test cho đến production.




Tìm hiểu công nghệ, quy trình, nghiệp vụ chứng khoán nhằm nâng cao hiệu quả hỗ trợ Vận hành




Tìm hiểu các stack công nghệ Cty đang sử dụng, để hỗ nâng cao hiệu quả Vận hành.












Tốt nghiệp chuyên ngành Công nghệ thông tin, điện tử viễn thông…




Có khả năng đọc hiểu tài liệu chuyên ngành




Có nền tảng đào tạo tốt về công nghệ thông tin




Có kinh nghiệm làm việc, quản trị với các hệ thống Linux hoặc Windows server




Yêu thích lĩnh vực tài chính, chứng khoán




Có kinh nghiệm vận hành ứng dụng Core chứng khoán là một lợi thếCó kinh nghiệm lập trình, từng làm việc với các hệ quản trị cơ sở dữ liệu là một lợi thế




Đam mê công nghệ thông tin, luôn sẵn sàng học tập, tiếp thu kiến thức mới.




Là người có trách nhiệm, cẩn thận, toàn vẹn, khả năng giao tiếp tốt và thái độ trung thực.









- Review lương 1 lần/ năm

- Cán bộ nhân viên sẽ có từ 12- 15 ngày phép/ năm 

- Bảo hiểm AON cho Cán bộ nhân viên

- Công ty có các CLB thể thao sinh hoạt hàng tuần (đá bóng, chạy bộ, cầu lông)

- Team building 1 lần/ 1 năm theo tiêu chuẩn 5 sao

- Môi trường làm việc trẻ, năng động, cơ hội phát triển cao

description:
3 + years’ experience in Manual testing , Test automation using Selenium WebDriver (Java) and Working knowledge of SQL 



We are looking for a QA Tester to assess software quality through manual and automated testing. You will be responsible for finding and reporting bugs and glitches. In this role, candidate should have a keen eye for detail and excellent communication skills. If you are also competent in executing test cases and are passionate about quality, we’d like to meet you. 



Ultimately, QA will ensure that our products, applications and systems work correctly.
 

 


Thời gian bắt đầu làm việc: 
Bắt đầu ngay







Manual Testing Responsibilities 






R
eview and analyze system specifications. 


Collaborate with team to develop effective strategies, test plans and Test cases. 


Convert manual test cases / requirements to automated test Workflows to ensure maximum test coverage. 


Execute test cases (manual or automated) and analyze results. 


Report issues and ensure closure. 


Work with cross-functional teams to ensure quality throughout the software development lifecycle. 


Must have experience working in Agile (Scrum) methodology. 


Must have experience working with Cloud JIRA (Xray Test management) 



 


Automation Testing Responsibilities 




Build tools, frameworks, and other infrastructure needed to support automation. 


Design, code, and implement automation framework. 


Programming – Good programming skills to write scripts in Programming Languages, such as Java and JavaScript. 


Automation – Excellent Experience in Selenium WebDriver (Java) 


Test design - Good knowledge on design patterns 


Test runner - Good knowledge/hands on experience on TestNG 


Analytical skills –analytically examine bug reports, prioritize vital tests, and streamline application functions through automated testing processes. 


Problem-solving skills – problem-solving skills to find bugs in code and build fixes for them. 


Attention to detail – test web and mobile/ Windows applications to find ways to improve them and isolate problems, must be highly detail oriented. 


Good to have experience in automating REST API using rest assured framework. 


Must have good knowledge or working experience on Git and Jenkins.

Đây là cơ hội để bạn trở thành một thành viên trong đội ngũ ngân hàng đầu tư sáng tạo và uy tín hàng đầu Việt Nam! Nơi làm việc: Hà Nội, Việt Nam

- Có kinh nghiệm với các dịch vụ đám mây như Microsoft Azure, Amazon AWS (Amazon) 



- Có kinh nghiệm với các dịch vụ như Docker, Kubernetes, v.v. 



- Có kinh nghiệm với các công cụ tự động hóa / dàn dựng và các hệ thống quản lý cấu hình như Ansible, SaltStack, CloudFormation, Puppet, v.v. 



- Đã từng làm trên hệ thống giám sát như ELK. 



- Có hiểu biết về các giải pháp giám sát như Prometheus, Grafana, checkmk, ... là một lợi thế. 



- Có thế mạnh về các kỹ năng quản trị Linux - Là người có trách nhiệm, cẩn thận, toàn vẹn, khả năng giao tiếp tốt và thái độ trung thực. 



- Cài đặt và sử dụng vài Web Server phổ biến như: Apache và Nginx. Tìm hiểu một số khái niệm và chức năng thường được sử dụng: Caching Server, Load balancer, Reverse Proxy, and Firewall. 



- Tối thiểu 6 tháng làm việc trong lĩnh vực CNTT với vai trò DevOps vận hành các công cụ jenkins, jira , git (Gitlab, Bitbucket…), hệ điều hành Linux, Windows Server

- Chance to grow up in your career path

description:
We are looking for QA Testing Engineers to assess software quality through manual and automated testing. You will be responsible for finding and reporting bugs and glitches. In this role, you should have a keen eye for detail and excellent communication skills. If you are also competent in executing test cases and are passionate about quality, we’d like to meet you. Ultimately, you will ensure that our products, applications, and systems work correctly.



Responsibilities:




Review and analyze system specifications


Collaborate with QA Engineers to develop effective strategies and test plans


Execute test cases (manual or automated) and analyze results


Create logs to document testing phases and defects


Report bugs and errors to development teams


Help troubleshoot issues


Conduct post-release/ post-implementation testing


Work with cross-functional teams to ensure quality throughout the software development lifecycle









Requirements:




Proven experience as a QA tester or similar role


Experience in project management and QA methodology


Familiarity with Scrum Agile frameworks


Experience in Trading (Crypto Currency, Stock and trading knowledge)


Production mindset


Experience with API testing (Postman)


Fluent English


Ability to document and troubleshoot errors


Analytical mind and problem-solving aptitude


Demonstrated ability to communicate effectively across various audiences


Strong customer service and client relations skills


Ability to multi-task across various simultaneous projects


Experience collaborating with others in QA/Development to deliver shared results


Technical understanding of business application systems and their underlying hardware


Well organized, self-motivated individual who can work with little or no direction


Experience Automation test is plus









Health Insurance




100% coverage for you and your wife/husband and kids.

All Levels


 cho các văn phòng: Hồ Chí Minh, Cần Thơ, Hà Nội, Huế. Yêu cầu công việc như sau: 




Làm việc trên toàn bộ vòng đời của dự án bao gồm phát triển, triển khai và hỗ trợ

description:
We are looking for

UI/UX Creative Designer who is ready to join a leading fintech company that provides trading, exchange, and next-generation financial services powered by blockchain technology.

Some familiarity with user-centered design principles, methodologies, best practices, and approaches, is expected, but more than any one of these abilities, we are looking for someone that is hungry to learn and grow. Easy to work with, open to feedback, passionate and vocal about what is best for the user.


Applicants must currently be based in Ho Chi Minh City.



What you will do:



Creative design.
 Work closely with the Marketing team to conduct growth hacking campaigns, ideations.


UI/UX design.
 Translate feature requirements to deliverable artifacts that can be reviewed and revised. Rapidly develop wireframes, user flow, and prototypes in an agile environment for Marketing web & mobile. Iterate designs based on user testing and feedback sessions.


Visual design
. Strict attention to detail and consistency. Adhere to existing visual design patterns. Maintain a strong sense of layout and typography. Be vigilant for inconsistencies in the execution of design patterns across products.


Communication
. Express clearly in writing and in a speech to advocate for a design point of view. Speak clearly and cogently. Ask questions; don’t be afraid of saying "I don't know, but let me find out."


Tools
. Familiarization with various design tools such as Photoshop, Illustration, Sketch, Zeplin, and Abstract to produce high-quality user experience solutions.


Team culture
. Be generous and collaborate with other team members. Work closely with engineers to problem solve and implement code-friendly designs.







What we are expecting from you




3+ years designing consumer-facing Marketing products for web & mobile


Experience working in a collaborative environment with engineers, user researchers, and product teams


Experience leading design projects


Proficiency with sketch, zeplin, abstract, adobe suite


Business level English proficiency, and excellent written communication


Extremely well organized and detail-oriented


Experience working with Design Systems


Open-minded, low ego, collaborative, and 
first principles thinking

Interest in cryptocurrency or financial products

Understanding of Agile principles and experience working in Agile teams

Key Roles & Responsibilities for this Position: 





Develop and Maintain 4 Platform 



Participate in the solution design process


Work closely with other teams, e.g., UX designers, QC Engineers & Product Managers to deliver high-quality products and target the system with the least amount of errors.


Refine existing functionality of our PaaS platforms, and developing new features to serve millions of users in real-time.


Main focus on coding and debugging


Collaborate with Front-end developers 


Define and communicate technical and design requirements











A university degree (BS, MS, or PhD is a plus) in Computer Science or related fields



2+ years of experience with Golang and/or C++/Java

Familiarity with running large scale services; 


Deep understanding of microservices architecture, concepts and how to implement them

Good level of English both verbal and written

Self-motivated, but also can work well in a team

Keen problem-solving and troubleshooting abilities.

description:
Create and maintain optimal data pipeline architecture, Assemble large, complex data sets that meet functional / non-functional business requirements.


Identify, design, and implement internal process improvements: automating manual processes, optimizing data delivery, re-designing infrastructure for greater scalability, etc.


Build the infrastructure required for optimal extraction, transformation, and loading of data from a wide variety of data sources using SQL and AWS ‘big data’ technologies.


Build analytics and visualization tools that use the data pipeline to provide actionable insights into customer acquisition, operational efficiency, and other key business performance metrics.


Work with stakeholders including the Executive, Product, Marketing, Accounting, Design, and Data teams to assist with data-related technical issues and support their data infrastructure needs.


Build Tableau dashboards to provide real-time insights into our market and customer activities for a wide range of stakeholders.


Build and automate reports using Python and SQL on PostgreSQL, to provide to each team the data required for their operations..


Create data tools for analytics and data scientist team members that assist them in building and optimizing our product into an innovative industry leader.


Work with data and analytics experts to strive for greater functionality in our data systems.










Advanced working SQL knowledge and experience working with relational databases, query authoring (SQL) as well as working familiarity with a variety of databases including Postgres.


Experience building and optimizing ‘big data’ data pipelines, architectures and data sets.


Experience performing root cause analysis on internal and external data and processes to answer specific business questions and identify opportunities for improvement.


Knowledge of data warehouse modeling techniques and core concepts


Experience of optimizing complex sql queries to enhance performance


Strong analytic skills related to working with unstructured datasets.


Build processes supporting data transformation, data structures, metadata, dependency and workload management.


A successful history of manipulating, processing and extracting value from large disconnected datasets.


Working knowledge of message queuing, stream processing, and highly scalable ‘big data’ data stores.


Strong project management and organizational skills.


Experience supporting and working with cross-functional teams in a dynamic environment.


We are looking for a candidate with 3+ years of experience in a Data Engineer role, who has attained a Graduate degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Informatics, Information


Systems or another quantitative field.


Experience with building and maintaining reporting dashboards using Tableau


Experience with Python, including numpy and pandas


Fluent English









Health Insurance




100% coverage for you and your wife/husband and kids.


Provider: PTI Saigon


Insurance benefits:


Personal accident


Term-life due to illness, diseases, pregnancy


Hospital, surgical and dental treatment








Annual Health Check-up



Money in your pocket - Working hard pays off




Meaningful performance-based incentives are distributed to you yearly based on the company business outcome and your performance rating, which plays a significant role in how much of the bonus amount you'll receive.


Attractive project-based bonuses are granted to people who have a significant contribution to the success of the projects. This type of incentive is defined depending on the performance of the project and the individuals involved.




We want you to achieve your fullest potential while working at Quoine: 
So, we've developed a range of related training courses for you to pick from. You can also get discretionary funding to attend external training or speak at conferences, conventions relevant to our industry, and your expertise since we want you to be a leader in your professional community.


Have your cake and eat it too - work
-
life balance




Paid Time-Off


Do great things and recharge with:


15 days annual leave/year


5 single days sick leave covered by company/year (without a doctor’s note)








Work/Life:






We want you to love where you work
, so we provide a creative workspace, inspiring people, and the latest tech to help you do your best work.




Daily snacks & drinks 
provided at Pantry to keep you fueled anytime.


We 
promote an open and flexible working environment
 where you are empowered to perform your best and are encouraged to give constructive feedback and innovative ideas to the development of the company and yourself.


To help you have fun and bond with your colleagues, besides team 
outing activities 
organized as per 
the 
company's annual plan, we have Xbox One, Pool, Table soccer, etc. available in the entertainment place during off-hour.

description:
Thiết lập quản trị hệ thống máy chủ công ty, hỗ trợ các yêu cầu từ đội phát triển phần mềm và đội vận hành để đảm bảo công việc được thông suốt.


Xây dựng và bảo trì cơ sở hạ tầng CNTT phục vụ cho hoạt động phát triển và vận hành sản phẩm phần mềm.


Áp dụng những công cụ hoặc công nghệ mới giúp đảm bảo hạ tầng ổn định và dễ dàng mở rộng phát triển.


Có kinh nghiệm xây dựng các hệ thống Web server, DB,...










Có kinh nghiệm triển khai các hệ thống ảo hóa tại 
Data Center (VMware, Docker, K8s, Proxmox, …)




Có kinh nghiệm chuyên sâu trong việc triển khai, giám sát và đo lường hiệu năng hệ thống qua các công cụ 
Grafana, InfluxDB, Prometheus, Cacti, ELK,
 …


Có kiến thức về 
CLUSTERING, REVERSE PROXY, CLOUD COMPUTING, BACKUP SYSTEM
.


*Ưu tiên: Có chứng chỉ Linux LPI 1,2 là một lợi thế.









VĂN HÓA TRẺ VÀ NĂNG ĐỘNG




 Môi trường làm việc trẻ và năng động, tôn trọng phát triển cá nhân, công bằng và luôn khuyến khích sáng tạo để tạo nên những giá trị riêng cho nhân viên & cho công ty.


 Các thành viên công ty thân thiện cởi mở, chia sẻ, giúp đỡ nhau vượt qua mọi khó khăn trong công việc và đời sống.


Ngay sau khi phỏng vấn có thể đi làm ngay




Bạn đã sẵn sàng kiến tạo sự nghiệp cùng Hahalolo?


Hãy đồng hành cùng chúng tôi bước tiếp những bước tiến vượt trội trên con đường công nghệ 4.0 với khát vọng và ý chí người Việt Nam!

Gia nhập Hahalolo, các nhân sự sẽ được trải nghiệm, nghiên cứu, triển khai những nền tảng công nghệ mới, được tham gia các chương trình chia sẻ, giao lưu kiến thức công nghệ mới cùng phương pháp làm việc chuyên nghiệp.



Mức lương cạnh tranh


Thưởng theo hiệu suất công việc + Thưởng năng lực vượt trội + Các gói thưởng Dự Án.


Xét duyệt lương hàng năm.


Lộ trình thăng tiến & định hướng nghề nghiêp rõ ràng


Các ngày nghỉ phép trong năm và chế độ BHXH đúng theo qui định


Môi trường làm việc start up với quy mô toàn cầu


Đề cao sự tư duy sáng tạo và tự do đóng góp ý tưởng cho sản phẩm


Được đào tạo nghiệp vụ đều đặn và lộ trình thăng tiến rõ ràng.


Hoạt động thể thao hàng tuần như bóng đá


Tổ chức sinh nhật hàng tháng, teambuilding hàng năm.


Có căn tin để nhân viên ăn trưa, relax


Trang thiết bị, máy móc cực xịn để nhân viên thoải mái làm việc.

description:
Yojee is looking for a Senior Backend Engineer who enjoys developing and designing backend services in a cloud platform environment with Elixir/Phoenix. Together with the team, you will have ownership of the services you build, and you love to share your ideas regarding architecture and functionality.


Duties and Responsibilities




Design and implement API endpoints for the Yojee API backend in Elixir that are highly available, scalable and performant.


Participate in the Scrum process as part of the team.


Take part in grooming meetings & provide input on how to solve requirements and build great architecture.


Take ownership of the systems the team is responsible for and participate in their development where


Follow best practices and produce high quality code with test coverage.


Maintain and improve existing Elixir code bases.


May be required to perform other related duties as required.










Minimum Bachelor’s degree in Computer Engineering or its equivalent related experience.


4+ years of various complex systems.


Experienced and proficient working with at least two languages, preferably Elixir, Ruby, Go or any functional programming language.


Experience designing and working with relational database systems (preferably PostgreSQL).


Design, develop and execute software solutions to address business issues.


Troubleshoot code level problems quickly and efficiently.


You enjoy driving things over getting tasks assigned.


Attention to detail and reliability are what you take pride in.


Excellent communication and collaboration skills.


Good English communication




Nice to have




Experience with Microservice architecture.


Production experience with Elixir & Phoenix.


Understanding of Erlang OTP.


Knowledge in design pattern, testing frameworks, CI/CD.


DevOps experience with Docker, AWS, Azure, Heroku.


js, Angular.js, React.js or React native.








Yojee Limited (ASX: YOJ) is a cloud based (SaaS) logistics platform that seamlessly and uniquely manages, tracks and optimises freight movements along the entire logistics chain, from sender to end customer, across borders and between logistics providers (land, sea, air), with subcontractors and for multi-leg journeys. Rarely is a single carrier servicing an entire goods journey from sender to end customer, or exclusively using one type of transportation method. Yojee ensures connectivity and more efficient planning along the entire journey.

We are not a startup although the company structure is organized in such a way. Yojee is a public listed company on Australian stock exchange (ASX: YOJ). We are growing our team in Vietnam which is developing our core product. Don't miss this opportunity to join us early.



Performance bonus: equivalent to 1-3months salary


Professional development/ training courses


Provided Macbook pro


Occasional onsite trip to Singapore, Indonesia


International environment : Australia, New Zealand, US, Singapore, India, Indonesia, Malaysia, etc,..


Monthly Team-building


Free coffee, milk and tea


Free parking


No 13th month salary


Unlimited paid day off


100% official salary in probation time


Full social insurance paid based on salary

three_reasons:

description:
Silentium is a software consulting company focusing on building products for our partners, mainly in Europe. At the moment, we are partnering with doctor associations in Germany to build next-gen software to serve the German market.
To fuel the growth, we are looking for an energetic team leader to share the journey of learning and growing.

Responsibilities



Help our team build and maintain our design system and ensure its adoption


Be a core contributor to our Figma libraries through component creations and updates


Provide specifications for new components and define guidelines for their usage


Collaborate directly with product designers and engineers to ensure that the designed


components are reusable and robust for implementation


Oversee component implementation and gather feedback to constantly improve our design system


Work closely with other designers to solve UI challenges in response to product requirements


Be an advocate and educator for UI standards and our design system











At least 2+ years of digital design experience. Relevant work experience as a product designer is preferred. It's not that we care much about the exact number of years, but we're looking for people who can step up to own parts of the product - all the way from concept to implementation. We believe in working autonomously; there's likely no one to tell you how to do things as long as you achieve the expected outcomes. Now, if you have less experience but still feel you could do the job, please don't be shy!



Proficient in Figma (interactive component, auto layout, variant, prototype, etc.)


Deep knowledge of modern best practices in web UI, UI patterns, and interaction patterns


Ability to communicate (written and spoken) in a simple and clear manner


Ability to anticipate design problems and recommend alternatives


Ability to think in scalable systems — understanding the impact of design decisions on a system level


Bonus points if you have:


A track record setting up an adopted design system 


Experience in designing complex web applications 


Experience in prototyping tools






If you have less experience but still feel you could do the job, please don't be shy! As long as you put in your best effort, you love to learn and work well with others, you’ll fit right in. Being a team player will help us move further together, as a team.



And last, but not the least, we always treat people with respect, so we expect you to do the same.





Interview process




You will have a face-to-face interview with the Team Leader where we'll talk about technical skills and experience. The interview will be around 2 hours.


Next step, you'll be given a straightforward screening test at application (may take around 3 hours). Please give us a submission timeline once you fully understand the requirement. After the submission, we'll give you the feedback within a working day.


After that, there'll be peer to peer interview where you'll have a chance to know more about your teammates (Product Manager, Designer, and other developers). The ultimate result will be given within 3 working days.



 








Salary: from $1,200 to $2,200


100% salary during the probation period


A lot of ownership of your work. We tackle challenges, as a team


Chance to design complicated system and see that comes live


Very open environment, no hierarchy, we want you to be the change you seek


Chance to have a team built around you


Competitive salary. We pay what you deserve, not what the paper says


Grab support to work at a beautiful office in D1 with snack and coffee at pantry, laptop and extra monitor etc.


Up to 15 days of annual leaves with a loyalty program, and national holidays,


Adding day off of plus Christmas leave (25/12) + Vietnamese Family Day (28/6) + Birthday  leave


Private health Insurance for you and your loved ones


13th month bonus salary


Review Performance at least 2 times/year


Big chance to grow as a person. We move fast, so you'll soon realize that you have to make a lot of decisions on your own


Even bigger chance to grow as an engineer. We're all open to try and apply new technology; if it doesn't work, well, we have learned


Sick leave support; and lots of activities.

Write performance reviews and solve internal issues.



Technical:



Work as part of an agile squad to deliver on product features.


Continuous improvement and maintenance of our backend systems as well as frontend modules.


Writing reusable, testable and efficient code.

location: President Place - 93 Nguyen Du , District 1, Ho Chi Minh
three_reasons:
At Silentium, we value attitude the most
We succeed as a team
We fail and learn, together
description:
As a product manager:


The product is your spirit child, you are responsible to



Understand the problem, discover opportunities


Define, validate, and refine opportunities


Facilitate solutions discovery


Ship the product and iterate




Building user empathy, discovering and defining opportunities to advance toward the product's vision:


We believe in the 
user-centric design thinking process
, and lean. We believe the only way to make an impact is to fully understand end-user needs, pioneer, and validate users' expectations via "whatever- it-takes" user experience researches. Through the process, we learn, we try, and we learn from our mistakes to deliver the product that people love.

The product manager must be comfortable and flexible in applying user experience techniques to make sure that we are building the right thing. Some of the workshops we run frequently and we expect our product managers to be able to run and advance



Service Blueprint


User Journey


User Story Mapping


Empathy Map


Personas/Jobs-to-be-done


A/B testing


Collecting feedback prototyping


Flow chart


Qualitative and quantitative research




The sky is the limit, we don't limit or restrict ourselves to those plays


We will not just "feel" if the opportunity is actually making an impact, the Product Manager will be a workout on the meaningful metrics to measure the success of the initiative and to make a decision if it is worth further investment.


Spread the enthusiasm, build up the team's product mindset:


Product development is a hard-work; you have to figure out the best way to do it with the team, and you have to figure out how to do the right thing. It's absolutely state-of-the-art teamwork.

We are a 
strong
 believer in the team's ownership. We do believe we can only go fast and far only if we empower the team to do the thing. A part of that is how to advance the team toward the product's ownership. The Product Manager to join work with the Design

Manager and Engineering manager to equip team members with the necessary product mindset via workshops and sharing sessions. These activities are expected but not limited to



User story mapping - build knowledge together


Event storming - build knowledge together


Retrospective - continuous learning and refining




Be the collaborator, be the host, be the problem's advocate


Product development is more complicated than defining a feature and building it. The role of a Product Manager is to make sure communication channels are streamlined, both to the team and to stakeholders. We see our Product Manager comfortably connect with Business development teams, sales, marketing, customer supports, legal, press, and other stakeholders. The ultimate goal is to make sure the Life Cycle of the product is well aware and spread across the organization.

We don't expect you to be the proxy, the messenger where you interpret and re-transfer the message to the team; We expect you to be the one to facilitate the channels, making sure they are loud enough to get the team involved in the process; We also expect you to filter those channels and focus the team on things that matter so they will not find overwhelmed and interrupted.


The product manager is expected to do:




Mentor and coach other Product Managers, Business Analysts


Define and refine product strategy and product roadmap


Develops the 
business case
 for new products, improvements to existing products, and business ventures.


Develops positioning for the product.


Improve and optimize Product Development processes


Improve the efficiency of the Product Discovery and Definition


Stay behind Product decisions, forming, shaping, protecting product feature


Work closely with other functional teams to get a commitment on the product delivery


Workout with stakeholders to align on progress, perform product demo


Contribute to tools and techniques to optimize workflow and to improve the productivity


Risk management, the balance between Discovery and Delivery


Acts as product leader within the company









The candidate for the Product Manager role should have:




Experienced in build and launch a successful product


Minimum 4 years of experience in Product Management


Excellent in written and verbal communication


Systematic and analytical thinking. The product is yet to have real-user, it is challenging to put a metric on, but we'll have to


Proven ability to influence cross-functional teams without formal authority


Enthusiasm in tackling the hard and chaotic thing


Excellent teamwork and empathy to other functional teams




Interview process:




You'll be given a straightforward screening test at application (may take around 2- 3 hours). Please give us a submission timeline once you fully understand the requirement. After the submission, we'll give you the feedback within a working day


The next step is a face-to-face interview with the CTO where we'll talk about technical skills and experience. The interview will be around 1 - 2 hours


After that, there'll be peer to peer interview where you'll have a chance to know more about your teammates. The ultimate result will be given within 3 working days.









Why should you be excited to join us?






Salary: Gross up to $ 5000
. Negotiable salary according to ability.



Full salary in probation



Full Social, Medical & Unemployment Insurance


A lot of ownership of your work. We tackle challenges, as a team


Chance to design complicated system and see that comes live


Very open environment, no hierarchy, we want you to be the change you seek

 at a beautiful office in D1 with snack and coffee at pantry, laptop and extra monitor etc.

 with a loyalty program, and national holidays,

description:
Silentium is a software product consulting company focusing on building products for our partners, mainly in Europe. To fuel the growth, we are looking for an energetic 
frontend lead 
to share the journey of learning and growing.


RESPONSIBILITIES




Be in charge of setting up, following up, and making sure Frontend best practices for product


Focus on making a better Development Experience for the team by advancing toolsets (like Webpack, Parcel, ESBuild)


Advance our in-house Design System to fuel better productivity


Advance Frontend test strategy to support team to deliver a product with speed and quality


Work closely with Product Manager, Product Designer, and other developers to deliver the product










Solid 
Javascript and Typescript 
experience and understanding, familiar with these languages best practices, and those pros and cons


Strong 
CSS 
and modern CSS styling experience, PostCSS, CSS-in-JS, familiar with styling in ReactJS


Solid 
ReactJS 
experience, proven by building and scaling a big Single Page Application. Very familiar with ReactJS performance issues, best practices, pros and cons of state management approaches


Familiar with Test libraries like the testing library, proven experience of managing and organizing Frontend test practices


Familiar with browser differences, browser common concepts, and security concepts


Understand network concepts (HTTP, HTTP2, Websocket)


Be able to coach and mentor the team to be more familiar with frontend best practices and productive




Have an open mind, can-but-not-blindly-do attitude
. You have a "can-do" attitude, which is already very cool, but you also must be able to pause and ask, "should we do it."




Professional and be a TEAM PLAYER, 
because we can move nowhere without a team.




Keep yourself updated
, Javascript ecosystem is moving too fast to be outdated


A plus if you frequently contribute to opensource projects (please give us a reference link if applicable)


A plus if you have given talked to conference (please give us reference link if applicable)




OUR TECHNICAL STACK


We use Next.js for the front end. On the backend, we are on the move of incorporating Prisma to enable Next.js even further. A big part of the backend is written in Golang at the moment.

The application is split into multiple microservices, deploy onto a Docker Swarm infrastructure, and use MongoDB.

We plan to move our Database toward PostgreSQL with Prisma to speed up development even further. As such, you'll see a lot of moving pieces, but that's gonna be a chance to learn and grow as an engineer.

Face to face interview with the tech team

Peer interview with Product Manager, Product Designer, and QA

description:
Silentium is a software consulting company focusing on building products for our partners, mainly in Europe. At the moment, we are partnering with doctor associations in Germany to build next-gen software to serve the German market. 

To fuel the growth, we are looking for a business analyst to join our project team. You willwork alongside other business analysts and report directly to the Product Manager. Your main tasks will include performing detailed requirements analysis, documenting processes, and performing some user acceptance testing. To succeed in this role you should have a natural analytical way of thinking and be able to explain difficult concepts to non-technical users


Responsibilities 




Develop a strong understanding of data structure in order to provide the right data to business users.


Identify and prioritize technical and functional requirements; produce scope analysis document to the software development team.


Manage changes details throughout the project life cycles and work with the Product Manager to align the project timeline.


Work with Developer, Product Designer and implement architecturally sound solutions.


Make recommendations for the development team to tailor the change requests based on the currently built system.


Conduct the root cause analysis to identify the software defects, then suggested solutions to fix the problems.









Skill and experience 





Have strong analysis and technical skills;



Be familiar with database model and Database schema is a plus




Have an open mind, can-but-not-blindly-do attitude. 
You have a "can-do" attitude, which is already very cool, but you also must be able to pause and ask, "should we do it."



Understand the value of writing test





Professional and be a TEAM PLAYER, 
because we can move nowhere without a team.




Requirement 




3+ years of experience in Business Analysis / Product Analysis/ Systems Analysis


3+ years of experience in an online product company, outsourcing company or startup environment


Excellent English communication (write, read, speak and listen).


Being knowledgeable or experienced in Agile environment or Scrum Master is a plus, good logical and analytical thinking.


Experience in working in technology enabled change programs/projects, software development is a plus.


Professional certificates in Business Analysis is a plus.




Interview process 




You'll be given a straightforward screening test at application (may take around 2- 3 hours) (If needed). Please give us a submission timeline once you fully understand the requirement. After the submission, we'll give you the feedback within a working day


The next step is a face-to-face interview with Head of Product/ Product Manager, where we'll talk about technical skills and experience. The interview will be around 2 hours.


After that, there'll be peer to peer interview where you'll have a chance to know more about your teammates. We will give the ultimate result within 3 working days.









Why should you be excited to join us?





Salary: From Gross $ 1,200 



A lot of ownership of your work. We tackle challenges, as a team


Chance to design complicated system and see that comes live


Very open environment, no hierarchy, we want you to be the change you seek


Chance to have a team built around you
