description:
About Levitate


Levitate is a real-estate development platform that aims to offer 
consumers
 more 
creative input
 when it comes to purchasing their 
own
 home. Most developers fit-out houses and apartments in a way that is 
easy on the eye
 and, ultimately, says nothing about the people who will eventually live there. Sure, they might make their show homes overly 
glamorous
 to attract high-end buyers, but which family with a 
three-year-old
 and a puppy wants polished chrome doors and a white leather couch?


“For you, by you”


Before our projects are even constructed, prospective buyers can be 
choosing
, 
changing
, and 
re-arranging
 everything from the color and fabric of the sofa to the tiles on the floor and the floor plan itself, and all according to their 
needs
, their 
tastes
, and their 
lifestyle
. Nowhere is this concept better demonstrated than in our 
personalized online 3D design experience
. Through this, we remove the hassle, the headaches, and the inflated costs of using an interior designer. Nice. Instead, through a simple, logical, and entertaining portal, we give 
everyone
, young and old, the 
tools
 to become an interior designer themselves.


The Mission of the Role


Our mission is to constantly improving upon and expanding our platform and consumer offerings is a vital part of our plan for intelligent, profitable growth. Your goals are:



Find bugs


Prevent bugs


Assess product quality


Provide suggestions to make product more efficient, user friendly


Communicate practical difficulties




Key Duties and Responsibilities




Design test plan, test cases, test procedure to ensure accuracy, stability, and security of product.


Update test documents (test plans, test cases, test reports)


Familiar with functional testing (Integration testing, system testing, acceptance testing)


Report, review and correct errors in the error checking system


Learn, adopt, implement automation testing framework


Work directly with PO/BA to launch and conduct commissioning


Quality driven and proactive to do what is necessary to achieve deadlines in a dynamic environment with frequent priority and changes


Produce clear and concise testing documentation










Good analytical skills; ability to understand complex processes with rigorous attention to detail, especially, in finance


At least 2 years of commercial experience with software testing (web platform)


Ability to work flexible hours


Experience with task management and testing tools (e.g. Jira, Trello, Asana)


Experience in writing code to test UIs, APIs, front-end systems is plus


Any knowledge and/or experience in automation testing and scripting is a plus


Experience in technical problem solving; root cause analysis; and data gathering, analysis, and reporting within a system/ software quality assurance discipline


Good English communication in written and verbal











Salary from $13,000/year



Global company & product


Dynamic, technological, and Agile working environment


Self-development: online technical seminar, career talk, and various training on hot-trend technologies, languages, and soft-skills


Talented and enthusiastic fellows


Creative office spaces lots of green, inside the zoo with surrouding girraff, zebra, free coffee


13th-month salary, annual salary raise review, health & social insurance included

Levitate Needs
We are looking for a ​ Frontend (React.js) Developer​ to work within Levitech, our technology department.

I​n this role, you will be responsible for developing and implementing user interface components using React.js concepts and workflows such as Redux, Flux, and
Webpack. You will also be responsible for profiling and improving front-end performance and documenting our front-end codebase​.

To ensure success as a React.js Developer, you should have in-depth knowledge of JavaScript and React concepts, excellent front-end coding skills, and a good understanding of progressive web applications. ​You will be completely
 ​hands-on
​, writing well-formatted code while working within our development methodologies. We prefer applicants to have at least ​
3 years of experience​ 
within all aspects of web development, but we’re willing to speak with ​
exceptional
​ people with less experience

The ideal candidate is someone who is ​
skilled and passionate
​ about software engineering – specifically front-end development, and someone who is eager to fill
in the gaps in their toolbox.

You will work within a​ 
cross-functional team
​ encompassing product, design, and engineering to plan and negotiate iterative development cycles in an agile environment

 


What You’ll Be Doing




Work closely with our business product owners on an Agile team to fully understand requirements, provide feedback, and request clarifications as needed.


Work with other engineers on a collaborative Agile team to deliver code on an ongoing basis.


Translating designs and wireframes into high quality code.


Building reusable components and front-end libraries for future use.


Optimizing components for maximum performance across a vast array of web-capable devices and browsers










Strong proficiency in JavaScript, CSS, HTML, including DOM manipulation and the JavaScript object model


Thorough understanding of React.js and its core principles


Experience with popular React.js workflows (such as Flux or Redux)


Familiarity with RESTful APIs


Knowledge of modern authorization mechanisms, such as JSON Web Token


Professional experience writing unit tests, performing code reviews, doing API testing (Postman, Swagger etc.). 
 











Salary range from $19,500-$26,000/year

Your mission is to bridge the gap between IT and business using data analytics to assess business processes, determine requirements and deliver data-driven recommendations and reports to executives and stakeholders. You will engage with business leaders and users to understand how data-driven changes to process, products, services, software and hardware can improve efficiencies and add value. They must articulate those ideas but also balance them against what’s technologically feasible and financially and functionally reasonable. Depending on the role, you might work with data sets to improve products, hardware, tools, software, services or process. Additionally you also contribute in the process of building, testing and analyzing innovative user experiences based on company goals and the large amount of data you will have at your fingertips.


Key Duties and Responsibilities


Analyze Business Requirements



Understanding strategic business needs and plans for growth


Liaising between the IT department and the Executive branch and acting as an information source and communicator between business branches


Analyzing the design of technical systems and business models, creating a detailed business analysis, defining business requirements, outlining problems, opportunities and solutions for a business


Communicate, translate, and simplify business requirements to ensure buy-in from all stakeholders


Create knowledge library and maintain high quality, up-to-date, and searchable content for intended audiences


Work effectively across the organization with stakeholders, developers and subject matter experts to develop and support new and existing products, features, and services.



Solutions Development



Work with the software development team to ensure that they understand the business specifications, key processes and work flow diagrams of various business functions


Find technological solutions to business requirements, consult with the executive team and the IT department on the newest technology and its implications in the industry


Identify and then prioritize technical and functional requirements


Propose product road map and features list, split the product road maps into multiple software development projects


Discuss potential software development projects scope, objectives and parameters with executives, and software developers


Predict resources needed to reach objectives and manage resources in an effective and efficient manner


Develop and manage a detailed project schedule and work plan, ensuring each project stays on schedule and adheres to the deadlines


Determine and oversee consistent testing, evaluation, and troubleshooting of all products in all stages of completion


Serve as a liaison to communicate information regarding product changes, milestones reached, and other pertinent information


Measure project performance to identify areas for improvement.










+5 years of IT product management, business analyst, or related experience


Experience with scrum or other agile software development frameworks


Experience thriving in a fast-paced, distributed environment


Degree in Computer Engineering, Business Administration or related field


Excellent problem-solving skills


Analytical mindset


Exceptional interpersonal skills


Excellent English written and verbal communication skills


Attention to detail


Bachelor’s Degree required

description:
Company Description


Treehouse provides DeFi users with live analytics and risk metrics of their digital assets. We are building a unified and user-friendly interface to help users successfully manage their portfolio in the ever-changing world of DeFi. We aim to be the gateway for all traders to effectively manage their DeFi risk across chains and are backed by some of the largest Singapore VCs and global crypto exchanges.

We are looking for an 
experienced and talented UI/UX designer
 to design and shape unique, user-centric products and experiences. The ideal candidate will have experience working in agile teams, with developers, and other UI/UX designers. You will be able to make deliberate design decisions and to translate any given user-experience journey into a smooth and intuitive interaction.

 


Roles and Responsibilities




Be a great team player, experienced in working with agile teams. Ability to collaborate closely with developers, copywriters and other UI/UX designers.


Conceptualize, create, improve and use wireframes, prototypes, style guides, user flows, and effectively communicate interactive ideas.


Present and defend design decisions, ensuring it is in-line with the overall roadmap as well as your personal design thinking and fundamentals (i.e. color theory, visual weight, etc).


Continually keep up to speed with the latest trends, standards, and updates in the UI/UX industry.


Ensure that the product interface aligns with the company’s overall vision and style.


Understand and conduct usability testing.



 

 







Requirements




2+ years of experience and a proven track record.


Hold a strong existing portfolio and confident of explaining design concepts and ideation during the interview.


Hands-on experience creating wireframes, prototypes, storyboards, user flows, etc.


Experience using tools such as Photoshop, Sketch, Illustrator, InVision, UXPin, Quartz.


Understanding of basic front-end languages: HTML5, CSS3 Javascript.


Creative ideas with a problem solving mindset.


Experience working in an agile/scrum development process.


Be open to receiving objective criticism and improving upon it.


A user-centric mindset.


Great communication skills and capable of explaining decisions.


Excellent understanding and experience in building financial applications / dashboards on desktop and/or mobile.


Solid understanding of layouts and design as well as UI/UX design systems.


Preferably be able to work on Figma.


A solid grasp of user-centered design (UCD), planning and conducting user research, user testing, A/B testing, rapid prototyping, heuristic analysis, usability and accessibility concerns.



 






As a tech company, our company culture always delivers high-quality products with the greatest talent who are eager to succeed, with a vibrant work environment, and prioritize work-life balance.

- We convert our industry-leading research and knowledge into your power. This is the best place to gain your knowledge and experience in fintech technologies.

- Excellent and competitive salary package

- Opportunities to gain hands-on experience in cutting-edge technologies.

- M1 Macbook provided & widescreen

- 12 annual leave days, social insurance according to Vietnamese laws

- Annual performance review

- 13-month salary

- Working hours: 9 AM - 6 PM, Mon - Fri

- Unlimited potential for career growth because we are fast-growing

- Work on-site with Singapore team.

Treehouse Finance provides crypto users with live analytics and risk metrics of their crypto holdings. Our mission is to create a unified and user-friendly interface to help users successfully manage their portfolio in the ever-changing world of Decentralized Finance.

As a Software Engineer, you will work directly with the core founders and developers to build the backbone of our business. This role will be critical in shaping our initial launch and requires expertise in blockchain technologies specifically related to Ethereum, Binance Smart Chain, and Solana. The engineer should have prior experience working on backend database design from ground up in addition to building scalable and extendable web-based infrastructures for online applications.



Responsibilities




Architect efficient database and infrastructure from scratch


Design high performance queries to access blockchain time series data


Build reusable modules and APIs across multiple blockchains and crypto platforms


Develop scalable framework for web-based applications tailoring to Defi Analytics


Maintain multiple live and full blockchain nodes as well production databases and infrastructures
 









Requirements




1-5 years experience working with open source database and backend programming


Proficient in backend infrastructure design and architect


Work experience with integrating backend to frontend applications


Solid knowledge of web-based programming structures




Skills / Qualifications




Hands-on software development experience in Golang, and SQL/no-SQL


Good knowledge of Algorithm, Data Structures, Operating Systems, Database & Distributed systems and basic Cryptography.


Extensive experience with Git/GitHub


Self-motivated and proactive personality and completed tasks promptly


Able to collaborate and communicate well with other team members


Capable to research and explore new domain knowledge independently




Preferred Skills




Experience with mainstream programming languages: C/C++, Java, Python, Rust


Knowledge of UNIX based OS and scripting


Experience with AWS software development


Familiar with Agile project management concepts


Exposure to dApps or blockchain technology and development


Understand modern packaging and distribution technologies such as PIP, Docker
 








As a tech company, our company culture always delivers high-quality products with the greatest talent who are eager to succeed, with a vibrant work environment, and prioritize work-life balance.



We convert our industry-leading research and knowledge into your power. This is the best place to gain your knowledge and experience in fintech technologies.

Unlimited potential for career growth because we are fast-growing

Opportunity to work onsite at Singapore office along with chance to meet project clients for business discussion.
 



We not only work hard, we learn and play hard too! We offer free technical training courses and language lessons such as English by professionals as required. We strive to build good company culture and environment through bonding weekly sessions such as sports activity and fully paid dinner outing at least twice a month. We also have a yearly company retreat and year-end dinner to celebrate our achievements and discuss future plans.

We operate in a startup environment so no boss-employee politics style of management. Everyone is considered a team player with designated coaches in charge to guide the team. description:
1. Thực hiện thu thập, phân tích yêu cầu người sử dụng của 1 trong 2 sản phẩm Mobile app: Tin mới 24H HOẶC 24H Money

2. Phân tích xu hướng phát triển , tính năng của các sản phẩm cùng loại trên thị trường.

3. Xây dựng kế hoạch phát triển tính năng sản phẩm dựa trên yêu cầu và dựa trên phân tích dữ liệu

4. Mô tả chi tiết tính năng sản phẩm và gửi làm việc với bộ phận lập trình , thiết kế để phát triển tính năng sản phẩm

5. Thực hiện việc hỗ trợ test, nghiệm thu tính năng của các sản phẩm.






1. Có 2-3 năm kinh nghiệm BA trở lên về phát triển sản phẩm mobile app

2. Có khả năng reseach, phân tích nghiệp vụ, hành vi người dùng

3. Có hiểu biết về Tài chính, Chứng khoán HOẶC đam mê bóng đá là lợi thế

4. Đưa ra được các góp ý để tăng trải nghiệm người dùng

5. Có khả năng học hỏi, cầu tiến, tư duy logic tốt

6. Team work tốt, giao tiếp phối hợp các phòng ban tốt.






1. Tham gia phát triển các sản phẩm chiến lược, chủ chốt. 

2. Mức lương: Từ 20 - 35M (Tùy kinh nghiệm) + Phụ cấp

3. Xem xét tăng lương hàng năm (1 lần/ năm) và thưởng hiệu quả công việc (2 lần/ năm).

4.  Thời gian làm việc: 08h00 - 17h00, Thứ 2 - Thứ 6.

5. Tham gia đầy đủ chế độ bảo hiểm, ngày phép, ngày lễ theo quy định của Luật lao động và quy định công ty.

6. Khám sức khỏe hàng năm định kỳ tại các bệnh viện lớn: Thu Cúc, Hồng Ngọc...

7. Du lịch, nghỉ dưỡng tại các resort 5* từ 1 - 2 lần/ năm.

8. Môi trường làm việc thân thiện, đầy năng lượng. Văn phòng trung tâm hạng A.

provides

 services to the

For the development of a new software, 
POC PHARMA VIETNAM 
is looking for a

You will ensure that the development environment has the best resources and provides the best guarantees for the success of the project. You will be responsible for the quality of the development and its compliance with the specifications and architecture decided by the project team.

As a 
senior developer
, your main duties depend on the project phase and will fall broadly into the following categories:



Bring your expertise to choose the most appropriate technologies in order to meet the needs in user experience, performance, security, etc.


Work with team to prepare technical documentations at high level and provide detailed plan for completion of implementation, testing and building phases of project.


Responsible for development, enhancement and maintenance of the application.


Work with Product Owner and Technical Architect to provide optimal IT solutions for business problems.


Perform design, implement, writing unit test, code review.


Setting up the environments, but not a must.



As a contributor, you will:



Ensure that 
POC PHARMA VIETNAM
 and its customers’ needs are met to the highest standards.


Consult and listen to internal staff for feedback, understand requirements and develop appropriate solutions.


Remove all technological obstacles from business operations.


Conduct respectful and friendly communication with other contributors and, where appropriate, customers.









Must have :




3-8 years of experience in developing integrated business systems


Working knowledge of hardware, software and programming as well as analytical skills, including:


Strong at OOP, on-hands experience of best practices, design patterns and SOLID principles


Highly experienced with at least one backend programming languages. (.Net Core is desired)


Can work on both back end and front end (VueJs is preferred).


Highly experience with development websites to run on multiple devices

Highly experience with MVC, ORM


Experience in database: designing, optimizing






A logical approach to problem solving together with a methodical, investigative and inquisitive mind.


Self-starter and fast learning, good teamwork and reliable.


Ability to effectively communicate complex ideas – both verbally and in writing – in English


Comment to the quality of the product and think more about solutions to both business and technical problems




Nice to have :




Multiple database: SQL server, CosmosDB.


Mobile development and Mobile Notification Services.


Implement real time interaction system.


Knowledge and understanding of Healthcare ecosystem and pharmaceutical organization.


French language will be a plus.

As a result of this growth. Port Cities Vietnam is looking for a Senior Software Engineer to join their team!

Design technical solutions based on the FRD from our analysts.


Collaborate with the project team to understand functional requirements.


Analyze problems/features and estimate the implementation time

Train & coach more junior developers.

International team, daily English communication
Motivating bonus system for our employees
description:
We are hiring a Project Manager/ ERP Consultant!



The Port Cities Group, present in 11 countries, is a pure player in ERP integration.


With a team of more than 150 developers and project managers around the world, the Group has developed its know-how and its project methodology which allows it to be the largest Odoo integrator in the APAC region.

We are expanding and we are looking for a 
Project Manager/ ERP Consultant
 who is able to support our clients in the implementation and design of their Odoo projects.
 


JOB RESPONSIBILITIES




Analyze the client's requirements and prepare project documentation.


Conduct client consultations and propose an oriented solution.


Negotiate with clients and align on project scope.


Deliver the projects within the agreed scope, on budget and on time.


Provide support with project resources, people and change management.


Train the users and maintain healthy communication with clients.
 









JOB REQUIREMENTS




3-4 years of experience as an business analysis/consultant/project manager on IT-related projects.


Bachelor's Degree (preferably in IT,  business and economics).


Excellent English skills - daily communication with foreign colleagues and consulting is required.


ERP project experience (Odoo preferred).


Good consulting abilities - clients need understanding and reasonable questioning.


Passion for being an ERP Consultant and Project Leader.


Having innovative and creative thinking skills.
 








We offer;



A performance bonus: Your salary package depends on your performance - the better & more profitable the project is, the bigger percentage of the profit you will receive!


Flexible working hours: 
Our office hours are from 9.30 AM till 3.30 PM. You can start earlier or later depending on your schedule, everyone is productive at a different time of the day.





Home/Office days: We have an option to work from home on Wednesdays (if you are not personally needed in the office) so you can plan your day accordingly. Working whole day in pajamas and from bed? Sounds good! 





If you would like to join out team, APPLY NOW!

location: 40 Riverview 5 Street, Vinhomes Golden River, District 1, Ho Chi Minh
three_reasons:

We have a TOP-TIER team of talented people
description:
Cinnamon is looking for an Engineering Manager to join our team. This is a key role in the overall success of our organization by coaching and managing our SW engineering team. You will be responsible for leading the team to design and build software products that serve our AI solutions to our big corporate clients as well as Machine Learning platforms to enhance AI development within the company:




1. Manage and oversee the design and development of our products & projects:







External projects: work closely with stakeholders (Sales, Marketing, AI researchers …) within Cinnamon to identify and classify opportunities through combining: 




Mastery of technical pipelines from the top level perspective down to the minutest nuances.




Deeply understand clients’ business & operation.









Internal products: lead 

multinational engineers from Vietnam, Taiwan, Japan

 to design and build software systems in the Cinnamon Machine Learning platform to speed up the AI development life cycle, while ensuring operational robustness, availability, and scale.





Monitor internal stakeholders' outcomes and make improvement through active mentoring.






2. Manage engineering team:






Lead the team's OKRs, direction and growth of members.




Interview software engineer candidates.




Carry out technical leadership to ensure the engineering team’s steady performance by providing guidance and mentorship.











Skills and Experience Required






7+ years working experience in Software Development, 3+ years experience in leading teams. 




Strong problem-solving skills, critical thinking and coaching skills.




Strong understanding of software engineering concepts such as testing, continuous integration, and deployment.




Experienced with software architecture: strong knowledge of design patterns and software architecture styles.




Experienced in designing and building complex systems.




Strong knowledge of containerization, cloud computing and distributed systems (Docker, AWS, Kubernetes, load balancing, API gateway, serverless etc.).




Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English.




Adaptive, flexible, have up-to-date knowledge of the latest changes and trends in software and technology.






Plus:





Knowledge in Machine Learning, Deep Learning.









The chance to work on COOL world-class projects!


We’re not an academic research institute. We’re a global AI product company. Our focus is to create applicable AI products which can bring huge impact to users. In order to do so, our solutions is the combination of innovative AI core technology and solid business understanding. There are 3 main categories:

Image Processing

Voice Recognition

Natural Language Processing


How is our working environment?


We strongly believe that go-global ambition requires international-standard members. Cinnamon will create the best environment for all members to grow toward that goal.


#Grit:
 Ability to stay extremely persistent toward the goal. 


#Innovation:
 Ability to be skeptical of "status quo" thinking.


#Leadership-drivenTeamwork:
 Proactively seek for mutual understanding in any collaboration.


What we will return

- Salary range is above the market
- Laptop provided. GPU, AWS all be ready for model training
- An open, flexible and collaborative working environment
- Happy Monday, Book Club, English Club, Company Trip, Teambuilding acitivities with free snack and drink
- We mostly focus on talent development
- Knowledge sharing sessions from internal and external Experts
- 1 day off & 3 days working online monthly

description:
Tham gia thiết kế, xây dựng và triển khai ứng dụng mobile với React Native;




Xây dựng giao diện người dùng mượt mà, hoàn hảo về độ phân giải trên cả hai nền tảng di động;




Tối ưu native APIs để tích hợp chặt chẽ với các nền tảng;




Liên tục tối ưu và nâng cấp mã nguồn để đảm bảo hiệu quả, ổn định và an toàn;




Chuyển các ứng dụng web React hiện có sang React Native;




Tối ưu hóa trải nghiệm người dùng thông qua việc thực hiện các hoạt họa và chuyển đổi mượt mà, hiện đại











Kiến thức






Cử nhân Khoa học Máy tính hoặc các lĩnh vực khác có kiến thức và kinh nghiệm liên quan




Sử dụng thành thạo JavaScript ES6, TypeScript.




Sử dụng thành thạo XCode, Android Studio.




Hiểu rõ về OOP và Design Pattern.




Hiểu rõ về, React Hook, HOCs, Functional.




Có kinh nghiệm làm việc với REST APIs.




Nắm vững các khái niệm lập trình OOP, mô hình MVC




Có kiến thức về Multithreading, Data structures, Algorithm




Có khả năng thiết kế và tối ưu cơ sở dữ liệu cho ứng dụng có lượng truy cập lớn




Biết cách đẩy ứng dụng lên Apple và Google Play




Ít nhất 1 năm kinh nghiệm làm việc với React Native




Ít nhất 1 năm kinh nghiệm phát triển với 1 trong 1 ngôn ngữ  Android (Java) hoặc iOS (Objective-C, Swift)




Có kinh nghiệm làm việc với GraphQL, Back-end ( Node Js) là một lợi thế.






Kỹ năng






Kỹ năng tư duy logic và thuật toán tốt, phân tích và giải quyết vấn đề 




Kỹ năng giao tiếp tốt cả bằng văn bản và lời nói;  




Kỹ năng lập kế hoạch chi tiết: Liệt kê cụ thể các công việc trong ngày, có phương án tăng năng suất làm việc, tránh tình trạng dồn việc. 




Kỹ năng quản lý thời gian  




Kỹ năng giải quyết vấn đề 




Khả năng quyết đoán và có khả năng phân tích, xử lý vấn đề nhanh chóng. 




Khả năng chịu áp lực cao trong công việc.






Thái độ:






Có tinh thần học hỏi và nâng cao trình độ bản thân;




Đạo đức làm việc tự định hướng, yêu thích sự chủ động để hoàn thành công việc




Tính tò mò và ham học hỏi. Công ty phát triển nhanh chóng, do đó Tính linh hoạt là chìa khóa để tồn tại và phát triển. 




Tính kỷ luật cao




Tinh thần trách nhiệm cao




Tinh thần “can do” trong mọi hoàn cảnh.






Kinh nghiệm và kỹ năng ưu tiên






Có kinh nghiệm và đã đóng góp vào các dự án mã nguồn mở đặc biệt là các công nghệ cho di động




Phát triển thư viện React Native  để hỗ trợ giải quyết các vấn đề phức tạp mà cộng đồng chưa có giải pháp tối ưu hơn;




Có kinh nghiệm làm việc với Swift, Objective C và Java là lợi thế nhưng không bắt buộc;




Có kinh nghiệm khởi tạo và phát triển các ứng dụng di động  vận hành tinh vi;




Biết về thiết kế đối tượng, mẫu thiết kế, kiến ​​trúc client-server và thiết kế cơ sở dữ liệu quan hệ và không quan hệ;




Có kinh nghiệm phát triển các phần mềm dịch vụ dựa trên vị trí với Google Maps hoặc các thư viện phần mềm tương tự;




Có kinh nghiệm về Jenkins hoặc các công cụ tương tự để tích hợp và triển khai liên tục;




Có trải nghiệm về cơ chế đa luồng, quản lý bộ nhớ và bộ nhớ đệm dành riêng cho thiết bị di động;












Uto Tech luôn công bằng, đảm bảo quyền lợi người lao động. Bạn chỉ cần làm tốt công việc của mình mà không cần phải bận tâm đến lợi ích vật chất. Và, Bạn sẽ được hưởng:




Mức lương tương xứng với năng lực




Đầy đủ các chế độ phúc lợi, bảo hiểm 




Xét duyệt cổ phần 2 năm một lần cho các cá nhân có cống hiến




UTO Tech - nơi cho bạn một môi trường đầy cảm hứng




Bạn được tham gia vào phát triển nền tảng du lịch jGooooo mang tầm vóc vĩ mô & được định hướng rõ ràng con đường thăng tiến và xây dựng sự nghiệp trong 10- 15 năm.




Hội đồng Cố vấn của Uto Tech JSC hội tụ những nhân vật có ảnh hưởng lớn, vì có chung lí tưởng làm một điều gì đó Vĩ Đại, một lòng giúp sức cho Khát Vọng xây dựng một sản phẩm xứng tầm Thế Giới, đưa tầm vóc người Việt ra năm châu, biến những điều Bất Khả Thi thành hiện thực. 




Văn phòng công ty được thiết kế Siêu Đẹp trên tuyến đường biển xinh đẹp của Đà Nẵng tạo cảm hứng làm việc. 




Công ty luôn dành nguồn lực cho đào tạo, vui chơi, giải trí cho nhân viên mặc dù là một Start Up trong giai đoạn khó khăn: nhân viên có thể chơi game, Bida, hát karaoke sau những giờ làm việc căng thẳng.




Trở thành thành viên của Uto Tech, bạn sẽ có thêm những người bạn tốt bụng, tích cực, một gia đình lớn.Mọi thành viên trong công ty luôn hỗ trợ nhau hết mình, bạn có thể chậm, nhưng thái độ luôn là thứ được ưu tiên hơn trình độ ở Uto Tech.




Có nguyên một giảng đường để học thêm nhiều thứ hay ho. Công ty thường xuyên tổ chức những buổi chia sẻ bổ ích về công việc, kỹ năng mềm (kỹ năng trình bày, kỹ năng giải quyết vấn đề, kỹ năng giao tiếp,…) và chương trình học Tiếng Anh 30 phút mỗi ngày. 




Ở Uto, bạn không đi làm chỉ để lấy lương, bạn kiến tạo lên Sự Nghiệp. Ở Uto Tech, chúng tôi không tạo ra những người làm công. Chúng tôi tao ra những con người tự kiến tạo nên cuộc đời họ, phát triển gia đình, đóng góp cho xã hội và góp phần thay đổi Thế Giới.

description:
Xác định tầm nhìn, chiến lược và lộ trình sản phẩm với sự hiểu biết sâu sắc về thị trường, đối thủ cạnh tranh và nhu cầu của người dùng




Trực tiếp làm việc với Product Owner để xây dựng và phát triển các chiến lược & lộ trình phát triển sản phẩm




Xác định và phân tích các số liệu dự báo sự thành công và hướng đi của sản phẩm




Dẫn dắt nhóm sản phẩm để phát triển và giám sát lộ trình sản phẩm 




Giám sát và làm việc với nhóm phát triển để đảm bảo tiến độ thời gian và chất lượng sản phẩm, bao gồm và không giới hạn ở: động viên tinh thần anh em, giải quyết những mâu thuẫn trong nội bộ, giải quyết vấn đề nói chung trong quá trình việc, Phân công công việc cho nhân viên cấp dưới dựa trên thế mạnh, kinh nghiệm và kỹ năng của từng cá nhân




Xây dựng và phát triển nhóm sản phẩm tài năng và nâng cao hiệu quả của nhóm




Duy trì kiến ​​thức cập nhật về sản phẩm & tiêu chuẩn UX, xu hướng ngành, phương pháp phát triển sản phẩm & thực tiễn tốt nhất cho nhóm sản phẩm




Phân tích thị trường, kinh doanh và bối cảnh cạnh tranh, hiểu xu hướng của ngành để đổi mới ý tưởng cho sản phẩm




Đề xuất, giám sát các công việc liên quan đến mục tiêu sản phẩm, tiến độ và ngân sách. 




Xác định, phân bổ nhiệm vụ và nguồn lực. 




Phối hợp với các phòng ban để xem xét bổ sung, cải tiến sản phẩm hiện tại của công ty cũng như các vấn đề và giải pháp liên quan. 




Lên kế hoạch chi tiết, dự tính thời gian để theo tiến độ phát triển của sản phẩm. 




Đo lường hiệu quả của việc thực công việc của nhóm phát triển sản phẩm bằng các công cụ và kỹ thuật phù hợp. 




Quản lý và hạn chế thấp nhất những rủi ro có thể xảy ra với sản phẩm. 




Thiết lập và quản lý toàn bộ tài liệu của sản phẩm. 




Hỗ trợ và hướng dẫn các thành viên trong nhóm phát triển sản phẩm về mặt quy trình, nghiệp vụ, kỹ thuật 




Xây dựng và duy trì mối quan hệ với, cấp trên và các bên đối tác liên quan. 




Thực hiện các công việc liên quan khác theo sự chỉ đạo của Product Owneer. 




Đánh giá kết quả công việc thực hiện của nhóm phát triển sản phẩm. 




Báo cáo, ghi nhận thống kê cần thiết để rút kinh nghiệm. 




Chủ động đề xuất các phương án xử lý chức năng trong dự án. 




Báo cáo vấn đề phát sinh lên Product Owner khi không thể tự giải quyết. 










Kiến thức





Tốt nghiệp ngành Khoa học Máy tính hoặc lĩnh vực kỹ thuật liên quan, hoặc kinh nghiệm thực tế tương đương




Có kiến thức tốt về Quản lý dự án 




Có kiến thức về Cơ sở dữ liệu 




Thành thạo các công cụ phần mềm quản lý 




Có chứng chỉ về Scrum và hiểu biết về Agile




Hiểu biết sâu sắc về các phép đo hiệu suất sản phẩm và tối ưu hóa




Thành thạo tin học văn phòng và ít nhất một công cụ hoặc phần mềm hỗ trợ quản lý 




Mức độ phân tích dữ liệu cao, tư duy chiến lược & tư duy phản biện và quản lý các bên liên quan




Thể hiện khả năng phát triển chiến lược sản phẩm dựa trên nghiên cứu, dữ liệu và xu hướng của ngành.




Niềm đam mê và chuyên môn đối với các nền tảng và công nghệ web / di động




Ít nhất 5 năm kinh nghiệm quản lý sản phẩm liên quan làm việc trong môi trường nhịp độ nhanh




Thể hiện kinh nghiệm vững chắc trong nghiên cứu người dùng & thị trường, nghiên cứu UX, cảm giác thẩm mỹ tốt





Kỹ năng





Kỹ năng tư duy logic và thuật toán tốt, phân tích và giải quyết vấn đề 




Kỹ năng giao tiếp tốt cả bằng văn bản và lời nói; 




Kỹ năng giao tiếp tuyệt vời và khả năng giải thích các quyết định kỹ thuật  một cách rõ ràng, bao gồm vấn đề  đang giải quyết, các lựa chọn thay thế cần đề xuât cho đội nhóm. 




Kỹ năng quản lý công việc, tổ chức và phân công công việc cũng như sự cẩn thận, tỉ mỉ trong quá trình thực hiện. 




Kỹ năng lập kế hoạch chi tiết: Liệt kê cụ thể các công việc trong ngày, có phương án tăng năng suất làm việc, tránh tình trạng dồn việc. 




Kỹ năng quản lý thời gian 




Kỹ năng phân bổ đúng việc cho đúng người 




Kỹ năng thấu hiểu khách hàng 




Kỹ năng giải quyết vấn đề 




Khả năng đa nhiệm. 




Khả năng quyết đoán và có khả năng phân tích, xử lý vấn đề nhanh chóng. 




Tư duy logic. 




Đáng tin cậy và độ tín nhiệm cao, đảm bảo hoàn thành mọi điều kiện của sản phẩm




Khả năng chịu áp lực cao trong công việc.




Khả năng đàm phán (với khách hàng, đối tác bên thứ ba,...). 




 Có kỹ năng tiếng Anh nâng cao, cả nói và viết





Thái độ





Đạo đức làm việc tự định hướng, yêu thích sự chủ động để hoàn thành công việc




Tính tò mò và ham học hỏi. Công ty phát triển nhanh chóng, do đó Tính linh hoạt là chìa khóa để tồn tại và phát triển. 




Tính kỷ luật cao




Tinh thần trách nhiệm cao




Tinh thần “can do” trong mọi hoàn cảnh





Kinh nghiệm và kỹ năng ưu tiên





Bạn yêu thích du lịch và sản phẩm liên quan đến mạng xã hội dành cho người đi du lịch




Bạn có tinh thần kinh doanh




Bạn đã có kinh nghiệm xây dựng mạng xã hội, sản phẩm liên quan đến việc hỗ trợ/ tìm kiếm về du lịch từ đầu là một điểm cộng




Bạn có kinh nghiệm thúc đẩy tăng trưởng ứng dụng dành cho thiết bị di động với trọng tâm là cải thiện mức độ tương tác và giữ chân người dùng là một điểm cộng rất lớn.












Uto Tech luôn công bằng, đảm bảo quyền lợi người lao động. Bạn chỉ cần làm tốt công việc của mình mà không cần phải bận tâm đến lợi ích vật chất. Và, Bạn sẽ được hưởng:




Mức lương tương xứng với năng lực




Đầy đủ các chế độ phúc lợi, bảo hiểm 




Xét duyệt cổ phần 2 năm một lần cho các cá nhân có cống hiến





UTO Tech - nơi cho bạn một môi trường đầy cảm hứng






Bạn được tham gia vào phát triển nền tảng du lịch jGooooo mang tầm vóc vĩ mô & đ
ược định hướng rõ ràng con đường thăng tiến và xây dựng sự nghiệp trong 10- 15 năm.




Hội đồng Cố vấn của Uto Tech JSC hội tụ những nhân vật có ảnh hưởng lớn, vì có chung lí tưởng làm một điều gì đó Vĩ Đại, một lòng giúp sức cho Khát Vọng xây dựng một sản phẩm xứng tầm Thế Giới, đưa tầm vóc người Việt ra năm châu, biến những điều Bất Khả Thi thành hiện thực. 




Văn phòng công ty được thiết kế Siêu Đẹp trên tuyến đường biển xinh đẹp của Đà Nẵng tạo cảm hứng làm việc. 




Công ty luôn dành nguồn lực cho đào tạo, vui chơi, giải trí cho nhân viên mặc dù là một Start Up trong giai đoạn khó khăn: nhân viên có thể chơi game, Bida, hát karaoke sau những giờ làm việc căng thẳng.




Trở thành thành viên của Uto Tech, bạn sẽ có thêm những người bạn tốt bụng, tích cực, một gia đình lớn.Mọi thành viên trong công ty luôn hỗ trợ nhau hết mình, bạn có thể chậm, nhưng thái độ luôn là thứ được ưu tiên hơn trình độ ở Uto Tech.




Có nguyên một giảng đường để học thêm nhiều thứ hay ho. Công ty thường xuyên tổ chức những buổi chia sẻ bổ ích về công việc, kỹ năng mềm (kỹ năng trình bày, kỹ năng giải quyết vấn đề, kỹ năng giao tiếp,…) và chương trình học Tiếng Anh 30 phút mỗi ngày.

description:
Be an integral member of the software development team for one of the leading German Veterinary Practice Management System providers, that builds and supports applications for external customers, drives all aspects of the software development lifecycle including design, development, test, deployment/provisioning.



Develop innovative software with an emphasis on desktop, server, and web applications


Deliver projects on-time and to specification with an appropriate level of quality


Conduct unit test, performance test, functional tests and carry out system documentation


Provide the system with database scripts and verify data integrity among sub-systems/external systems


Provide technical support during implementation/production of the system


Interact and follow up with customers, cross-functional teams to deliver projects


Reports to software manager/project manager on system development status









Must have:




Degree in Computer Science, Engineering or equivalent


Minimum 
5 years
 of working experience in software development and system support



Good English communication skill




Good organization, time management skill



Knowledge of software configuration management, source control systems, and DevOps.


Complete at least 1 full SDLC cycle in a sizable software systems development program (Eg Agile)



Proficient in .NET C# or VB.NET, Window Form, WPF, Web API, IIS, and SQL Server database



Proficient in RDBMS and DB scripts, e.g MS SQL Server


Experience in developing RESTful based web services preferred


Experience in using Azure DevOps, JIRA, or similar tools


Self-motivated individuals with the ability to learn and develop independently with minimum supervision


A team player who possesses good interpersonal, communication skills and the ability to work independently and in a team


Experience with CI/CD such as TeamCity, Advanced Installer, Windows Service Installation, System Center Installer...


Demonstrate the design pattern, system design, and workflow of features.



3+ years SQL development



Minimum of 3+ years’ experience in database development and administration (stored procedures, functions, tables, indices, optimizing queries, etc)



Knowledge of database architecture, data modeling, schema design and development




Strong experience in Database Performance Tuning and Query Optimization




Good experience in SQL Server, MySQL



Good experience on Database Analysis and Design skills




Nice to have:




Experience in designing and delivering high-availability, scalable cloud-based systems


Familiarity in other languages like VB.NET, Javascript, NodeJS…


Knowledge in creating and maintaining simple application installers, Windows services


Experience in multiple technology hats, working on a variety of areas like back-end, front-end, client, mobile


Experience in refactoring aspects of a significant codebase


You enjoy mentoring and growing junior engineers


Experience in Data Analysis is an advantage



Experience with Database migration is an advantage



Leadership skill is an advantage










Excellent salary with good benefit.


Allocate modern working devices:
 
Laptop, Macbook, Second Monitor, Test Phone, etc...


Year End Bonus.


Bao Viet Health Insurance.


Compulsory insurance according toVietnam Labor Law.

Salary: competitive

Challenging working environment with attractive domain as Logistics 

Competitive salary and 13th-month pay

description:
Netcompany is currently looking for an Infrastructure Engineer to join our international Infrastructure team, which is a part of Netcompany Operations, on a permanent basis. You will join our strong and dedicated team based in Ho Chi Minh City, where you will have the opportunity to work closely with skilled colleagues in Vietnam, as well as our colleagues in Europe.


You will become part of an ambitious team, which ensures our operation and support of client solutions as well as internal systems.


Your daily work will contain:



Maintaining Microsoft-based environments for various projects based on SharePoint, Microsoft SQL servers, CRM and others


Participating in project work, as a part of development cycle, providing high level of availability of applications and systems based on SLA requirements


Reporting internally on tasks, activities and SLA goals.


Responding to customer requests, change management cycle, incidents etc. based on ITIL practices.









Are you experienced, ambitious and ready to take your career to the next level?



As a minimum, you must have the following technical competencies:




Good knowledge of Microsoft infrastructure and servers


Understanding TCP/IP from a server technical perspective


Experience writing scripts in PowerShell


Good understanding of Cloud Security principles


Knowledge of Azure and other Cloud Solutions


You need to be proficient in English, both written and spoken
 




It is also important that you:




Have an IT – related Degree


Are able to plan and manage your time


Have the ability to create technical documentation


Have at least two years of working experience


Have the ability to present your ideas to others


Have a great customer service mindset



It will be 
a plus
 if you have experience of Linux, and a 
big plus
 if you know MCSA.






You will be working on some of the largest, most complex and technically innovative IT solutions and projects for some of the most prestigious organizations in the world. As our new colleague, you will work with a lot of different and exciting solutions and technologies. You will get the chance to work with different programming languages and technologies as this will vary from project to project. 

A large part of our projects use technologies like Angular, React and node.js for the front-end, and Java or .NET for the back-end. Besides that, we work with SharePoint, Microsoft Dynamics CRM, Salesforce, Microsoft SQL-server, Sitecore, Oracle, Weblogic, and various DevOps tools, to name just a few. We are technology agnostic, stay up to date on new technologies, and always choose the right technology for the task .

In Netcompany we focus on improving your skills while you work on different projects. Our career development program and model are essential to ensure that we all keep improving continuously. Once you start working for Netcompany, you are automatically enrolled in our Netcompany Academy and mentoring program, where we focus on different areas ranging from developing technical skills to more personal skills.

In summary, there are several reasons why you will love to work for Netcompany in Vietnam:



Clear Academy system and mentoring program to help you develop your career within Netcompany


Performance appraisal twice a year to guarantee constructive feedback


Professional Scandinavian working environment that values innovation, creativity and new ideas along with being supportive, fun and flexible


Advanced technical solutions, agile culture and the opportunity to work with the latest technologies


Attractive salary that is adjusted annually based on your performance along with an annual performance bonus


Attractive Healthcare insurance program for you and your family.


Annual company trip


Various training on trending technologies, best practices, and soft skills


Management and leadership are accessible and encourage input from employees.


Working with a variety of clients and colleagues all over the world


Social and sports activities hosted by Netcompany After Dark (Friday bar, go-kart, BBQ, escape room, football, badminton, table tennis etc.)



We are growing rapidly in our Vietnam office, and therefore we are recruiting qualified  
Developers and Consultants with various technical competencies 
 in  
Ho Chi Minh City.



Sounds like something for you? 


Click the  
‘Apply Now’
  button!


We are an equal opportunities employer and welcome applications from all suitably qualified candidates regardless of sex, race, age, religion, or ethnicity.

description:
Tham gia triển khai dự án nền tảng ngân hàng số, trực tiếp lập trình và hỗ trợ các thành viên khác trong nhóm lập trình (sử dụng công nghệ Java 8/SpringBoot/MSA/K8s)


Tiếp nhận yêu cầu nghiệp vụ và triển khai trên nền tảng công nghệ số


Làm rõ yêu cầu nghiệp vụ, trao đổi với Frontend để thống nhất API contract và triển khai đúng tiến độ. Thực hiện phân tách chức năng, module hóa và tham gia design Database theo các best practices và design patterns.


Thực hiện Unit test, hỗ trợ nghiệm thu SIT và UAT


Phối hợp các bộ phận liên quan như OpenAPI/ESB/Core/Thẻ và các hệ thống khác


Viết các tài liệu phần mềm, luồng xử lý, hướng dẫn triển khai hệ thống công nghệ số










Tốt nghiệp Đại học tại các trường chính quy, ưu tiên ĐH Quốc Gia Hà Nội, ĐH Bách Khoa, ĐH Khoa học tự nhiên, ĐH Kinh tế quốc dân, Học viện Ngân hàng, Học viện BCVT, Đại học FPT…


Có kỹ năng làm việc nhóm, có tinh thần trách nhiệm cao.


Tối thiểu 2 năm tham gia liên tục vào các dự án Java ở mảng Backend


Đặc biệt ưu tiên kinh nghiệm với Java 8, Spring Boot, Hibernate, Rest APIs, MSA, design patterns










Phỏng vấn online trong thời gian dịch bệnh, work from home trong thời gian giãn cách


Mức lương: Upto 2000$


Thử việc 100% lương, thu nhập khoảng 15-18 tháng/năm


Thưởng dự án và thưởng cuối năm cao


Môi trường làm việc sáng tạo, hiện đại, quản lý theo tiến độ và hiệu quả công việc, giờ làm việc linh hoạt


Đội ngũ lãnh đạo thân thiện, hòa đồng, quan tâm đến sự phát triển của các cá nhân


Nhân viên được đào đạo tận tình các kĩ năng mềm và nghiệp vụ chuyên sâu


Không khí vui vẻ, đồng nghiệp trẻ trung, năng động


Nhiều hoạt động tập thể lý thú và ý nghĩa: bóng đá, karaoke, đi phượt, du lịch, từ thiện hàng năm


Trợ cấp thai sản cho nhân viên nữ


Tổ chức khám sức khỏe tổng quát định kỳ hàng năm, mua thêm gói bảo hiểm sức khỏe cho nhân viên ngoài Bảo hiểm y tế

description:
ABOUT THE JOB


Join our team to build various components of a real-time data activation platform. You will work with our engineers in Vietnam and the US, together with the business team to implement new product features as well as to provide your support on technical clarification for non-technical members.


WE ARE LOOKING FOR A PERSON, WHO WILL​




Write high-quality, well-tested code for back-end services.


Work closely with other members (Engineering, Product, QC) to discuss and challenge product requirements and solutions that solve users' problems.


Actively participate in code review and technical grooming sessions.


Contribute to defining and shaping the fundamentals of engineering for the team.











5 years or more of professional software development experience (any languages).




Highly interested in Golang and hungry to work with it.




Strong computer science foundation.




Good at database & security skills.



Good understanding and knowledge of applying best engineering practices.


Understanding of system performance and scaling.


Excellent interpersonal and independent working skills.


Fast learning and passionate about picking up new technologies.


Strong critical thinking and problem-solving skills.


A "can-do attitude" and a product mindset.



Confidence in communicating in English.











Flexible working time.


Great salary package. Annual performance review.


13th-salary Bonus for all staff.


Premium Healthcare Insurance Package and Annual Health Check-up for all staff.


Loyalty Employee Bonus.


Good career advancement opportunities.


Product-oriented. Agile project management style. Dynamic and English-speaking working environment.


Opportunity to acquire technical knowledge and experience in the latest technologies.


At least 17 annual leaves.


Working hours: 8 hours x 5 days/week (Monday to Friday). Thirty-min break at 4 PM every day.



And so much more!​​




If this interest you, please contact us for a coffee. So we can share and learn more about you.

description:
WHO WE ARE




Restaff - House of Norway is an experienced Norwegian offshore development company that focuses on software development with a remote staffing/dedicated team model.


The team is responsible for creating a brand of new digital financial platforms and apps that are highly reliable and scalable using modern engineering practices. You will be joining a product which talented software engineers in our team who is responsible for designing, building and maintaining the new digital banking platform and the customer channels. As part of the team, you will be responsible for implementing software features, involve in technical designs and writing tests to ensure the high-quality delivery of the product. The teams operate in Scrum and DevOps model.


We’re looking for top engineers out there! During the interview process, we will test your coding and design skills to assess your experience and depth of knowledge. Don’t worry our interview process will be fun!




WE ARE LOOKING FOR A PERSON, WHO WILL​




Be willing to work on the entire stack, from infrastructure, API to front-end and even data analytics in the future.


Be a great team player that shares their knowledge and willing to do what it tasks to help their teams deliver.


Solve complex technical and business problems and learn new technology and frameworks.


Drive best practice cybersecurity solutions and remain at the forefront of emerging industry practices.


Provide technical direction for the development, design, and systems integration for client engagement from the definition phase through implementation.


Follow Development Best practices, Development Technology direction/roadmap and application.


Facilitate team and other stakeholders meetings and deliver engaging, informative, well-organized presentations.​









A POTENTIAL CANDIDATE WILL HAVE




Have very strong knowledge, at least 4 years experience


Deep understanding of Object-Oriented programming, OOP design patterns, and the SOLID principles.


Strong experience in Git source control, Git Flow branching model, CI/CD pipeline using TeamCity or equivalent.


Strong problem-solving skills, able to work individually as well as in a team.


Collaboration and culture fit in the Agile experience will be an advantage.


Good English skills.




A BIG PLUS IF YOU HAVE




Have basic knowledge, at least 1 year of experience, in developing frontend applications for at least one of the following areas: Android native app, iOS native app or Modern Web using HTML5, CSS 3, ES6 and React JS/Angular 2x or similar.


Experience in developing a distributed system based on Microservices architecture, Event-driven architecture using Spring Cloud, Netflix stack, Kafka, Redis, ELK, Apache Camel, Camunda BPM etc.


Experience in AWS, Ansible, Packer, Docker, Rancher, K8s.


Experienced in automated testing frameworks.


Experience working in the banking and financial domain.










Great salary package. Annual performance review.


13th-salary Bonus for all staff.


Premium Healthcare Insurance Package and Annual Health Check-up for all staff.


Loyalty Employee Bonus.


Good career advancement opportunities.


Product-oriented. Agile project management style. Dynamic and English-speaking working environment.


Opportunity to acquire technical knowledge and experience in the latest technologies.


At least 17 annual leaves.


Working hours: 8 hours x 5 days/week (Monday to Friday). Thirty-min break at 4 PM every day.



And so much more!​




If this interest you, please contact us for a coffee. So we can share and learn more about you.

description:
About Knorex


Established in 2010, Knorex is a cutting edge advertising technology MNC with offices across USA, Australia, China, Singapore, Vietnam, India, Thailand and Malaysia. Knorex provides Precision Performance Marketing products and solutions to the world’s leading brands and media agencies. With its full-stack platform, Knorex XPO™ () supplies the technology platform to deliver the right marketing message to the right audience at the right moment and right place, underpinned by a multi-layered data-driven approach. Knorex XPO shields its customers from dealing with the complexity and fuss while delivering immersive, dynamic and personalized marketing experiences that connects with their users. Knorex also provides managed services to complement its offering.


Description




Administer our network and our cloud-based Linux servers, while working with other team members to ensure the timely maintenance and roll-out of the planned systems and resources.


Work closely with our cross-country teams located regionally to Learn about the business and technical requirements and formulate the necessary infrastructure and resource plans to properly support the growth and maintainability of various systems.


Work, developing ways to assess and monitor the stability and efficiency of the various systems.


Work with other members to ensure proper allocation of systems resource to support both business and technical execution.


Communicate with our business and technical teams to understand their various systems requirements


Evaluate and identify new technologies/practices for implementation.


Guide, mentor and coach team members on their progression and development of technical and personal skills.


Setting up KPIs/ goals for the staff and drive them to achieve the required results and goals.










5-9 years of experience in similar position


Experience of Unix/Linux system, experienced with managing cloud servers (e.g., EC2)


Strong knowledge of K8S, experienced with docker applications


Hands on experience in HTTP protocol and technical infrastructure of a common website: web servers, database, load balancer, etc.


Strong scripting in Bash/ shell, python


Cloud platforms: GCP/ AWS.


DevOps tools experience in Jenkins, git, github, MAVEN etc.


Prior experience in handing a department/team










Competitive salary, quarterly bonus, 13rd month salary


18 Annual leave days/year


SHUI Insurance as law stipulated


Premium Bao Viet Health Insurance


Personal Development Fund for courses and materials.


Macbook provided


Ample opportunities to grow. You get to propose your own ideas and see it through.


Work with passionate, talented and driven colleagues who get things done!


Opportunity to work cross-country and with variety of projects of different nature.


Challenging and exciting problems that await you to solve.

description:
[WORK ANY WHERE]



JOB SUMMARY


Inspectorio's Fullstack Engineers are responsible for ideating and developing products that solve problems in the supply chain by architecting scalable, extensible, and highly available services. At Inspectorio, we value engineers that have high levels of curiosity, attention to detail, and are great team players.

As a Fullstack Engineer, you will collaborate closely with product owners to consult technical approaches, other engineers to design technical solutions, QAs to maintain the quality, and yourself to continuously bring improvements to the team and the product.

You are also the bridge to collaborate with our client's IT department to develop our Integration capabilities with high performance and extensibility.


RESPONSIBILITIES




Work in full functional squads to brainstorm, design, develop, deliver and maintain our products and integration capabilities.


Collaborate with our client's IT department to integrate our client system with our products.


Consult the technical approaches, design the architecture and make it happen.


Monitor the quality, bug fixing, refactoring, and optimizing performance.


Continuously contribute ideas for improvement.


Play with the SaaS platform and solve the problems with performance, dynamic structure, scalability.


Mentor other members.









REQUIREMENTS




Deep understanding of how to build high performance, decoupled, testable, maintainable code.


Deep knowledge of coding standards, design patterns, refactoring skills, and unit tests.


Deep knowledge of backend development using
 Python/NodeJS
 or other backend languages.


Deep knowledge of UI/UX and frontend development using Javascript/ReactJS/Angular.


Deep knowledge of Relational/NoSQL databases.


Experience in Message Queue.


Experience in Restful API.


Good English communication skills.




COMPETENCIES




Experience in Flask/Django.


Experience in Celery.


Experience in PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB, Elasticsearch


Experience in Microservices.


Experience in Google Cloud, Docker, K8s.


Experience in Agile development.


Experience in mentoring members.









PERKS



Competitive Salary


At Inspectorio, we only work with the best of the best. That’s why, if we invite you to join us, it’s because we recognize your amazing skills, value, and potential. It probably wasn’t easy for you to become this awesome, so we make sure to reward you for it.


Full Project Ownership


Are you an inventor? Want to start a new internship program? How about a soccer tournament? Or a whole new department within the company? Whatever it is that you want to do, we’re here to listen, and if your idea is good, we’ll give you all the resources you need to make it happen. When any Inspectorian wins, we all win.


Personal and Professional Growth


Inspectorians are our most valuable resource, so we make sure to invest heavily in them. All Inspectorians are eligible for funding to attend conferences, take courses, present their research, and more. This on top of the continuous mentoring and guidance you’ll receive guarantees you’ll grow as a professional and as a human while at Inspectorio.


Fun, Fun, Fun


We put our money where your smiles are. Company-sponsored trips, weekly parties, sporting events, and more. We make sure that Inspectorians enjoy coming to work by promoting as much fun as we can.


International Work Experience


We are going to take over the world.... Perhaps not quite, but we are a global company that thrives from the interactions between our different offices. Join us to work alongside Belarusians in Vietnam, Mexicans in Minsk, Filipinos in China and more.


Our Values



EXCELLENCE


We pursue mastery and craftmanship. “Good enough” is our enemy.

We have a thirst and desire for knowledge and continuous improvement because there’s always an opportunity to be better.

We always find time to help and learn from others.


AUTONOMY


We act independently when we recognize an opportunity for improvement.

We seek guidance, alignment, and clear goals instead of orders or hand-holding.

We self-assess the quality and impact of our work, identify opportunities to improve and make changes proactively.


COURAGE


We share our opinion and insights, even if it’s uncomfortable.

We are candid and direct with everyone we work with.

We are willing to experiment and try something new, even if we’re not sure it will succeed.


HUMBLENESS


We crave opportunities to learn from the people around us.

We focus on listening to other perspectives because we know we don’t have all the answers or best solutions.

We recognize that vanity and ego are the enemies of great ideas and outstanding products.

description:
[WORK ANY WHERE]



JOB SUMMARY


We are looking for a Front-End Web Developer who is motivated to combine the art of design with the art of programming. Responsibilities will include translation of the UI/UX design wireframes and detailed requirements to actual code, that will produce high-quality working functions for our clients with stunning visual elements of the application.

You will work with the Product Owner/Business Analyst to understand not only the product requirement but also the context from our clients on how our features solve their real problems. Besides, you will also work with UI/UX designers and other developers/leaders to bridge the gap between graphical design and technical implementation, taking an active role on both sides and defining how the application looks as well as how it works.

We expect you to be a tech-savvy professional, who is curious about new digital technologies and aspires to combine usability with visual design.


RESPONSIBILITIES




Work with other team members to understand the requirements, technical solutions and deliver high-quality, well-tested code.


Work with the team to continuously improve our products’ UI and UX to bring the best experiences to users.


Programming with modern frameworks/libraries such as Angular/React.


Not only implementing new features, but also building reusable code/components for future use.


Optimize application for maximum speed and scalability.


Ensure the technical feasibility of UI/UX designs.


Assure that all user input is validated before submitting to back-end.


Collaborate with other team members (backend, product, marketing, design) to deliver features that solve users' problems.









REQUIREMENTS





At least 3 years experience in web development.



Extensive knowledge and understanding of JavaScript.


Top-notch coding skills with Angular (preferred), ReactJS or VueJS.


Have good knowledge and hands-on expertise with Reactive programming, RxJS, and Typescript.


Proficient in using CSS preprocessor scripting languages, such as SASS and LESS.


Strong computer science foundation.


Fast learning and passionate about picking up new technologies.


Good English communication skills.


Excellent interpersonal and independent working skills.


Strong critical thinking and problem-solving skills.


Experience with Agile methodologies (Scrum, Kanban).




PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS



Experience with Angular.








OUR PRODUCTS


Inspectorio is a 
cloud-based SaaS solution
 focused on creating a dynamic and risk-assessment based Quality and Compliance program with the goal of generating more sustainable and transparent supply chains. Our network is a one-stop-shop platform where all key stakeholders in the production process can connect to execute, monitor, and report on Quality and Compliance activities.

Our products provide digitization, automation, transparency, and traceability, with a strong focus on 
Advanced analytics, Artificial Intelligence (AI) & Machine Learning
. This enables us to leverage customer data for predictive insights and dynamic risk-based interventions.


OUR CUSTOMERS



Today, we work with many of the 
world’s leading brands and retailers,
 and thousands of vendors and factory organizations across the globe to bring unparalleled levels of visibility, transparency, and accuracy to their quality, sustainability, and compliance initiatives! 



Our customers include Target, Kohl's, Mango, Crocs, Carter…and many more. Further details about our customers can be found on our website:



OUR PEOPLE & CULTURE





Highly diversed, global team made up of engineers, data sciences, entrepreneurs, artists and others with multidisciplinary backgrounds. 




International environment with open, supportive and dynamic culture where all your voices are heard and you are safe to fail. 




Inspiring and thoughtful leadership team





OUR PERKS & BENEFITS




 Flexible Working Mode



Our 
Work From Anywhere  
and
 Unlimited PAID Annual Leave 
policy will let you choose your working locations and decide how long you can take your annual leave, in order to achieve your 
Work-life balance 
the way you want it! 



Competitive Salary



At Inspectorio, we only work with the best of the best. That’s why, if we invite you to join us, it’s because we recognize your amazing skills, value, and potential. It probably wasn’t easy for you to become this awesome, so we make sure to reward you for it.



International Work Experience



We are going to take over the world.... Perhaps not quite, but we are a global company that thrives from the interactions between our different offices. Join us to work alongside Belarusians in Vietnam, Mexicans in Minsk, Filipinos in China and more.



Personal and Professional Growth



Inspectorians are our most valuable resource, so we make sure to invest heavily in them. All Inspectorians are eligible for funding to attend conferences, take courses, present their research, and more. This on top of the continuous mentoring and guidance you’ll receive guarantees you’ll grow as a professional and as a human while at Inspectorio.



Full Project Ownership



Are you an inventor? Want to start a new internship program? How about a soccer tournament? Or a whole new department within the company? Whatever it is that you want to do, we’re here to listen, and if your idea is good, we’ll give you all the resources you need to make it happen. When any Inspectorian wins, we all win.



Fun, Fun, Fun



We put our money where your smiles are. Company-sponsored trips, weekly parties, sporting events, and more. We make sure that Inspectorians enjoy coming to work by promoting as much fun as we can.


OUR VALUES




EXCELLENCE



We pursue mastery and craftmanship. “Good enough” is our enemy.

We have a thirst and desire for knowledge and continuous improvement because there’s always an opportunity to be better.

We always find time to help and learn from others.



AUTONOMY



We act independently when we recognize an opportunity for improvement.

We seek guidance, alignment, and clear goals instead of orders or hand-holding.

We self-assess the quality and impact of our work, identify opportunities to improve and make changes proactively.



COURAGE



We share our opinion and insights, even if it’s uncomfortable.

We are candid and direct with everyone we work with.

We are willing to experiment and try something new, even if we’re not sure it will succeed.



HUMBLENESS



We crave opportunities to learn from the people around us.

We focus on listening to other perspectives because we know we don’t have all the answers or best solutions.

We recognize that vanity and ego are the enemies of great ideas and outstanding products.

description:

• Test các sản phẩm hoặc dự án phần mềm, phối hợp với các team và phòng ban khác đảm bảo chất lượng của sản phẩm / dự án 
• Nắm bắt và hỗ trợ công việc kiểm soát đánh giá thực hiện quy trình phát triển phần mềm, đánh giá chất lượng sản phẩm trước khi triển khai chính thức 
• Thực hiện các công việc khác theo phân công của quản lý trực tiếp 






- Tối thiểu 1 năm kinh nghiệm làm việc
- Có kiến thức & kỹ năng cơ bản về CNTT: Cấu trúc phần mềm, cấu trúc dữ liệu, các công nghệ/ứng dụng/ nền tảng CNTT.
- Khả năng giao tiếp hiệu quả với đối tác triển khai, nhà cung cấp giải pháp, các nhóm nội bộ và các bộ phận khác để thu thập và trao đổi các yêu cầu nghiệp vụ/chức năng.
- Có tư duy tốt về phân tích hệ thống, phân tích hiệu suất.
- Có hiểu biết về kiểm thử phần mềm như các giai đoạn kiểm thử (Unit test, Integration test,Functional test, System test, Acceptance test ,…) và các kỹ thuật kiểm thử.
- Có hiểu biết về mô hình phát triển phần mềm: Agile, Water fall, V-model.


Yêu cầu kỹ năng mềm (kỹ năng làm việc nhóm, lập kế hoạch, quản lý công việc,..):

- Kỹ năng quản lý, lập kế hoạch tốt.
- Trung thực, cẩn thận, khả năng bao quát và kỹ năng xử lý tình huống tốt;
- Tư duy sáng tạo, có khả năng nắm bắt, học hỏi kỹ thuật mới nhanh. Có khả năng tự học, tự nghiên cứu;
- Có khả năng làm việc tự chủ và làm việc theo nhóm;
- Tinh thần làm việc hăng hái, có trách nhiệm, thái độ cầu tiến trong công việc.


Yêu cầu khác:


- Có ngoại hình ưa nhìn là 1 lợi thế
- Sức khỏe tốt, đảm phảm bám sát được quá trình làm việc của các nhóm sản phẩm/dự án






- Môi trường trẻ trung, năng động, lộ trình thăng tiến rõ ràng.

- Dịch vụ tiện ích cho nhân viên: Bi-a, bóng bàn, và hoạt động thể thao hàng tuần: bóng đá,..

- Thưởng ngày lễ 2/9, 30/4, 1/5, ,.. theo tình hình kinh doanh của công ty.

- Du lịch 01 năm/lần, free 100% cho cả gia đình (có áp dụng đối với nhân viên thử việc)

- Review lương 01 lần/năm, có chính sách review lương bất thường đối với các TH nhân viên có nhiều cố gắng hoặc được đánh giá cao trong công việc (tự nhân viên/leader đề xuất or lãnh đạo trực tiếp đề xuất)

- Được tự chủ quản lý công việc và phát triển bản thân

description:
We are looking for a QA Leader to assess software quality. You will be responsible for finding and reporting bugs and glitches.



In this role, you should have a keen eye for detail and excellent communication skills. If you are also competent in executing test cases and are passionate about quality, we’d like to meet you.



Ultimately, you will ensure that our products, applications and systems work correctly.



KEY JOB DUTIES





Review requirements, specifications and technical design documents to provide timely and feedbacks




Create detailed, comprehensive and well-structured test plans and test cases




Estimate, prioritize, plan and coordinate testing activities




Design, develop and execute automation scripts




Identify, record, document thoroughly and track bugs




Perform thorough regression testing when bugs are resolved




Develop and apply testing processes for new and existing products to meet client needs




Liaise with internal teams (e.g. developers and product managers) to identify system requirements




Monitor debugging process results




Investigate the causes of non-conforming software and train users to implement solutions




Track quality assurance metrics, like defect densities and open defect counts




Stay up-to-date with new testing tools and test strategies










KNOWLEDGE:





Proven work experience in software development




Proven work experience in software quality assurance




Strong knowledge of software QA methodologies, tools and processes




Experience in writing clear, concise and comprehensive test plans and test cases




Hands-on experience with both white box and black box testing




Hands-on experience with automated testing tools




Solid knowledge of SQL and scripting is a [;us




Experience working in an Agile/Scrum development process




Experience with performance and/or security testing is a plus





SKILLS:





Identify Test case scenario




Write test case




Reporting and synthesis




Problem-solving & troubleshooting




Bug report, bug follow up




Time Management




Team lead skill





ABILITIES:





Working with Work Management Tool: Jira




Analyzing & creating test cases




English reading & communication




Prioritization, Time Management




Quick learner




Work Ethics




Passion for games




Growth Mindset









LET'S WORK TOGETHER 

At MECURY STUDIO, We care all about your benefits so that you can focus on working without worries. Moreover, you can work with young, enthusiastic colleague and experienced leader in professional working place.


Benefit :




Working Monday-Friday ( 9:00AM- 18:00PM)


Bonus for staff of Month


13th month Salary.


Performance bonus from 01-06 months salary.


Remaining annual leave days are paid.


Other benefits as per stated in Vietnamese Labor Law


Team building, company trip


Bao Viet Healthy Insurance


Additional allowance for birthdays, weddings, funeral,..


Other basic benefits.

DESIRABLE:

Có kinh nghiệm làm việc với Golang từ 1 - 1.5 năm trở lên.


Có tư duy sáng tạo khi nghiên cứu giải pháp để giải quyết vấn đề.


Có tư duy logic, thuật toán tốt.


Sở hữu tinh thần làm việc của startup: chủ động, chịu khó học hỏi, có trách nhiệm trong công việc.


Hiểu và dùng được các công cụ CI/CD đã được dựng sẵn.




Yêu cầu khác:




Ưu tiên bạn đã có kinh nghiệm dùng go-ethereum.


Có kiến thức về EVM là điểm cộng.


Ưu tiên các bạn đọc hiểu được code solidity.


Có kinh nghiệm làm việc với các hệ cơ sở dữ liệu Postgres, MongoDB, TimescaleDB








 



Có cơ hội để được học tập làm việc với các hệ thống và ứng dụng xây dựng trên blockchain.


Có thể học hỏi kinh nghiệm xây dựng một dự án trên blockchain từ đầu.



Lương thưởng cạnh tranh 1.500$ ~ 3.000$





Tuần làm việc 5 ngày + 1 ngày tự học theo team
 (Tham gia các buổi tự học, training, lighting talk)...



Hồ sơ yêu cầu:



CV đính kèm ảnh 3*4 bằng tiếng Việt hoặc tiếng Anh nêu rõ quá trình công tác, kinh nghiệm, sở thích cá nhân, điểm mạnh, điểm yếu …


Ưu tiên các ứng viên gửi hồ sơ sớm


Lưu ý: Chỉ liên hệ với hồ sơ đạt yêu cầu

description:
About the project:


Joining one of Asia’s most exciting startups as part of the pioneer team in Vietnam! Our ride-hailing application is Asia’s 1st blockchain on-demand ride-booking service. This is the first zero-commission truck platform that connects thousands of logistics and trucking companies in Vietnam.

The successful candidate will be responsible for leading a development team, software design as well as coordinating with stakeholders.


Responsibilities




Perform native mobile development tasks and work with back-end developers, designers to complete the features on time.


Perform the unit tests, code review, and quality assurance.


Perform mobile app deployment and maintenance 









Requirement




At least 5 years working experience in mobile app development, with at least 3 years of native app hands-on experience.


Good understanding of SDLC and Agile methodologies.


Good English communication.


Considering the architecture of programs not just only features.


Proficiency in Swift or Kotlin programming languages.


Autolayout experiences.


Basic understanding of async network process & handling.


Understanding & experience in MVVM Architecture.


Experience for releasing a mobile app to store.


Able to manage APNS, FCM related jobs per different apps.


Preferable if having experience with SAAS.








Being a Middle/Senior Mobile Developer (Android, iOS Native) at Fetch Technology, you will experience a youthful, flexible and creative work environment:



Opportunities to be part of the pioneer team of a fast-growing start-up making an impact on the mobility landscape in Vietnam.


A platform to develop your career through working closely with senior executives and managers in the organization.


A fulfilling role with lots of learning opportunities in a fun and highly motivating working environment.


Working in a professional, friendly, well-equipped environment both with seniors, foreigners and Vietnamese.


Extensive on job training, you will always have a chance to work with new emerging technologies.


Full social insurance, health insurance & unemployment insurance according to Vietnam Labor Law.


12-day annual leave per year.


Attractive salary, 13th month bonus and other benefits.


Premium Health Care.
