description:
At GeoComply, our mission is to 
empower the future of digital trust
. We operate at the center of a new generation of cybersecurity companies, leveraging today's geolocation data to make better risk-based decisions. Working as a critical piece of the security infrastructure for some of the world’s largest tech companies like 
DraftKings, FanDuel, the BBC, and Akamai
, we are the 
global market leader
 for compliance-grade geolocation data and a critical piece of the decision engine. We have big plans in the next few years, including a targeted 
US IPO
 and various 
M&A opportunities.


At the heart of it all is people - we are deeply committed to creating and sustaining a world-class experience for our employees, customers, and partners.

We are looking for a
 Senior Python Data Engineer 
to join our team in 
HCMC, Vietnam who will match our ambitions
, and help us Better ourselves and achieve our goals.

The Senior Python Data Engineer contributes to GeoComply's success by building the data pipelines to transform the raw data into business insights which assist our company as well as our customers in the decision-making process.

Our ideal candidate has at least five (5) years of working experience as a Data Engineer and relevant experience in database technologies such as MySQL and NoSQL. You have experience in setting up the data pipelines in your previous companies. You are able to, and enjoy, working across multiple teams across locations, have good communication and interpersonal skills. You have proven your ability to work under tight timelines in your previous work experience and are highly organized and detail-oriented.

You are able to, and enjoy, working with multiple teams across locations, have good communication and interpersonal skills. You have experience working in short, agile, iterative development cycles and have a great passion for working in agile development process environments.


In this role, you will:




Understand the business, knowledge, and insight.


Develop, transform large datasets and maintain robust data pipelines that can support various use cases with high performance.


Generate automated reports for customers with high-quality stand


Develop and maintain interactive reporting tools.


Stay informed of database changes to ensure reports are always working as expected.


Coordinate with the Engineering team on release cycles and operational suggestions to monitor releases to foresee any issues that may arise with the data pipelines and reports.


Follow best practices and processes established by the team.










Advanced knowledge and experience using Python for data processing.


4+ years of in-depth practical experience with SQL and NoSQL.


Experience in large-scale deployment and performance tuning.


Development experience in Linux system environments.


Familiar with spinning up the infrastructure Amazon, Google Cloud Platform, or Azure.


Experience with ETL/ELT and integration flows in Airflow or similar.


Knowledge of data warehousing concepts.


Knowledge of BI technologies, methodologies and their application.


Knowledge of ELK Stack - Elasticsearch, Logstash, and Kibana using RESTful and JSON to build reporting solutions.


Ability to quickly learn new technologies and push the envelope for performance and reliability.


Good Docker/Kubernetes knowledge is a plus.


Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.


Results-orientated with the ability to meet deadlines.


Good communication and interpersonal skills as well as good written and spoken English skills.








Let us share why we think you’d love to work with us.





We have a track record of success and a vision and a plan for a promising future
. GeoComply has close to 
100% market share
 for player location regulatory compliance in the US gaming space. And we have fuelled that momentum with the expansion into new markets - media & entertainment and fintech.




We are proud of our values and we live them in all of our actions, conversations, and work
.
#Build it Better, #Build it Bigger, #Build it Right




We are proud to be part of a global team that develops award-winning solutions 
for some of the world’s largest and most innovative companies.




We will support you on your learning journey
. We invest in employee career growth and development. Our learning & development commitment includes leadership and technical development, a substantial budget for education and training, as well as dedicated work hours for self-study.




We care about our team
. Our GeoComply team is talented, has a bias for action, and is known for their positive attitude and energy. Team members are generously rewarded with competitive salaries, incentives, and a comprehensive benefits package.




We care about giving back to the communities in which we live and work
. GeoComply supports a  broad range of community initiatives through donations and employee volunteer activities.




We know that work can be fun
. We take the time to create employee events and experiences where everyone can connect and celebrate.




Now What?
 Send us your resume and a cover letter. We Can’t Wait To Meet You.

At GeoComply, we live our value of building it right. Our workplace is built on mutual respect and inclusion. We know that diversity of experience and thought has led to connection, innovation, and our company’s success. We welcome applicants of all backgrounds, experiences, beliefs, and identities.

description:
WE CONNECT THE PHYSICAL AND DIGITAL WORLDS
 

Swiss Post Solutions (SPS) is a leading outsourcing provider for business process solutions and innovative services in document management. A strong international client base relies on SPS’ ability to envision, design and build end-to-end solutions and to be its trusted advisor for the key value drivers in business process outsourcing (BPO): location strategy, process optimization and technology. Part of the Swiss Post Group, SPS’ 7500 employees and specialized partners span the full range of the industry – from insurance, banking, telecommunications, media and retail to energy supply and travel & transportation – addressing customer needs in more than 20 countries. 

Our customers rely on us to be their experts in the fields in which they want to stand out from their competition. This makes working for SPS a demanding, but also exciting and challenging experience. 


YOUR ROLE:
 

As IT Communication and Training Specialist you will play a crucial part in the success of our project of transforming SPS IT into a global footprint. You will be providing training, communication and campaigns around such topics as IT transformation, security and change management. You will work closely with the project team and regional leaders to ensure adoption, utilization and efficiency of the changes that impact employees, ensuring efficient and streamlined communication at all the project phases. The focus of your role will be the development and delivery of communication and training plans as well as associated activities in specific subject areas. 


WHAT YOU WILL DO:
 



Identify change management and communication needs for the project to ensure stakeholders are involved, engaged, informed and can access information when and where needed.


Implement, manage, track and improve the global security awareness campaigns, as well as integrate them into project plan. This will include owning awareness and training toolset used in Security area. Analyze and report on stakeholder engagement based on developed stakeholder maps and ongoing engagement


Collaborate with stakeholders to identify areas of opportunity and areas of risk as it comes to supporting IT transformation through effective communication


Support development and manage communication strategies and plans to ensure consistent, timely, and relevant messaging with for different audiences


Develop and maintain communication plans


Create und update Training Material


Planning and execution of targeted communication and training









WHAT YOU WILL NEED:




Open to Foreigners and Oversea Vietnamese


University Degree in Communication or English Literature/History


Experience in IT transformation programs in the role of change manager


Experience in managing change and communication (must be a “master writer” and persuader)


Brilliant logical thinker, able to learn and adapt new concepts into business environment


Exposure to security processes and training, in the area of security awareness, pricing campaign delivery


Experience in working with virtual, global and multi-cultural teams


Solid understanding on how people go through a change and the change process, empathic


Experience with large-scale organization change efforts


Familiarity with project management approaches, tools and phases of the project lifecycle


Strong stakeholder management, communication and change management skills


Demonstrated ability to influence and foster collaborative relationships with ability to engage resources outside of direct-control to gain consensus, meet deadlines and achieve goals and objectives


Fluent English, while German is a strong plus




ADDITIONAL INFORMATION: 
 



Foreseen travel: 5%


Remote work: 50-100%


Locations: Gdańsk, Poland or any SPS location








The combination of a European Management team and ambitious employees from well-known local and international universities give us the chance to offer our products and services of European quality, but made in Vietnam. This concept provides us with an important competitive advantage in the international market. We strive to provide a friendly working-environment where people feel like a family and are free to voice their opinions. 

What are you waiting for? Join our international team today!

Joining Swiss Post Solutions Ltd today, you can enjoy:
- Professional and challenging working environment
- Competitive and performance-oriented remuneration system
- On-going training and development plan
- Friendly colleague
- Promotion & bonus opportunities
- Long-term commitment

description:
EMOTIV is seeking a full-time Junior QA Tester to be part of our team. You will work closely with our development teams to ensure the quality of our software suite across desktop, web & mobile platforms


Responsibilities




Work closely with the team of QA Engineers, Product Owners, and Developers to test new features as they're being developed


Support Customer Support team on troubleshooting issues on client sides and work with the Development team for short and long term solutions


Reproduce bugs and other issues and uncover problems and/or defects before releases. Proactively write tests to cover problems found after the release


Write and maintain test documentation: test plans, test cases to identify bugs and usability issues


Cross-browser and cross-device testing including mobile devices

Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, IT, Engineering or a related field


At least 1 year of experience in QA

Excellent verbal and written communication skills

Experience with Jenkins build system

Experience with hardware and firmware testing

Opportunity to learn and work on the latest development in neurotechnology


Collaborate with your colleagues in Sydney, Australia, and San Francisco USA


Creative working space with an open plan office and a transparent working environment


Flexible working hours (no overtime)


12 annual leave days per year with an additional 2 days for professional training


Health Insurance (Bao Viet Healthcare)


Regular company activities (team building, company trips on working days)


Snacks, tea, and coffee all the time

description:
About us:



From a small apartment in NYC to 10 locations around the world!


Autonomous e-commerce website in the past has 5 years already offered over
 2 million 
products to over 
100 countries
 to help people work better.  We power 
110,000+ companies worldwide 
and bring to life our visions of the workplaces of tomorrow and build them today by creating solutions to re-engineer the everyday.


The Job:



We are recruiting
 
a
 
Senior Frontend Developer 
to create Vietnamese e-commerce for worldwide products which positively impact millions of people around the world.


Location: Phu Nhuan, HCMC



Responsibilities:




Take responsibility for developing a perfect UI/UX website


Develop with mobile-first and E-commerce conversion as top priorities


Produce fully applications writing clean code and be able to maintain


Optimize page speed insights and performance loading time


Ensure SEO best practices are adhered to when implementing new pages


Develop new user-facing features and enhance the existing ones


Diagnose and fix bugs and performance bottlenecks for performance that feels native









Qualifications:






4+ years of experience
 in front-end development using 
Javascript
 and 
React framework




Experience with Redux, Redux-saga


Basic understanding of server-side CSS pre-processing platforms (CSS modules, LESS, SASS)


Experienced with unit test, integration test, and E2E test frameworks


Experienced in using performance metric tools to detect issues then improve performance web and improve page speed score (such as GTmetrix, WebPageTest, etc.)


Familiarity with modern front-end build pipelines and tools


Ability to well collaborate across functional teams (Marketing, Sales, Design) to execute business goals




Nice to have:



An architectural mindset when design the front-end elements and styles for medium – large scale websites.








Why you’ll love working here:




Competitive salary package and bonuses 



Full 13-month salary for your onboarding before 1st December 



Light breakfasts, healthy lunches, and hearty dinners


Unlimited sick leave, official holidays, and at least 12 paid days off per year


Full medical and dental coverage for you and 50% for your family


Powerful laptop, monitor, standing desk, and any accessories you need to do your best work


Free access to a wide variety of online courses




The essentials:






You be you.
  We deeply care about helping everyone at Autonomous work on what they love, freely express their ideas within the organization, and grow to to their true potential.




You be a better you.
  Most of the time, you’ll be working on cutting edge technologies.  You’ll be constantly learning and improving your knowledge as an engineer, researcher or scientist.




You are your own boss.  
There is very little hierarchy at Autonomous.  Decision making processes are transparent and open to vote. We welcome all different ways of thinking and trust the people we work with to do what they do best. There is no micromanagement here.




You the inventor.
  Most of the time, you’ll find yourself working on a problem that doesn’t have a solution - yet. That’s where you come in.




Solve problems for the world, not just Vietnam.
 Most of the problems we’re solving are for the global audience of today, and of tomorrow.

Implement and deploy API solutions while demonstrating expertise in a number of areas including API design and development, Public and Private API design and development, highly scalable distributed systems.

3-7 years of IT experience in analysis, design, development, documentation, implementing and testing of software systems in Java 8+, J2EE and Internet technologies.


Experience in implementing Java EE design patterns such as MVC, Singleton, Session Facade, DAO,…


Experience in core multithreading, collections, IO, networking, JSP/Servlets and JDBC.


Strong experience in Spring Framework such as Spring Boot, Spring MVC, Spring JDBC/Data, Spring Security.


Experience in configuring and deploying applications on Tomcat 7.0+ server.


Good experience with RDBMS (MySQL, Postgree) and ORM technologies (JPA2, Hibernate).


Experience in designing front end interfaces using HTML, JSP, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery and Ajax.

description:

Đảm bảo team phát triển và các bên liên quan thực hiện theo đúng quy trình của mô hình Agile. Đồng thời liên tục tinh chỉnh và tối ưu quy trình để team phát triển có thể làm việc hiệu quả nhất và nhanh nhất

description:
Xây dựng lộ trình hàng năm cho việc nghiên cứu và phát triển công nghệ sản phẩm liên quan đến AI theo định hướng của công ty.


Đóng vai trò chủ chốt trong việc quyết định các công nghệ và lộ trình liên quan để phát triển, thử nghiệm, triển khai các mô hình AI / machine learning.


Thiết lập các quy trình thực hiện các dự án / sản phẩm AI (vòng đời phát triển mô hình ML) bao gồm giai đoạn khởi động dự án, giai đoạn thăm dò, giai đoạn xây dựng mô hình, triển khai mô hình và đào tạo lại mô hình. Đảm bảo việc quản lý thực hiện dự án trên cơ sở liên tục.


Xác định, thiết kế và phát triển các giải pháp AI vào sản phẩm bằng cách sử dụng Deep Learning, Computer Vision và các phương pháp máy học (Machine Learning)


Chuẩn bị kế hoạch và giám sát việc triển khai cơ sở hạ tầng AI được sử dụng để đào tạo / đào tạo lại mô hình và triển khai mô hình, cũng như các quá trình đảm bảo chất lượng mô hình với các bên liên quan.


Xây dựng kế hoạch tuyển dụng của bộ phận. Trực tiếp tham gia vào quá trình tuyển dụng, hướng dẫn và đào tạo.










Tốt nghiệp đại học chuyên ngành CNTT trở lên


Từ 3 năm kinh nghiệm về thiết kế và xây dựng AI (ML, DL)


Có nền tảng ứng dụng vững chắc, đặc biết trong mảng Thị giác máy tính (Computer Vision), xử lý ngôn ngữ tự nhiên NLP hoặc trí tuệ nhân tạo


Kiến thức và Kỹ năng:


Có kiến thức tốt liên quan đến xây dựng mô hình học máy bao gồm kỹ thuật chuẩn bị dữ liệu, kỹ thuật thiết kế tính năng, xây dựng mô hình học máy (ML) và các thuật toán ML liên quan


Có kiến thức chuyên sâu về công nghệ Dữ liệu lớn và các dịch vụ đám mây liên quaN


Có kinh nghiệm về học máy và các thư viện học sâu như Tensorflow, PyTorch, Scikit-Learn và các thư viện nguồn mở khác


Kỹ năng tiếng Anh tốt


Kỹ năng giao tiếp tốt

description:
Position Summary


This role is in charge of developing requirements to meet business needs. Defines and publishes internal and external specifications, as well as assisting in the clarification and description of requirements. Acting as a link between internal stakeholders to analyze, document, communicate, and validate platform application business and system requirements.







Responsibilities




Obtain high-level functional requirements from internal stakeholders or customers.


Actively communicate with business users to clarify any requirements.


Analyze and assess business needs, then create a specification document that includes a mockup, workflow, and detailed rules.


If necessary, attend a meeting with business users to gather requirements (note: travelling might be required).


Provide the development and quality teams with the business requirements and specifications.


Collaborate with team leaders and application teams to ensure that test requirements are met.


Collaborate closely with diverse teams to ensure that testing and requirement analysis are completed on time.


Create a variety of software/system documentation, such as a Functional Specification and a User Guide.


Assist with software testing and quality assurance as needed.



 


Skill Requirements




Degree in IT/Computer Science/Computer Engineering or related discipline.


At least 2 years of experience as Business Analyst (handling business requirements directly from Business users).


Experience in software development of web-based/mobile applications is required.


Proficient English skill, both oral and written.


Experience in QC/testing field is desirable.


Strong interpersonal and communications skills, both oral and written.


Able to work in a dynamic and ever-changing industry.


A self-initiated and pro-active team player who can work with minimal supervision.


Possess excellent time and task management skill.


Willing to travel for business meeting (inclusive of overseas travel).










Attractive salary package;


13th - month salary and performance bonus;


Overseas training;


Premium healthcare insurance;


12 days annual leave and 8 days sick leave fully paid per year;


Team building trip every summer, frequent company party/activities;


Sport activities: badminton, football, bowling…;


English classes every week;


Unlimited access to a selection of food and beverages;


Working & growing in a young and dynamic team, creative environment.

description:
Về GMO NIKKO



Chúng tôi là GMO NIKKO ( Chúng tôi là thành viên của GMO internet group của Nhật Bản. Thông qua công ty GMO-Z.com RUN SYSTEM ở Việt Nam, chúng tôi đang xây dựng team phát triển hệ thống web tại thành phố Hồ Chí Minh.

Chúng tôi đang tìm kiếm các kĩ sư lập trình web (mới tốt nghiệp, đã có ít kinh nghiệm hoặc đã có nhiều kinh nghiệm). Tại GMO NIKKO bạn sẽ có cơ hội thử thách với những hệ thống và những dịch vụ ngày càng phát triển dựa trên số hoá Internet. Tiếp cận những kĩ thuật và những công nghệ mới nhất, làm việc trong một môi trường năng động nhưng cũng rất kỉ luật của tập đoàn GMO cũng như văn hoá công sở của người Nhật.



Về trách nhiệm công việc





- Phát triển, bảo trì hệ thống web DX dựa trên mô hình SaaS sử dụng Laravel, Vuejs, AWS





- Làm việc với hệ thống LINE message (True Connect)





- Làm việc với hệ thống phân tích dữ liệu, tích hợp Google Calendar.








- Các bạn mới tốt nghiệp chuyên ngành công nghệ thông tin, có kinh nghiệm lập trình web PHP (Laravel, Vuejs, Mysql) 

- Các bạn Junior (1-2 năm kinh nghiêm) hoặc Senior trên 2 năm kinh nghiệm lập trình web PHP (Laravel, Vuejs, Mysql)

- Có kinh nghiệm thiết kế và viết restful APIs

- Có kinh nghiệm phát triển các ứng dụng web hiện đại responsive với HTML5, CSS, bootstrap, Php framework (Laravel, Fuel, ...)

- Có kinh nghiệm làm việc với các cơ sở dữ liệu RDBMS (MySQL, SQL server...)

- Có hiểu biết và có kinh nghiệm làm việc với cloud service (AWS, Google...)

- Sử dụng thành thạo các công cụ quản lý code như Git, SVN







# Lương




Lương:  lên đến 2000 USD (Gross) và hơn nữa theo năng lực


Lương tháng 13. Performance review: 1 lần/năm + Thưởng dự án theo KPIs


Trợ cấp ăn trưa, trợ cấp đi lại


Thưởng dự án và các loại thưởng khác (Thưởng thành tích, thưởng cá nhân suất sắc, thưởng đạt chứng chỉ Tiếng Nhật, …)




# Cơ hội phát triển:




Làm việc, học hỏi và phát triển cùng đồng nghiệp là những kỹ sư trẻ tài năng, đam mê và có lý tưởng lớn


Được tham gia các chương trình training về kỹ năng công nghệ và kỹ năng mềm, phương pháp làm việc.


Có nhiều cơ hội thăng tiến và phát triển nghề nghiệp.


Được làm việc trực tiếp với các khách hàng Nhật Bản. Cơ hội onsite tại Nhật Bản..




 # Chăm sóc sức khỏe:




Bảo hiểm xã hội, bảo hiểm y tế, bảo hiểm thất nghiệp theo luật bảo hiểm.


Bảo hiểm sức khỏe (AON) theo từng cấp. Khám sức khỏe định kỳ hàng năm tại bệnh viên uy tín.


Chế độ chăm sóc phụ nữ: Nghỉ sau sinh cho nhân viên nữ có con dưới 1 tuổi: 1h/ngày




# Tiện ích phong phú:



Trang thiết bị hiện đại, sẵn sàng phục vụ nhân viên mọi lúc mọi nơi



 # Hoạt động đa dạng:




CLB thể thao: Bóng đá, Cầu lông,...


Team-building mỗi tháng, du lịch thường niên, nhiều sự kiện lớn và đa dạng diễn ra hàng quý và hàng năm.

description:
YouNet Social
 is a member of 
YouNet Group
 - the leading SocialTech Group powering Sales, Marketing and Operations.




YouNet Social
 is a company dedicated to Social Network with a business office in the US and main production in Vietnam. Our people include talented engineers and researchers who love to develop from small items to big Social Network.



We have been in emerging Social Network domain since 2008 with 1,000+ social projects completed, 500+ products. Our social network extensions have been used by more than 10,000 social networks in the world.



Our mission is to empower enterprise to leverage social technologies in business to create more productivity with our YouNet Social Ecosystem.



Currently, we are looking for one
 QC Engineer (Middle/ Senior). 
Join us to write your own success stories!




RESPONSIBILITIES:






Plan, design and execute test plans, test cases and test scripts for Web Apps, APIs, Android Apps, iOS Apps




Perform testing using various solutions (manual/automation), assess the results, document and provide feedback to the Development team




Support Customer Support team to handle user questions and troubleshoot technical issues




Participate in the software development activities, including design, requirement analysis, and tracing, full testing life cycle




Establish and maintain the software quality assurance programs, processes, procedures, and controls to ensure compliance with regulations and established industry standards




Act as a test lead/problem solver for key projects




Coach other junior members.






BENEFITS:






Competitive salary and 13th-month salary payment




Annual Health-check to make sure you are always healthy




Premium Health Care package so you don’t have to spend money when you are sick




Young, Dynamic and Challenging working environment.











REQUIREMENTS:






2+ years of relevant experience in software testing and software development




1+ year of experience in Automation Testing is a must




Experience in Web/Mobile testing, API testing is a must




Experience in performance/load testing is a must




Experience in working on web/mobile standards and technologies including accessibility compliance is preferred




Familiar with open-source automation testing tools and frameworks (Selenium, Appium, Postman, Thanos, Mocha, Jest, etc.) is preferred




Strong systems thinking and problem-solving skills




Strong organization and time management skills, tracking multiple test executions simultaneously, and able to synthesize results effectively




Good at English writing is required




Team management experience is a plus.











Why is YouNet different?







Full-cycle product house:
 YouNet employees have opportunities to participate and experience a professional and complete process to build and develop products: from ideas, development to market launching inside and outside the country.





Together-Success culture: 
YouNet has a dynamic and motivated environment. We always encourage employees to be eager at self-development and having start-up owner spirit, so they can become the company’s Shareholder/Co-founder in our Start-up projects. There are 10% of our staffs are company shareholders and we’re willing to increase that rate over the years.





Pioneering vision:
 In 2021, in order to become Vietnam leading company in Digital Marketing transformation for Marketing and realize our go-global strategy with SocialTech, we are seeking and welcoming over 100 open positions for young talents from Entry to Expert/Executive level in Technology and Marketing, to forestall and win over the Digital trending wave in Vietnam.

description:
Are you ready to work with and learn from some of the leading IT people in the world? We work in close cooperation with some of the world's most amazing IT people, both in Vietnam but also through daily online cooperation with our offices in Denmark (www.globeteam.com).


Some of the people you may get a chance to work with:


An excellent team with friendly and talented teammates

Bjarne B. Dollerup (Denmark): Technical Evangelist with Microsoft and Product Planner for Microsoft Windows Servers 2008 R2 to 2012

Martin Strandbygaard (Denmark): Technical Architect for some of the Core Security Systems leading to Denmark's Global Leadership in Digital Governance incl. Digital Signatur, NemKonto, Digitale Straffeattester

Michael Rangstrup (Vietnam): Main Feature Designer of ERP systems FactoryHouse, Catglobe, and Casewhere

Preben Thalund Madsen (Denmark): Partner and Country Manager at IBM Denmark for over 10 years

Rangstrup IT is the perfect place to get your career into the highest gear! We are looking to fill 1 QA lead and 2 QA positions. 






As a QA lead, the following skills are required:




At least five years of experience in QA




At least two years of experience in a lead/management position





Excellent at communication




Ask good questions




Documentation




Customer communication




Know when to push back









Having a test-driven mindset: testing begins at planning, analysis, and designs




Having a strong technical understanding




Can quickly learn and capture business requirements




Good knowledge of software development process, especially testing process




Analyze changes' impacts and plan for regression









Voice of quality




Always put yourself in the shoes of users of a system




Ensure guidelines and templates are followed, test cases are reviewed




Be careful, care about small things




Push back on late QA handoffs









Strong experience in automation/performance testing




Writing and executing test cases/test scripts.




Deploying and testing web applications




REST APIs testing




Experience with writing database queries (SQL, NoSQL)









Coaching and training




Review and optimize testing processes continuously




Sharing knowledge, collecting ideas, feedback, and being able to hold good discussions




Multitasking









For the QA/QC positions:




Love testing


At least 2 years of experience








- Our office has flexible seating and meeting and pair programming spaces.

- We allow some flexibility of work hours. We allow people to work from home some days, or work less less during week days to take care of their family and make up the lost hours during weekend at home, as long as they are able to communicate with others using email.

- We work, we learn, we share. New technologies are introduced everyday and we always want to be at the front line.

- We love working and building great products, but we also value our families ans strive for work-life balance.

- We provide laptops for everyone.

- We understand software development and know what it takes to make good software.

- We want you to earn a lot. If you want to earn more money to afford whatever it is you dream of, you can work more hours. If you are more interested in less overtime but a good balance between work and free time, we will put you on projects that offer less opportunity/demands for overtime.

- You will be working with some of the smartest and most experienced people. In short – people you can learn a lot from!

Additional benefit:

😎 Work with all the newest technologies!
🧐 Work with the most talented IT people in Vietnam!
🍺 Attractive salary and flexible hours!
🚌 Yearly company trip
🏜 18 paid leave days/year

🥅 Table football 
🍟 Daily snacks, coffee counter
🌼 Quarterly birthday party
📜 Sponsors for taking MCSD / ISTQB certificates
🔍 Yearly health check
👩‍🏫 Regular meetup: sharing and learning
👩‍👩‍👧‍👧 Regular social activities

description:

Tham gia phát triển sản phẩm, các hệ thống phân tích dữ liệu mạng xã hội, dữ liệu viễn thông.

Xây dựng các hệ thống CMS, Portal trên nền tảng Java

Cắt HTML,CSS, jQuery

Phân tích thiết kế hệ thống, phân tích thiết kế CSDL.


Triển khai hệ thống, hỗ trợ dự án.









Yêu cầu chính:




Có ít nhất 2 năm kinh nghiệm lập trình với ngôn ngữ Java.


Có kinh nghiệm làm việc với hệ thống xử lý, tính toán dữ liệu lớn, BigData.


Thành thạo một trong các hệ quản trị CSDL quan hệ: Oracle, SQL Server.


Có hiểu biết tốt về Design pattern ( Singleton, factory … ), SOAP services, Web API


Hiểu biết một trong các Java Framework: 
Spring, Vert-X, Hibernate, Struts




Sử dụng thành thạo các công cụ quản lý Source Code như Git, SVN…;


Đam mê và yêu thích trong việc nghiên cứu và áp dụng các công nghệ mới, phân tích và xây dựng các giải pháp mang tính sáng tạo, các ứng dụng mới;


Khả năng làm việc nhóm và giao tiếp tốt với các đồng nghiệp khác;


Đã từng tham gia vào dự án theo qui trình bài bản.


Tư duy tốt, đào sâu vấn đề.


Chịu được áp lực cao trong công việc.


Tiếng Anh đọc hiểu tài liệu




Ưu tiên:




Có kinh nghiệm làm việc với một trong các hệ quản trị CSQL NoSQL: MongoDB, Redis, Hadoop, Cassandra.


Các bạn năng động, khả năng tự học cao và đã làm nhiều dự án trong thời gian học Đại học


Các ứng viên có kinh nghiệm: đã làm việc theo quy trình phần mềm, có hiểu biết về hệ thống chất lượng phần mềm;


Có định hướng fullstack, có kinh nghiệm sử dụng Vue, NodeJS/Go Lang và AngularJS;


22 – 27 tuổi










Làm việc 5 ngày/tuần trong môi trường năng động, chuyên nghiệp


Thưởng tháng lương 13 khi gia nhập vào cuối năm


VMG cam kết xét tăng lương 1 năm 1 lần


Cơ hội thăng tiến, được đào tạo và có điều kiện khẳng định bản thân


 Có cơ hội thực hiện các nhiệm vụ quan trọng và phát triển các kỹ năng trong nhiều lĩnh vực, khám phá những khả năng mới của bản thân


 Mức lương thỏa thuận (cạnh tranh): tháng lương thứ 13, phụ cấp theo quy định của VMG (xăng xe, điện thoại, ăn trưa, v.v)


Quy chế lương, thưởng thực hiện thống nhất và đúng theo những thỏa thuận ban đầu


Đầy đủ các chế độ, quyền lợi theo luật định (BHXH, BHYT...); ngoài ra còn có các loại Bảo hiểm tiết kiệm, Bảo hiểm thân thể và các chế độ đãi ngộ hấp dẫn theo quy định riêng tại VMG


Du lịch trong nước và nước ngoài 2-4 lần/ năm là nét văn hóa đặc biệt tại VMG, một số nước VMG đã đi qua: Thái Lan, Philippines, Malaysia, Indonesia, Singapore, Trung Quốc, Hàn Quốc, Nhật Bản, Italy, Maldives, Canada, Australia, Dubai, Nga...


Ngoài ra có các chế độ chăm sóc sức khỏe như tập Gym miễn phí hàng ngày, câu lạc bộ chạy hàng tuần và các khoản phí hoạt động bộ phận 200k/nhân sự/tháng được sử dụng cho các hoạt động du lịch gắn kết quy mô bộ phận.

location: 178/8 Nguyễn Văn Thương, Phường 25, Binh Thanh, Ho Chi Minh
description:
New ideas are fostered by diverse voices, great listeners and close collaboration. At Confluence, we dream big and think differently about technology. Our clients count on us to hire people who have the confidence to question the status-quo, the insight to find new approaches to old problems and the persistence to push ideas and transform solutions. Confluence is a global leader in data-driven managed investment solutions. Eight of the top 10 global service providers license Confluence products and all of the top 10 global asset managers have business processes automated using Confluence products. If you think differently about technology and are motivated by what others see as impossible, we want to meet you.


Purpose


A Software Quality Engineer at Confluence is responsible for participating in our agile teams as a test engineer. Your focus is to assure the entire team embraces a quality mindset and implements best practices to improve team performance in order to deliver high quality products as a result. This person will be involved with the entire product lifecycle – requirements, design, review and coding, and testing.  You’ll work closely with Project Managers, Software Engineers, Product Owners, Architects and Client Services team members to collaborate and solve business problems in an agile development environment.


Essential Responsibilities




Implement automated and manual test cases with a focus on validating complex calculations, functional scenarios, performance, scalability, and usability


Develop and execute test plans and work with other team members to implement the plan


Work on a cross-functional Scrum team participating in planning, stand-ups, retrospectives, and demonstrations


Possess the ability to define and apply test methodologies/metrics to ensure that the quality guidelines for the product have been met


Attention to detail and commitment to accuracy and quality.


Help shape our products by providing input on user stories and designs and by giving feedback on usability


Seek constant improvement of yourself, our products, our software development process, and your team’s performance




Other duties will be assigned as the above job description is meant to describe the general nature and level of work being performed; it is not intended to be construed as an exhaustive list of all responsibilities, duties and skills required for the position.








Qualifications




Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science and/or related discipline


Four or more years of professional experience in software development and/or automated testing


Fluent Written and Spoken English Language




Essential Skills




Experience with Java, C++, or C# is preferred. Experience with XML, JSON, and JavaScript is a plus


Experience with relational databases, or NoSQL databases is preferred


Proven automation skills using a test automation tool (Selenium and C# would be a plus). Experience with Visual Studio’s Web Performance and Load Test or a related performance testing tool is a plus


Exceptional communication, presentation, organizational and teamwork skills with strong desire and ability to deliver results


Increased level of responsibilities, as value-added team member


Collaborative working style that values team success over personal accomplishments


Act in accordance with and is an ambassador of our company values - Integrity, Imagination, Discipline and Service








Whether you are a recent graduate looking to launch your career or an experienced professional making your next career move, you will find opportunities to grow both personally and professionally at Confluence.


*** Growth Opportunities


To support our fast growth, Confluence is seeking smart, hard-working people to join the Confluence team. Pursue dynamic growth opportunities while working with leading technologies.


*** Values & Culture


Driven by a commitment to four core corporate values — integrity, imagination, discipline and service — Confluence has created a culture which fosters professional growth and employee satisfaction while delivering exceptional results for our clients around the world.


*** Top-Tier Benefits


Confluence offers a comprehensive compensation package which includes highly competitive salaries and exceptional benefits.


*** Confluence Cares

description:
We are calling out for a 
Business Analyst / Product Analyst
 who has an interest in business problems and a desire to find solutions that bring business value, to join our
 Product Analysis Team
.



As part of our team, you get the chance to handle interesting business problems, meet business owners and stakeholders from different industries, from which you will gain more insights and new perspectives. 



You can also have the opportunity to work with innovative business ideas, thereby enhancing your capabilities by analyzing, formulating, and consulting on new & exciting product ideas & solutions.




Let’s see what your work looks like!






Get to know & understand Product Concept







Capture & deeply understand the product’s goal, business value, and target users




Get business requirements & rules







Model Product Workflow







Capture current business processes




Model product flows within business constraints




Demonstrate how the product will be implemented and operated within the business context




Define gaps between expected product flow & current flows







Define Product Requirements







Breakdown product features into user stories




Work with clients and stakeholders to facilitate, communicate (define & align) on both functional and non-functional requirements




Collaborate with design and development team to align their understandings




Follow up throughout product development to ensure developed features align with the product concept, workflows & requirements.

 team, you should:

1+ years

 of experience as a 
Business Analyst, Product Analyst, Product Owner
, or relevant roles




Show interest in how things work and how to create things that work




Good at researching skills and ready to research in English 




Work well with requirements analysis, modeling, and diagramming




Love to explore new things and prove yourself as a fast-learner




Have good problem-solving and communication skills




Knowledge of Product Management will be a huge advantage for this role







You are welcome to talk with us, possibly over tea at our own GEEK Hub Cafeteria, enjoy our stories, learn about us, and if you are interested, why not join us and be part of the change?







#businessanalyst #productanalyst #productowner #productmanager 











FOR YOUR BETTER WORK






Participate in discovering and proposing solutions, not just simply implementing the existing ones




Work with interesting & innovative business problems from different fields. 




Level up yourself not only from actual work but also from senior members.




Get constructive feedback and suggestions from teammates to figure out the best solution for your work.

Flat Structure with no middle management enables you to leverage your own strengths




Weekly workshops and sharings to exchange knowledge and experience, from technical to soft skills, from work to daily life subjects




We embrace the eagerness of learning and sharing, so you will always have room to raise your voice






FOR YOUR BETTER STAY






Be empowered by the Flat Structure to define your own career path




Quarterly Review with a transparent evaluation framework and based on your actual contribution.




Sharing & Learning Culture with open-minded teammates





These perks will also equip you with a clear mind with a healthy body:




Weekly exercise with your teammates




Morning coffee with free drinks




Fruits, and nutritious drinks in our shared kitchen with a well-stocked fridge

Full-payment for Social Insurance package based on your official salary

13th salary

Tốt nghiệp Cao đẳng trở lên các chuyên ngành IT hoặc ứng viên có base về IT.

Có khả năng làm việc độc lập.

description:
The primary role of the position are to support to: 

 Ensure a proper management of technology risks, compliance, quality assurance 

 Manage Business Continuity Management (BCM) for CIMB Vietnam 

 Manage and implement data governance initiatives for CIMB Vietnam 

 Manage costs and budget for Vietnam Technology & Operations 

 Support with analytics works for Vietnam Technology & Operations 

Technology Governance: 

• Ensure that policies, controls, and solutions are continually monitored and improved in response to regulatory requirements, business opportunities and threats. 

• Proactively working on analysis and identifying opportunities to improve technology processes and procedures. 

• Monitor technology operational issue or risk are timely tracked to SHARP (CIMB ops risk system) and timely closure. 

• Conduct ongoing technology risk assessment to estimate potential risks and relevant treatments. 

• Support to conduct ongoing assurance testing as designed per technology risk control self assessment. 

• Conduct gaps analysis for any technology-related and data-related new regulatory requirements. 

• Centralise manage internal/external audit, QA, and regulatory compliance issues. 

• Oversee security and compliance to all of CIMB Vietnam’s technology related project. 

• Oversee compliance to all outstanding technology incidents and changes to ensure quality assurance and compliance. 

• Support to prepare management updates on technology risks, compliance to relevant local and group stakeholders. 

 

Business Continuity Management 

• Coordinating and assisting the establishment of Business Continuity Plans and Procedures, providing regular status updates to Business Continuity Steering Committee 

• Coordinating updates to the detailed information supporting the Business Continuity Procedures. 

• In the event that activation is required, serving as liaison between the Crisis Management Team. 

 

Data Governance 

• Setup and implement Data Governance framework for CIMB Vietnam following CIMB Group Data Governance policy as well as SBV regulation 

• Act as the Head of Data Governance Unit for Vietnam to manage and implement assigned data governance initiatives

• Providing supports when required per the establishment of Data Governance program at CIMB Vietnam

Spend & Analytics 

• Manage costs and budget for Vietnam Technology & Operations 

• Support with analytics works for Vietnam Technology & Operations






Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Management/Business Information System or a related technical field. Master degree is a big plus

Minimum 5 years working experience in 

• IT Risk Advisory /IT Audit in big 4 professional service firms (PwC, Deloitte, KPMG or E&Y) is a plus 

• Experience in similar position in banks/ Financial service company

• Advanced skills in ITIL, COBIT, MS Office, and Data Presentation. 

• Familiar with regulatory guidelines such as SBV’s Circular 18, Cir 35, 47. 

• Seasoned understanding of risk management principles and practices 

• Knowledge and experience in implementing Operational Risk and Compliance frameworks 

• Extensive experience in IT and banking, with focus on assurance and IT process, risk management 

• Knowledge of information security controls, guidelines and standards, ISO, CIS, NIST, OWASP is the plus

Personal skills (Soft Competencies [Core/Leadership]) 

• Delivers Result

• Exercises Sound Judgment 

• Inquisitive approach and Inquisitive approach and attention to detail attention to detail

được đào tạo từ nhiều trường đại học nổi tiếng từ nhiều quốc gia khác nhau. Hiện tại chúng tôi đang tuyển dụng rất nhiều vị trí cho các dự án xây dựng sản phẩm AI của công ty. Tham gia vào các dự án xây dựng sản phẩm của Asilla trong mảng Computer Vision có sử dụng công nghệ Deep Learning. Các sản phẩm của công ty bao gồm: nhận diện hành động bất

description:
A self-driven individual who has a passion for helping organisations architect, build and scale complex business and technology solutions. The responsibilities of the Mid/Senior Software Engineer (.NET) will be working on application development projects for various Web, API, IoT and Mobile projects.



Responsibilities




Execute, support programming projects that include all stages of the project lifecycle (design, coding, testing, debugging, and code promotion) for both new and existing applications.


Assist with and/or execute software releases, system upgrades, and troubleshooting of application systems.


To perform code review which help the team improve programming ability as well as you can learn from each other players.


Constantly keep our knowledge up to date and share it among our colleagues to optimally support and consult our customers.


Write well-designed, testable, efficient code by using best software development practices.


Ensuring deliverables have good quality.


A detailed-oriented approach to your work and deliverables.


Integrate data from various back-end services and databases.


Gather, document, and refine specifications and requirements based on technical needs.


Create and maintain software documentation.


Be responsible for maintaining, expanding and scaling sites.


Keep up to date into emerging technologies/industry trends and apply them into operations and activities.









Requirements




3 - 6 years (Mid) and from 6 years above (Senior) of experience with ASP.NET, ASP.NET MVC and C#.


Good knowledge on ASP.NET MVC 5, ASP.NET Core and WEB API. Able to work independently and support others, customize/extend the framework if needed.


Basic/ Solid knowledge on the HTTP protocol and REST standard. Able to implement API actions with the Get/Post/Put/Delete verbs.


Able to apply most of the advance feature on modelling, managing database schemas, querying and modelling for performance on EF/EF Core


Good/ In-depth knowledge of OOP, SOLID principles, design patterns and best practices. Follow standard coding convention, clean coding.


Basic/Solid understanding of how web applications work including security, session management and development best practices.


Able to write testable code and write unit testing using NUnit/xUnit, mocking framework.


Basic/ Solid understanding on authentication, authorization, JWT and the flows of OAuth2/OpenIdConnect and able to setup and apply the flows to an application.


Good/ Broad and in-depth knowledge of SQL queries, partitioning and compressing data. Good at designing database structure, indexes and performance. Familiar with the Database Tuning Advisor, Query Store in performance turning


Basic knowledge of search engine optimization process.


Basic level on HTML, CSS, JavaScript.


Aggressive problem diagnosis and creative problem-solving skills.


Good/ Strong organizational skills to juggle multiple tasks within the constraints of timelines and budgets with business acumen


Ability to work and thrive in a fast-paced environment, learn rapidly and master diverse web technologies and techniques.


Good level of English.


Able to understand and use UML Class, Sequence, and other technical diagrams.
 




Good to Have




Knowledge of/Experience in a content management system (CMS) technology (e.g., Sitecore, CQ5/AEM, Umbraco, SharePoint, Kentico, or Sitefinity).


Basic/ Solid understanding of Azure Cloud technologies such as WebApps, Databases (SQL & NoSQL), Functions, Service Bus, Security and more.


Working experience on microservices architecture and Kubernetes orchestration.


Working experience in large scale relational database systems, object-oriented programming and web application development.


Familiar with DevOps tools such as Azure DevOps/Teamcity/Jenkins etc.


Good/ In-depth knowledge of modern HTML5 and CSS standards, JavaScript.


Ability to work on web page layouts from Photoshop design examples


Working experience on Node.js applications and knowledgeable in Node package manager (npm).


Working experience on Ubuntu/Linux


Working experience on Meteor


Working experience on MongoDB / CosmosDB.


Knowledge of CI/CD systems e.g., Jenkins



 

 






Tekcent is an award-winning digital solutions company with a strong in-house team of technology professionals that helps customers to connect their digital experiences. We architect, build and deliver modern solutions in Web, Mobile and IoT using Business Intelligence and Cloud technologies to provide software that meets demanding business goals.

We are experienced in building results-driven and mission critical software solutions for some of Asia’s largest corporate clients. Our working culture is to build and nurture a professional environment that empowers the employees to achieve personal career goals and professional excellence.

Find out more about us at:

 

 


Key Employee Benefits (Vietnam Office)
 



Flexible working hour 


Social, Heath and Unemployment Insurance transparently paid on your FULL salary


Health care insurance package


13th Bonus (prorated), Performance Bonus


12 days of Annual Leave, 12 days of Sick Leave, 1 day of Birthday Leave


Work from home policy (12 days)


Teambuilding, company trip


Regular professional workshop, sharing experience


Sponsor courses and professional certifications


Opportunities to work onsite for international projects 


Make English a part of your daily routine


International, and professional work environment 


Employee clubs & events (running groups, board game groups, foosball competition, indoor & outdoor party, ...) and gifts on special occasions 


International management style: professional, dynamic, open minded, supportive, and friendly

We are looking for a full stack web developer with experience in integrating multiple external sources within one platform using multiple API’s and preferably with experience in standard authentication tokens such as OATH and OpenID.

This is a challenging, full time position with a major international software content and services company with multiple clients. You will be involved on the technical side of creative projects and will be part of a closely knit team that produces creative solutions for a wide variety of international clients.







Required Skills




Javascript. Node JS. (3+ Years)


Java / PHP / Bash / Python (Some experience)




Familiarity with Backend Architecture




Database configuration


API integration


SSO


SAML


Familiar with deployment, scaling, monitoring, and performance tuning.


Familiar with Agile Process and Scrum Methodologies.


Authentication tokens such as OAth (required) and OpenID connect (a plus)


Familiar with Docker, Openshift, and Jenkins.


Familiar with relational database systems such as PostgreSQL and MySQL.


Require experience with web technologies such as REST API, security, performance, etc.


Require experience with Unit and integration testing experience.




Basic Requirements




Resident in Ho Chi Minh City


Excellent written and spoken English


Able and willing to join team meetings during non-office hours










Meaningful work with international experienced designers and developers;


Huge opportunity for professional development by learning the latest design and development techniques;


Enjoyable work in flexible, fun and motivational space;


Very attractive salary based on skills, experience and contributions;


Meaningful relationship bonded with friendly members in company retreats, celebrations and leisure activities;


Meaningful recognition for your effort with wide array of rewards and benefits;


Chance to go to United States for training or business conference.

description:
- Xác định chiến lược thử nghiệm cho sản phẩm và đưa ra kế hoạch thử nghiệm chi tiết cho từng bản phát hành. Đảm bảo các ứng dụng web và di động hoạt động chính xác khi đến tay người dùng.

- Thực hiện các bài kiểm tra thủ công và tự động cho ứng dụng web e-commerce, nền tảng Android và iOS. Thử nghiệm phiên bản mới trên các thiết bị khác nhau trước khi phát hành bản chính thức. 

- Xác định lỗi, báo cáo lỗi, ưu tiên và theo dõi các vấn đề; báo cáo kết quả kiểm tra và tiến độ nhiệm vụ cho nhóm. Ghi lại kết quả kiểm tra và xác minh các bản sửa lỗi phần mềm.

- Xác định các vấn đề có thể xảy ra trong quá trình sản xuất và đề xuất với nhóm các vấn đề có khả năng xảy ra.

- Xem xét, giám sát và tối ưu hóa kế hoạch kiểm tra và chiến lược kiểm tra.

- Theo dõi lỗi phần mềm và báo cáo toàn bộ trạng thái phát hành dự án cho các bên liên quan;

- Làm việc với nhóm phát triển để hiểu các yêu cầu, thiết kế kế hoạch kiểm thử toàn diện và các kịch bản kiểm thử thủ công / tự động. Hỗ trợ trong quá trình cải thiện về quản lý chất lượng.

- Phối hợp chặt chẽ với nhóm CS để hỗ trợ / theo dõi / ghi lại các vấn đề do khách hàng báo cáo.

- Làm việc với CS để trả lời các thắc mắc, phàn nàn từ khách hàng.

- Các công việc khác được BGĐ giao. 






- Có ít nhất 1 năm kinh nghiệm trong vị trí tương tự (Ứng dụng web và thiết bị di động)

- Có kinh nghiệm lập kế hoạch thử nghiệm, bảo trì thử nghiệm, giám sát thử nghiệm và tối ưu hóa thử nghiệm.

- Có kinh nghiệm trong các công cụ quản lý kiểm tra và theo dõi lỗi (JIRA, ClickUp, ...)

- Tiếng Anh giao tiếp cơ bản.

- Chi tiết, tỉ mỉ. Tập trung vào kết quả công việc.







Giới thiệu về Fonos


Fonos là công ty start up Việt Nam, tập hợp những cá nhân giàu quyết tâm với mục tiêu mang đến một nền tảng với những nội dung âm thanh chất lượng cao cho người dùng Việt.

Fonos hợp tác với những nhà xuất bản lớn nhất nước như NXB Trẻ, NXB Kim Đồng, Nhã Nam, Omega, Thái Hà Books, Alphabooks, Phục Hưng Books, …  sở hữu bản quyền hợp phá để chuyển thể các tựa sách bán chạy nhất của Việt Nam và quốc tế sang phiên bản sách nói.

Ngoài ra, Fonos còn sản xuất rất nhiều các nôi dung âm thanh độc quyền như Thiền định, Truyện ngủ, Tóm tắt sách…


Phương châm


Là một công ty start-up, Fonos mong muốn duy trì công ty ở quy mô nhân sự vừa phải nhưng chú trọng xây dựng đội ngũ nhân viên với những cá nhân xuất sắc, giàu nhiều huyết, chung chí hướng tạo ra những sản phẩm chất lượng tốt nhất, truyền tải thông điệp tích cực, ý nghĩa.


Người sáng lập


Oscar, đồng sáng lập và là Giám đốc điều hành Fonos, đã có nhiều năm kinh nghiệm làm việc trong lĩnh vực Marketing và Lập trình cho các công ty khởi nghiệp ở Mỹ và Anh.

Xuân, đồng sáng lập và là Giám đốc vận hành, một nữ doanh nhân thành đạt đã thành công xây dựng chuỗi F&B ở Sài Gòn, hiện đã có cửa hàng ở cả Việt Nam và Hàn Quốc.


Môi trường làm việc


Đồng nghiệp và các nhân viên tại Fonos là những người trẻ đầy nhiệt huyết, yêu sách, rất thân thiện và gắn bó.

Các nhân viên được khuyến khích tự do đóng góp ý tưởng, chủ động thực hiện, nhưng cần duy trì tiêu chuẩn cao trong các công việc mình làm.

Làm việc tại Fonos là một cơ hội thú vị để cho các bạn trẻ học hỏi và phát triển bản thân nhanh hơn trong môi trường start up khởi nghiệp.


Văn phòng Fonos


Tại Phú Mỹ Hưng, Quận 7, Sài Gòn.

description:
Pixelz is looking for Junior/ Mid / Senior .NET Developer with attractive salary




Junior - Medium, Up to $2,000




Senior, Up to $3,000




Your primary focus will be on developing back-end components, data layers and API. You will ensure that these components and the overall application are robust, scalable and easy to maintain. You will coordinate with the rest of the team working on different layers of the infrastructure. Therefore, a commitment to collaborative problem solving, sophisticated design, and quality product is important.

Tech stack: SQL Server, Entity Framework, .NET Core, Identity Server, RESTful APIs, Amazon AWS (EC2, S3, SQS, SES, Lambda, StepFunctions, API Gateway, etc), Elasticsearch, memcache, NodeJS, React.js, Redux, Web socket.



Architect and build robust, scalable, highly available and reliable systems.


Proactively research for solutions to problems.


Work closely with the client teams and product design team to iterate quickly on new features and experiments.


Participate in design discussions, code reviews and group brainstorming sessions.


Deliver high quality code following best practices for better performance, user experience, and reusability.


Troubleshoot existing code bases, hunt down nasty bugs and refactor code.










Bachelor's degree in computer science or equivalent


Proficiency in C# and .NET Core framework


Love writing code, love deleting code


Have got grit, dare to fail


Be hardworking, passionate and possess a can-do attitude.


Be good at critical, logical thinking and problem-solving skill


Stay focus


Be assertive, honest and trustworthy


Be willing to deal with the opposite and different ideas


Be a good team player and patient person


Be a self-learner


Good communication in English is preferable 










International, dynamic and friendly working environment


Great opportunities in developing career pathway, English and soft skills


Flexible working time, from Monday to Friday.


Work-from-home policy.


Improve English competency by working directly with foreign colleagues.


Social, healthcare and unemployment insurances complied with labor law.


Up to 15 annual leave days per year


Summer trip allowance, 4 day summit trip, 2 week fully paid off for parental leave, teamwork activities and uniform are provided.

description:
Quality Control (QC) Engineer performs test functions on our projects, ensures that works performed by designated project teams meet quality standards set internally and as agreed with clients. QC Engineer participates in requirements review, change control, testing throughout projects' life cycle.

The QC Engineer will be the ONLY QC in an agile team (with Team Lead and 3/4 developers) to serve our client in the US.








Knowledge and experience in software testing methodology, software development life cycle, and software development process.


Knowledge and experience of defect tracking systems.


Knowledge and experience of programming languages, databases, and tools that match the company's focus.


Able to make test plan, test cases. Possesses organizational, analytical and report writing skills.


Able to perform functional testing, user interface testing, acceptance testing, integration testing, system testing.


Knowing load testing, automation testing is a plus.


Excellent initiative and problem solving skills.


Highly motivated, client service mindset.


Strong teamwork, interpersonal and communication skills.


Good at English reading and written skills.


Good at time, task management skills.


Well-organized and strong attention to details.








We allow our staff to have GREAT flexible working time, serving our clients first but work-life balance is also EXTREMELY important.

There are plenty of project team buildings, company team buildings, parties...

Care, help is naturally in our working environment.

description:
Starboard Asia Co.,ltd. đang tìm kiếm vị trí PHP Web Developer để tham gia phát triển các dự án của công ty. 



Kỹ năng tư duy logic và kinh nghiệm tư duy lập trình để xem xét và thực hiện phân tích kỹ thuật các yêu cầu của khách hàng và làm việc với các thành viên trong nhóm.


Lập trình phát triển hệ thống nghiệp vụ hoặc website theo yêu cầu của khách hàng.


Có tinh thần trách nhiệm đối với chất lượng và tiến độ dự án tham gia.


Có thể đi công tác ngắn hạn hoặc dài hạn tại Nhật Bản


Đóng góp ý tưởng mới để làm ứng dụng tốt và dễ sử dụng hơn.










Tốt nghiệp đại học các ngành liên quan đến Software phát triển phần mềm


Kinh nghiệm phát triển ngôn ngữ liên quan từ 3-5 năm lập trình với PHP với các framework như Lavarel, WordPress, CodeIgniter…


Kinh nghiệm và kiến thức về các ngôn ngữ phát triển UI (HTML/CSS/JS, NodeJS, Vue JS...)


Có kinh nghiệm và kiến thức về những ngôn ngữ khác (.Net Core hoặc Java)  và công nghệ khác là 1 lợi thế


Kỹ năng làm việc nhóm, quản lý thời gian... là 1 lợi thế










Bên cạnh lương, các bạn còn được thưởng theo năng suất làm việc và lợi nhuận của công ty.


Ngày nghỉ Lễ, Tết theo quy định của Pháp luật Việt Nam. Và 1 số ngày nghỉ đặc trưng của công ty.


Hưởng đầy đủ các các loại bảo hiểm theo quy định của Nhà Nước, du lịch công ty hằng năm và hoạt động vui chơi khác…


Thời gian làm việc: từ thứ Hai đến thứ Sáu từ 8h30 đến 17h30. Nghỉ thứ Bảy và Chủ Nhật


Cơ hội được training và công tác ngắn và dài hạn ở Nhật Bản với chế độ đãi ngộ tốt


Môi trường làm việc thân thiện thoải mái, cơ hội phát triển bản thân cùng đội ngũ nhân viên trẻ và nhiệt huyết


Team building, du lịch công ty trong và ngoài nước và chế độ khác...

Chúng tôi đang muốn tìm kiếm nhân lực gắn bó và phát triển công ty tại thị trường châu Á.

description:
Job Scope


You’ll be working on all aspects of our product and platform: from front-end visualizations, implementing scalable, data-heavy features, helping customers with their complex SQL, to managing our servers that processed thousands of heavy jobs everyday.



Build complex and interactive data delivery platform using HTML5, JavaScript; build reusable front-end JS/HTML components.


Design and implement our features from both backend logic to frontend interactions


Build back-end components that deal with data movement and logic.





Some Cool Things We've Done/You Might Do:





Build an in-house background job queue system using just PostgreSQL and Ruby


Design and build a generic data connector that works with all major databases (MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQL Server, Redshift, BigQuery, etc)


Build an Excel-like Pivot Table interface for slicing and dicing of data


Build a cohort/retention analysis color-coding table (think Mixpanel/kissmetrics)


Build a new domain-specific language for analytics





Interesting Engineering Projects





Zero-downtime deployment for long-running background jobs


Writing a database abstraction layer to interface with different database technologies at once: PostgreSQL, MySQL, Redshift, BigQuery, Presto


Implement alert monitoring system using statistical algorithms


ETL customer’s data from MongoDB to relational DBs with minimal overhead.


Parsing SQL into an AST (abstract syntax tree) to understand semantics and suggest optimizations


Build a sandbox environment to execute arbitrary Python code that still ensures security









Requirements




Strong problem solving (most important)


Experiences with Ruby on Rails/Ruby is a plus


Have at least 1 year of experiences in Software Development


Some experiences with Rails, Ruby, PostgreSQL, Redis, SQLs, Vue.js, ES6, TypeScript


Good English communication skill (reading and writing)


Both senior and junior positions are welcome





What We Look For In You







Problem Solving:
 You don’t just write code based on requirements, you debate the requirements with us.




Coding:
 You write good code, you’ve written code that handle a lot of load, and you enjoy optimizing and refactoring your code to make it faster




Culture & Mindset:
 You’re a team player; you understand how it’s like working for a startup – doing anything and everything needed (from writing blog posts, to help customers with their data problem)




Tech Stack:
 we use Ruby, PostgreSQL, Redis, Vue.js, ES6, TypeScript and a lot of SQLs. It’s great if you know these, but it’s not a big deal. We’re confident you’ll pick these up quickly on the job.



Basically you will not just implement features based on a task list. We need your original ideas, creativity and critical thinking skills to help us build a great data platform.







Our Engineering Philosophy





Problem Solving Centric
‍


We are not obsessed with any particular technology. We believe cool technologies might not get the job done, the right technologies do. We currently use Ruby, Node.js, VueJS with PostgreSQL and Redis but not afraid to try new things. We invented our own job scheduling system when we found nothing fit our needs.



‍
Quality Over Quantity




We think performance and code quality should not be an afterthought. We favor code refactoring over adding new functionality. We focus on test-driven development, short-cycle deployment. We make sure our code is highly readable and modular with thorough technical documentations and proper design patterns.




Metrics-Driven Engineering




When it comes to engineering performance, we don't feel, we know. We don't just rely on intuitions, but let the numbers speak for itself. We have logging and monitoring properly set up. We know how fast (or slow) our site is, and how much improvements we've made compared to last week.


Our Engineering Culture




We don’t fancy free food or ping pong table, we focus on building an environment where our engineers can be productive and concentrate on solving good problems


Our engineers own the product from end to end. They are involved in and get to speak directly with the customers to understand how they’re using it


We don’t write bad code to rush for the deadline. We prefer spending more time refactoring the code over shipping bad code




Interview Process 


- Round 1: A short chat with HR (Short chat to introduce Holistics, our product, discuss to understand your skills and experiences)

- Round 2: Technical interview with Engineering team

- Round 3: Do take-home assignment (offline - deadline 3days, will be sent after Round 2)


Why You'll Love Working




👨🏼‍💼 Training & career developments





Weekly TED talks to expand skills and knowledge.


Yearly budget to support personal and professional growth, well-beings and interest cultivations.




🌏 
Competitive salary and benefits





24/7 Healthcare Insurance, Periodic Medical Checkup.


Salary regular reviews, 13-month Bonus.


Stock Options for high-contributing individuals.




💕 
Awesome company policies





A flexible work culture, Regular reviews, Remote policy.


14 Annual leaves/year, 14 Sick leaves/year, Children care leave policy.


Weekly happy hours. Company trip and company-organized events.




🏢 
Workstations provided for maximum productivity





MacBook (or Laptop) Grant


Mechanical Keyboard + Razer Mouse


Big-screen monitor(s)



🌐 
Working time:
 From Monday – Friday, from 9.00 a.m. to 6.00 p.m.

🌐 
Work location:
 Charmington La Pointe Building, 181, Cao Thang Street, District 10, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam.

description:
Looking for a big break in your career, several opportunities exists for talented PHP Developers to join our awesome team in the 
Gold Coast – Australia
. If you like the challenge of remote working on a large and complex SaaS application that will test your knowledge and keep you on the edge then come and join us. We will provide you with interesting real-world business challenges in an English speaking environment.

If you are a 
PHP developer looking to become a full stack,
 We are committed to staying up to date with technology, and openly encourage cross-functionality within teams. Your passion for growth will be matched by ours.


The role


The successful candidate will have a desire to not only implement new features and improvements to the existing software, but to work with the support and operations team on understanding customer roadblocks and requirements to ensure they become successful users of the system. Your responsibilities will include:



Bringing Product Manager’s ideas to life, by your own input, improving our Transport and Warehouse Management System.


Pair programming with the team when needed, helping out and receiving help


Be available for contact for all stakeholders with the Build team


Keeping up to date with current engineering trends, proposing and implementing improvements.


Investigating issues, mitigating them, and recommending preventative measures.


Supporting other engineers, QA, and Product team in resolving problems and identifying client requirements.


Reporting to the stakeholders on progress, timelines and road blocks.


Training and assisting other developers.


Any other duties as assigned.








The ideal candidate will have:





Well spoken English
 (TCGold is an Australian own company, we will conduct interview remotely from Australia in English)



Extensive experience with PHP;



Experience with development of REST APIs, serialisation formats like JSON or XML, and understanding of HTTP


Experience with front-end or back-end development, ideally a mix of both (full-stack)


FE: Familiarity with any MV* front-end framework


Experience with any of these is beneficial: Java, NodeJS, JavaScript, TypeScript


Unit, integration and E2E testing


Familiarity with UNIX-family systems


General awareness of Authorization and authentication aspects


Atlassian's suite: JIRA, Confluence, Bitbucket


At least one of:
○ Experience with large cloud providers like AWS
○ Familiarity with Docker or other containerisation technology


Used Git versioning system


High level attention to detail


Passion for problem-solving


Experience working in Agile teams


A genuine passion for seeing our customers succeed.










High salary for high performance


Five working days/week


Awesome friendly team


Remotely working from home is available


Working on a complex software engineering project




It’s a permanent position working on a complex software engineering project. We are committed to staying up to date with technology, and openly encourage cross-functionality within teams. Your passion for growth will be matched by ours.


We have been growing rapidly over the last few years and have no intention of slowing down, so there will be loads of opportunities as we continue to dominate the SME market in ANZ and hopefully in select international markets.

The role will provide a broad-based exposure to the entire customer lifecycle and the our SaaS applications, and provide a driven employee with the opportunities to capitalise on that understanding in several different directions depending on the intersection of passion and demonstrated success.

The business has ambitious growth plans, and will support you to expand your skill set
and tackle new challenges.
