Preferred Technologies




Programming language: Javascript, Typescript


NodeJS Framework: Express, Socket, NestJS


Database: MongoDB, MySQL


Others: Serverless, Lambda, ffmpeg (to process video)

location: 4 Ngo 82 Vong hau, Cau Giay, Ha Noi
description:
We are looking for an Angular Developer responsible for the development of interactive front-end components of various web and mobile applications with a focus on performance. You will be primarily working on the client side of the software and creating the user-interface services. You will be responsible for but not limited to creating modules and components and then integrating these parts to build a functional software for our clients, fixing bugs, unit testing, and building RESTful APIs.



To be successful in this role, you will need to be proficient with Google Docs. You will also need to be able to multitask effectively and essentially thrive in a busy, team-oriented environment.



Responsibilities


-Designing and developing user interfaces using angularJS best practices.


-Adapting interface for modern internet applications using the latest front-end technologies.


-Writing JavaScript, CSS, and HTML.


-Developing product analysis tasks.


-Making complex technical and design decisions for AngularJS projects.


-Developing application codes and unit tests in AngularJS, Java Technologies, and Rest Web Services.


-Conducting performance tests.


-Consulting with the design team.


-Ensuring high performance of applications and providing support.








-Bachelor’s degree in computer science, computer engineering or similar.


-Previous work experience as an angularJS developer.


-Proficient in CSS, HTML, and writing cross-browser compatible code.


-Experience using JavaScript building tools like Gulp or Grunt.


-Knowledge of JavaScript MV-VM/MVC frameworks including AngluarJS.


-Excellent project management skills.


-Proven experience implementing front-end and back-end JavaScript applications.


-Excellent communication skills.


-Critical thinker and good problem-solver.








Dandelion Labs has a great team of passionate, talented, and smart human beings, undoubtedly an ideal place for you to work.

job_name: Power BI Dev (Data Analyst, SQL, AWS)
location: Other, Thu Duc City, Ho Chi Minh
description:
Discova is looking for a Power BI Developer/Data Modeler to join the team in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam. In this business-critical role, you will be using the latest methodologies and tech in the BI space and participate in the enhancement of a global BI solution. Using Power BI you will be developing and designing Business Intelligence reporting based on data delivered through Hive tables and databases. You will be well versed in SQL, experienced in scoping/designing data marts for BI consumption preferably with Power BI shared datasets, and assisting with other ad-hoc reporting. A high level of experience in transforming business requirements into reusable tabular data models is essential for success in this role. Experience as a dedicated data modeler would be highly regarded.




Implementation of BI dashboards while ensuring the solution meets flexibility, usability, and performance requirements


Assisting with the creation and maintenance of SQL store procedures, views, and ad-hoc SQL reporting, including directly querying delta lake through HIVE and Databricks notebooks


Work cross-functionally with Technology, Operations, Products, and Finance to deliver strategic projects allowing the company to offer the best customer experience.


Data protection


Follow and take a leading role in Global BI's established policies and procedures for solution development lifecycle, including analysis, design, testing,


Tourplan system enhancements for further automation e.g. auto uploads of cash receipts and payments, auto reconciliations, fine-tuning of month-end processes.


Power BI and integration with Tourplan system and other sources of data to provide better information for leaders.


Maintain and support data analytics platforms


Integration of Tourplan system back end to other 3rd party distribution and reservation systems to ensure transactions are recorded correctly and efficiently eg. Bokun, Live, Travelbox (new Calypso).


Work closely with selling business teams to understand information requirements to ensure solutions align with business needs


Identify areas of inefficiency in the existing system/ manual processes, and help users to define business requirements that may entail process streamlining and/or automation. Assist users and provide guidance in process mapping for as-is and to-be process modeling.


Create an environment where people feel supported, connected, and empowered.


Ensure that what is meant to happen in the business does happen.


Build trust and strong working relationships with business teams to ensure that Discovers finance operations are executed in line with the prescribed SLAs.










The Essentials:





1 - 2 years' Data Analysis experience or similar


Experience with PowerBI, SQL (Google BigQuery, AWS, MongoDB)


Strong Microsoft Applications capability, particularly with Excel and data manipulation


Strong attention to detail and ability to identify trends within data sets


Financial knowledge is additional.


Fluent in written and verbal in both Vietnamese language and English.




The Attributes:




Proven problem-solving skills.


Customer-centric with a commitment to high standards of service delivery.


High attention to detail & strong time/priority management skills


Effective time/priority management skills.


Strong interpersonal and presentation skills across different cultures.


A flexible rotating roster that may include late nights, weekends, and early mornings and flexible with uncertainties/changing priorities and under pressure.


Ability to travel on business when required

Must possess the below minimum qualifications to be initially considered for this position.


Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or related field.


At least 6+years of experience in a Linux, Networking role within a medium to large organization with a strong track record of Shell Scripting, Python, Linux, Open stack.


Strong background contributing code in Python and Go to open-source projects in the cloud or devices area.

TCP/IP networking, libvirt/KVM virtualization and core Linux operating system skills are a must-have with detailed architecture, designing complex solutions and infrastructure operations.

Excellent understanding of cloud security, including SSL/TLS, digital certificates, encryption technologies


Expert in distributed systems including message bus such as AMQP (ex: RabbitMQ), zookeeper, and stateless systems


Any exposure to open source products and contributions to open source communities is highly desirable.

được đào tạo từ nhiều trường đại học nổi tiếng từ nhiều quốc gia khác nhau. Hiện tại chúng tôi đang tuyển dụng rất nhiều vị trí cho các dự án xây dựng sản phẩm AI của công ty. Tham gia xây dựng, quản lý các luồng dữ liệu phục vụ xử lý, phân tích và xây dựng các mô hình AI/ML

GROW at the fastest pace possible.

Khả năng đọc hiểu, viết tiếng Anh chuyên ngành tốt.









Mức lương:

 





MỘT NĂM TỪ 17 ĐẾN 21 THÁNG LƯƠNG
, Lương thưởng cao tương xứng với kết quả làm việc, xét tăng lương định kỳ, thưởng theo dự án và các ngày Lễ, Tết.


Cơ hội thăng tiến cao, con đường thăng tiến rõ ràng.


Thử việc: 2 tháng được nhận 85% hệ số lương (không bao gồm lương năng suất, phụ cấp, điều tiết).


Ngoài thu nhập được hưởng thì NLĐ còn được hưởng phụ cấp như: Ăn ca trưa,ca đêm, trực đêm, thạc sỹ, tiến sỹ, quần áo đồng phục, bảo hộ lao động, các chính sách cho tứ thân phụ mẫu, chế độ hiếu, hỷ…




Môi trường làm việc tốt:

 



Văn phòng rộng rãi, thoáng mát.


Được cấp phát thiết bị hỗ trợ cho công việc.


Đồng nghiệp thân thiện, hòa đồng, giúp đỡ lẫn nhau.


Thời gian làm việc 5 ngày/ tuần, nghỉ Thứ 7, chủ nhật.


Phong cách làm việc chuyên nghiệp, công bằng và tôn trọng.




Được học hỏi:

 



Chuyên nghành Quản lý Khai thác cảng biển, Logictics, Kho.


Các công nghệ hoạt động trên môi trường .NET, Oracle, SQL Server.


Kinh nghiệm từ những quản lý lâu năm trong ngành.


Hỗ trợ chi phí 100% đào tạo chuyên môn.




 Được đào tạo, phát triển và ghi nhận:

 



Được định hướng con đường phát triển nghề nghiệp rõ ràng.


Được học tiếng Anh.


Được đào tạo kỹ năng mềm.


Cơ hội đào tạo tại nước ngoài.


Được đào tạo về kĩ thuật cũng như nghiệp vụ Quản lý Khai thác cảng biển, Logictics, Kho.


Được thể hiện bản thân, đưa ra ý tưởng để thực thi thành sản phẩm.


Được ghi nhận xứng đáng trên thành quả đạt được.



Nếu bạn có ý tưởng, có đam mê, có nỗ lực, nhưng lại chưa có được nơi để phát triển khả năng của bản thân, hãy cho mình cơ hội thể hiện bạn là người mà chúng tôi tìm kiếm.

description:
We are looking for 30 Intermediate/Senior .NET Developers (.NET Core) to join a large scale Fin-Tech project for a Canadian client.


 


SIGN-ON BONUS will be offered to candidates who can join by November 30, 2021.


 


RESPONSIBILITIES:




Code, implement, unit test, maintain and troubleshoot web application.


Comply with established coding quality standard of the company.


Work closely with QA team to ensure the project quality.


Report to Team Leader.


Assist Team Leader in reviewing work result of low-level members.


Participate in R&D, training, knowledge sharing activities.


Follow the project and organization processes, policies and regulations.


Ensure the assigned tasks to be performed on-time and with high quality.









REQUIREMENTS:




Degree in Software Engineering, Information Technology or relevant.


At least 3 years of work experience in developing web application.


Experienced in .NET Core, .NET, C#.


Have good knowledge about Object-Oriented Programming (OOP).


Experienced in Git or other source control systems.


Good English skills.


Good time management, communication and problem-solving skills.


Good teamwork spirit and logical thinking.


Proactive, well self-organized and responsible in work.


Able to quickly manage new technologies.










Competitive salary depending on skills and capabilities;


13th month salary and additional bonuses based on the business performance;


Performance review twice a year;


Comfortable working conditions and flexible working time;


Good career growth opportunities with interesting and challenging projects;


English, technical and soft skills training courses;


Additional healthcare insurance and annual health check-up;


Light beverage and food are available all the time in the office;


Outdoor activities with company support: sport clubs, team building, happy hour party, birthday, company trip, staff and family events, etc.

description:
Participates in all phases of the software development lifecycle


Sometimes might lead a small team and act as a scrum master (senior position)


Coaching and code reviews for junior developers (senior position)


Stay on top of the latest technologies










Preferably at least 2 years of work experience in software development


Strong in Node.js, and either in React.js, Angular, or Vue.js but knowing all is an advantage 


Knows module bundlers like Webpack and task automation tools like Gulp


Knows fundamentals of the web like the HTTP protocol, TSL/SSL, basic security best practices


Being comfortable using command-line interfaces and SSH


Experience in AWS, deployment, and testing automation is a plus


Excellent English communication skills


Relevant educational background










We like to make sure the talent is well taken care of, and here are just some of the benefits you will enjoy:





Top compensation based on expertise – we are only looking for top talent and pay accordingly.


Work from home + allowances - we let you work from the comfort of your home + amazing allowances you get to enjoy!


Standard 5 day work week from Monday to Friday.


Flexible working schedule. You can choose your working hours (within reason).


Flat management style and open-door policy - no to micromanagement and your voice are being heard!


Work with the latest technologies - you can hone your skills and work with Australian and European clients + a chance to earn more through our self-training program.


Enrolment to HMO for a maximum of 3 immediate dependents on your 1st day.


Incentive-based wellness program


Toastmasters, Wednesday Classes, and other learning opportunities.

description:
Receive a full 13th month Tet bonus as long as your first full day of work with East Agile is on or before January 11, 2022. 
There is no reason to wait before joining our team.


Description:




You will work in our Ho Chi Minh, Ha Noi or Da Nang office as a Senior Python developer at East Agile. 


You will work directly, in English, with the founders of new and rapidly growing Internet ventures to understand their vision and implement it on the web and on iPhone and Android smartphone platforms. 


You will use Extreme Programming and SCRUM agile development methods which include paired programming, Behavior Driven Development (BDD), Test Driven Development (TDD), and emergent business-value prioritized development. 


You will work in small teams of two to seven. 


You will enhance your skills in advanced Javascript and Python/Django working with leading American companies. You will develop applications on Cloud platforms that can grow to support millions of users. 


You will stay on the cutting edge of Internet application development.


Become a full stack developer through cross training with colleagues.








- Excellent logic skills.

- Excellent object oriented programming skills.

- Expertise in Python, with at least 1-year experience.

- Strong Javascript, HTML/CSS, and SQL.

- Having experience in Docker and Kubernetes is an advantage.

- Good verbal English communications skills.

- Familiar with Unix (Mac OSX, Solaris, or Linux command line).

- Familiar with test driven development (TDD, BDD), refactoring, and programming in an IDE.

- Prefer experience developing applications on the Cloud, such as EC2, Heroku, Engine Yard using relevant tools.

- Prefer ability to create well-designed user interfaces using tools such as Balsamiq and create web-optimized graphics using Photoshop or Gimp.

- Prefer experience working in an agile development environment using eXtreme Programming and/or SCRUM.

- Prefer a degree in computer science, mathematics or statistics from a top Vietnamese or foreign university.

- Willing to work closely and continuously with other programmers, almost never programming alone. Collaborate continuously with colleagues even while working remotely.


 






The East Agile Experience includes:

(1) ability to transfer between our offices in Ha Noi, Ho Chi Minh City, and Da Nang,
(2) 15 days annual leave,
(3) excellent health insurance,
(4) a 40-hour regular work week with little or no after-hours work requirements,
(5) end-of-year Tet bonus,
(6) a fun and flexible working environment in a modern office,
(7) free office lunch,
(8) salary reviews every 6 months,
(9) business trips for meetings with clients in North America.

(10) 
Receive a full 13th month Tet bonus as long as your first full day of work with East Agile is on or before January 11, 2022.
